    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 64)
        set udg_integer[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_timer_Income_Increase = CreateTimer()
    set i = 0
    loop
        exitwhen (i > 64)
        set udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[i] = 0
        set i = i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_CardGettingLeaversP1 = 0
    set udg_CardGettingLeaversP2 = 0
    set udg_DarkConvT1 = 0
    set udg_DarkConvT2 = 0

function CreateBuildingsForPlayer2 takes nothing returns nothing
    local player p = Player(2)
    local unit u
    local integer unitID
    local trigger t
    local real life

    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n026', 2336.9, -2227.7, 163.610, 'n026' )
    set gg_unit_o01Q_0286 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'o01Q', 2682.5, 573.1, 270.000, 'o01Q' )
    set gg_unit_o01S_0287 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'o01S', 2436.1, 568.5, 270.000, 'o01S' )
    set gg_unit_o01R_0288 = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'o01R', 2179.5, 564.0, 270.000, 'o01R' )
    set u = BlzCreateUnitWithSkin( p, 'n026', -103.3, -2322.2, 163.900, 'n026' )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreatePlayerBuildings takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer0(  )
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer1(  )
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer2(  )
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer3(  )
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer4(  )
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer5(  )
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer6(  )
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer7(  )
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer8(  )
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer9(  )
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer10(  )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreatePlayerUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer0(  )
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer1(  )
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer8(  )
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer9(  )
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer10(  )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreateAllUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNeutralHostileBuildings(  )
    call CreateNeutralPassiveBuildings(  )
    call CreatePlayerBuildings(  )
    call CreateNeutralHostile(  )
    call CreateNeutralPassive(  )
    call CreatePlayerUnits(  )
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Triggers
//*
//***************************************************************************

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Neutral Group
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Neutral_Group_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple( Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_NeutralGroup )
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple( Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA), udg_NeutralGroup )
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple( Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_NeutralGroup )
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple( Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_NeutralGroup )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Neutral_Group takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Neutral_Group = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Neutral_Group, function Trig_Neutral_Group_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AAAASS
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AAAASS_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AAAASS takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AAAASS = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AAAASS, function Trig_AAAASS_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: P1 units
//===========================================================================
function Trig_P1_units_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_P1_units takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_P1_units = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_P1_units, 5 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_P1_units, function Trig_P1_units_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Magic reisst
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Magic_reisst_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'AIsr', GetSoldUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Magic_reisst takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Magic_reisst = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Magic_reisst, function Trig_Magic_reisst_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Life blah blah
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Life_blah_blah_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( gg_unit_hhou_0081, ( udg_AvalPlayer + 1 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( gg_unit_hhou_0158, ( udg_PlayerNr + 1 ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Life_blah_blah takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Life_blah_blah = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Life_blah_blah, 1.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Life_blah_blah, function Trig_Life_blah_blah_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ABKah
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ABKah_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( gg_unit_hhou_0081 )
    call KillUnit( gg_unit_hhou_0158 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ABKah takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ABKah = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_ABKah, 180.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ABKah, function Trig_ABKah_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Info
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Info_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_844", "TRIGSTR_845", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNGoldMine.blp" )
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_846", "TRIGSTR_847", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNMedalionOfCourage.blp" )
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_848", "TRIGSTR_849", "ReplaceableTextures\\PassiveButtons\\PASBTNDemolish.blp" )
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_852", "TRIGSTR_853", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNBasicStruct.blp" )
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_998", "TRIGSTR_999", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNAvatar.blp" )
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_884", "TRIGSTR_885", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNArthas.blp" )
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_886", "TRIGSTR_887", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNCrate.blp" )
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_888", "TRIGSTR_889", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNVillagerMan.blp" )
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_890", "TRIGSTR_891", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNChaosWarlockGreen.blp" )
    call CreateQuestBJ( bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_956", "TRIGSTR_957", "ReplaceableTextures\\PassiveButtons\\PASBTNPillage.blp" )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Info takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Info = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Info, function Trig_Info_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Turn Cards on Units
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Turn_Cards_on_Units_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_2 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_2_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_3_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_4_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_5_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_6_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_7_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_8_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_1_Turn_Card )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_2_Turn_Card )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_3_Turn_Card )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_4_Turn_Card )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_5_Turn_Card )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_6_Turn_Card )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_7_Turn_Card )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_8_Turn_Card )
    set udg_TurnCounter = 0
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Turn_Cards_on_Units takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Turn_Cards_on_Units = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Turn_Cards_on_Units, function Trig_Turn_Cards_on_Units_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: P1Pick Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_P1Pick_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'h083' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'h02M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'h02L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_P1Pick_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_P1Pick_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_P1Pick_Copy_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_P1DeckI < udg_MaxCardNr ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_P1Pick_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()), false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    if ( Trig_P1Pick_Copy_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_P1DeckI = ( udg_P1DeckI + 1 )
        set udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_P1DeckI] = GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit())
        set udg_P1CNr = ( udg_P1CNr + 1 )
    else
        set udg_P1DeckI = ( udg_P1DeckI + 1 )
        set udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_P1DeckI] = GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit())
        call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_3734" )
        set udg_AvalPlayer = ( udg_AvalPlayer + 1 )
        set udg_P1CNr = ( udg_P1CNr + 1 )
        call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_P1Pick_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_P1Pick_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_P1Pick_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_P1Pick_Copy, Condition( function Trig_P1Pick_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_P1Pick_Copy, function Trig_P1Pick_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: P2Pick Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_P2Pick_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'h083' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'h02M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'h02L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_P2Pick_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_P2Pick_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_P2DeckI < udg_MaxCardNr ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_P2Pick_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing

    if ( Trig_P2Pick_Copy_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_P2DeckI = ( udg_P2DeckI + 1 )
        set udg_DeckCTypeP2U[udg_P2DeckI] = GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit())
        set udg_P2CNr = ( udg_P2CNr + 1 )
    else
        set udg_P2DeckI = ( udg_P2DeckI + 1 )
        set udg_DeckCTypeP2U[udg_P2DeckI] = GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit())
        call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_3736" )
        set udg_AvalPlayer = ( udg_AvalPlayer + 1 )
        set udg_P2CNr = ( udg_P2CNr + 1 )
        call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Make Cards unavailable
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Make_Cards_unavailable_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02N', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02O', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02P', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02Q', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02R', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02S', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02T', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02U', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02V', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02W', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02X', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02Y', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02Z', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h030', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h031', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h032', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h033', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h034', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h035', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h036', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h037', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h038', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h039', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03A', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03B', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03C', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03D', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03E', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03F', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03G', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03H', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03I', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03J', false, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03K', false, GetEnumPlayer() )

function Trig_Make_Cards_unavailable_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Make_Cards_unavailable_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Make_Cards_unavailable takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Make_Cards_unavailable = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Make_Cards_unavailable, function Trig_Make_Cards_unavailable_Actions )
endfunction

    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07C', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07D', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07E', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07F', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07G', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07H', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07I', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07J', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07K', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07L', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07M', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07N', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07O', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07P', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07Q', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07R', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07S', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07T', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07U', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07V', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07W', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07X', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07Y', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07Z', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h080', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h081', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h082', 1, GetEnumPlayer() )
endfunction

function Trig_Limit_to_1_For_card_UNITS_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Limit_to_1_For_card_UNITS_Func002A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Limit_to_1_For_card_UNITS takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Limit_to_1_For_card_UNITS = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Limit_to_1_For_card_UNITS, function Trig_Limit_to_1_For_card_UNITS_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Max Card Placement
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0A5' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MaxCardNrCounter == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MaxCardNrCounter == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MaxCardNrCounter == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MaxCardNrCounter == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_MaxCardNrCounter == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_MaxCardNrCounter == 6 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( udg_MaxCardNrCounter == 0 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Func001Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_MaxCardNr = 4
        set udg_MaxCardNrCounter = 1
        call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_3605" )
    else
        if ( Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_MaxCardNr = 9
            set udg_MaxCardNrCounter = 2
            call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_3606" )
        else
            if ( Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_MaxCardNr = 14
                set udg_MaxCardNrCounter = 3
                call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_3607" )
            else
                if ( Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_MaxCardNr = 19
                    set udg_MaxCardNrCounter = 4
                    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_3608" )
                else
                    if ( Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_MaxCardNr = 24
                        set udg_MaxCardNrCounter = 5
                        call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_3609" )
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            set udg_MaxCardNr = 29
                            set udg_MaxCardNrCounter = 6
                            call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_3610" )
                        else
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0A5', GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Max_Card_Placement takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Max_Card_Placement = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Max_Card_Placement, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Max_Card_Placement, Condition( function Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Max_Card_Placement, function Trig_Max_Card_Placement_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Max Card Nr
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Max_Card_Nr_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_MaxCardNr = 19
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Max_Card_Nr takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Max_Card_Nr = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Max_Card_Nr, function Trig_Max_Card_Nr_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: P1Pick Bg
//===========================================================================
function Trig_P1Pick_Bg_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_P1Pick_Bg_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'ACsw' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_P1Pick_Bg_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_P1Pick_Bg_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_P1Pick_Bg_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_P1DeckCType[1] = 'A05T'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[2] = 'A06J'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[3] = 'A055'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[4] = 'A06I'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[5] = 'A04V'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[6] = 'A04R'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[7] = 'A07O'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[8] = 'A033'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[9] = 'A06K'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[10] = 'A05U'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[11] = 'A03X'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[12] = 'A031'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[13] = 'A02N'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[14] = 'A03P'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[15] = 'A03L'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[16] = 'A032'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[17] = 'A04I'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[18] = 'A03Z'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[19] = 'A02Z'
        set udg_P1DeckCType[20] = 'A069'
        set udg_P1CNr = 20
        set udg_AvalPlayer = ( udg_AvalPlayer + 1 )
        call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_3441" )
    else
        if ( Trig_P1Pick_Bg_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_P1DeckCType[1] = 'A06W'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[2] = 'A05T'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[3] = 'A06J'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[4] = 'A06I'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[5] = 'A04V'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[6] = 'A04R'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[7] = 'A04I'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[8] = 'A07O'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[9] = 'A055'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[10] = 'A05U'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[11] = 'A03X'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[12] = 'A031'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[13] = 'A02N'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[14] = 'A03P'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[15] = 'A03L'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[16] = 'A032'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[17] = 'A033'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[18] = 'A03Z'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[19] = 'A02Z'
            set udg_P1DeckCType[20] = 'A069'
            set udg_P1CNr = 20
            set udg_AvalPlayer = ( udg_AvalPlayer + 1 )
            call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_3452" )
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_P1Pick_Bg takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_P1Pick_Bg = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_P1Pick_Bg, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )

endfunction

function Trig_P7Pick_Bg_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_P7Pick_Bg_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_P7DeckCType[1] = 'A06K'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[2] = 'A05T'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[3] = 'A06J'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[4] = 'A06I'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[5] = 'A04V'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[6] = 'A04R'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[7] = 'A04I'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[8] = 'A07O'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[9] = 'A055'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[10] = 'A05U'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[11] = 'A03X'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[12] = 'A031'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[13] = 'A02N'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[14] = 'A03P'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[15] = 'A03L'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[16] = 'A032'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[17] = 'A033'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[18] = 'A03Z'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[19] = 'A02Z'
        set udg_P7DeckCType[20] = 'A069'
        set udg_P7CNr = 20
        set udg_AvalPlayer = ( udg_AvalPlayer + 1 )
        call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_3450" )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_P7Pick_Bg takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_P7Pick_Bg = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_P7Pick_Bg, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_P7Pick_Bg, Condition( function Trig_P7Pick_Bg_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_P7Pick_Bg, function Trig_P7Pick_Bg_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: P8Pick Bg
//===========================================================================
function Trig_P8Pick_Bg_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_P8Pick_Bg_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_P8Pick_Bg_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_P8Pick_Bg_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_P8DeckCType[1] = 'A06K'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[2] = 'A05T'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[3] = 'A06J'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[4] = 'A06I'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[5] = 'A04V'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[6] = 'A04R'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[7] = 'A04I'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[8] = 'A07O'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[9] = 'A055'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[10] = 'A05U'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[11] = 'A03X'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[12] = 'A031'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[13] = 'A02N'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[14] = 'A03P'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[15] = 'A03L'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[16] = 'A032'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[17] = 'A033'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[18] = 'A03Z'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[19] = 'A02Z'
        set udg_P8DeckCType[20] = 'A069'
        set udg_P8CNr = 20
        set udg_AvalPlayer = ( udg_AvalPlayer + 1 )
        call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_3451" )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_P8Pick_Bg, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Table integer
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Table_integer_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ( Player(0), udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2617", udg_P1CNr )
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ( Player(1), udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2618", udg_P2CNr )
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ( Player(2), udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2619", udg_P3CNr )
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ( Player(3), udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2620", udg_P4CNr )
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ( Player(4), udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2621", udg_P5CNr )
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ( Player(5), udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2622", udg_P6CNr )
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ( Player(6), udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2623", udg_P7CNr )
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ( Player(7), udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2624", udg_P8CNr )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Table_integer takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Table_integer = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Table_integer, 0.50 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Table_integer, function Trig_Table_integer_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Making the table
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Making_the_table_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateLeaderboardBJ( GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2604" )
    set udg_CardNumber = GetLastCreatedLeaderboard()
    call LeaderboardSetLabelBJ( udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2605" )
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ( Player(0), udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2607", 0 )
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ( Player(1), udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2608", 0 )
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ( Player(2), udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2609", 0 )
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ( Player(3), udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2610", 0 )
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ( Player(4), udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2611", 0 )
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ( Player(5), udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2612", 0 )
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ( Player(6), udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2613", 0 )
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ( Player(7), udg_CardNumber, "TRIGSTR_2614", 0 )
    call LeaderboardDisplayBJ( true, udg_CardNumber )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Making_the_table takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Making_the_table = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_Making_the_table, 0.50 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Making_the_table, function Trig_Making_the_table_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fast Picking Initialisation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fast_Picking_Initialisation_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_AvalPlayer == udg_PlayerNr ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fast_Picking_Initialisation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Fast_Picking_Initialisation_Func001C() ) then
        call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2541" )
        call StartTimerBJ( udg_TimerStart, false, 0.10 )
        call RemoveUnit( gg_unit_h028_0280 )
        call RemoveUnit( gg_unit_h028_0281 )
        call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fast_Picking_Initialisation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fast_Picking_Initialisation = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Fast_Picking_Initialisation, 1.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Fast_Picking_Initialisation, function Trig_Fast_Picking_Initialisation_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Timer Picking 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Timer_Picking_2_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call TimerDialogDisplayForPlayerBJ( true, GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ(), GetEnumPlayer() )
endfunction

function Trig_Timer_Picking_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetTimeOfDayScalePercentBJ( 10.00 )
    call StartTimerBJ( udg_TimerStart, false, 179.00 )
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ( udg_TimerStart, "TRIGSTR_2526" )
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Timer_Picking_2_Func004A )
    set udg_timer_window_179_Seconds = GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Timer_Picking_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Timer_Picking_2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_Timer_Picking_2, 1.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Timer_Picking_2, function Trig_Timer_Picking_2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Timer Picking 3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Timer_Picking_3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Round_Start )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Timer_Picking_3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Timer_Picking_3 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Timer_Picking_3, udg_TimerStart )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Timer_Picking_3, function Trig_Timer_Picking_3_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Starting Early
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Starting_Early_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Turn_Cards_on) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_Early_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3808" )
    call LeaderboardDisplayBJ( false, udg_CardNumber )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Timer_Picking_3 )
    call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_TimerStart )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Timer )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Timer )
    call PolledWait( 1.00 )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Turn_Cards_on )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Turn_Cards_on )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Starting_Early takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Starting_Early = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_Starting_Early, gg_unit_h028_0281, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Starting_Early, Condition( function Trig_Starting_Early_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Starting_Early, function Trig_Starting_Early_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 15 )
endfunction

function Trig_Much_Gold_While_Picking_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Much_Gold_While_Picking_2_Func001A )
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Much_Gold_While_Picking_2, function Trig_Much_Gold_While_Picking_2_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Turn_Cards_on_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_2_Turn_Cardtrue )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_3_Turn_Cardtrue )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_4_Turn_Cardtrue )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_5_Turn_Cardtrue )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_6_Turn_Cardtrue )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_7_Turn_Cardtrue )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_8_Turn_Cardtrue )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_2_Turn_Card )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_3_Turn_Card )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_4_Turn_Card )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_5_Turn_Card )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_6_Turn_Card )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_7_Turn_Card )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_8_Turn_Card )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_1_Turn_Card )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T2 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Sentinel_Sqad_T1 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Sentinel_Sqad_T2 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Lost_Furbolgs_T1 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Lost_Furbolgs_T2 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Slip_Away_T1 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Slip_Away_T2 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Huntresses_T1 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Huntresses_T2 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Ballistas_T1 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Ballistas_T2 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Helpful_Dryads_T1 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Helpful_Dryads_T2 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Sentinel_Guardians_T1 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Sentinel_Guardians_T2 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Malfurion_Stormrage_T1 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Malfurion_Stormrage_T2 )

    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2 )

    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Sleeping_Malfurion_T2 )

    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Barrow_Den_T2 )

    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Illidan_Stormrage_T2 )

    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T2 )

    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Thrall_s_Aid_T2 )

    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2 )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Much Gold While Picking
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Much_Gold_While_Picking_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 15 )
endfunction

function Trig_Much_Gold_While_Picking_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Much_Gold_While_Picking_Func001A )
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Much_Gold_While_Picking = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Much_Gold_While_Picking, 1.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Much_Gold_While_Picking, function Trig_Much_Gold_While_Picking_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: No unitsSS
//===========================================================================
function Trig_No_unitsSS_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09I', GetTriggerUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_No_unitsSS_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_No_unitsSS_Func001C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_No_unitsSS takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_No_unitsSS = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_No_unitsSS, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_No_unitsSS, function Trig_No_unitsSS_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: No more cards
//===========================================================================
function Trig_No_more_cards_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.01 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( GetSpellAbilityId(), GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_No_more_cards takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_No_more_cards = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_No_more_cards, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_No_more_cards, function Trig_No_more_cards_Actions )
endfunction

    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer( GetTriggerPlayer(), CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 0.00, 1.00 )
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_P5_Zoom_0, function Trig_P5_Zoom_0_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ancient no Uproot Skin
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ancient_no_Uproot_Skin_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Aro2', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09I', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_no_Uproot_Skin_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Ancient_no_Uproot_Skin_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_no_Uproot_Skin_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "stop" )
    call BlzUnitHideAbility( GetTriggerUnit(), 'Aro2', true )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ancient_no_Uproot_Skin takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ancient_no_Uproot_Skin = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Ancient_no_Uproot_Skin, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Ancient_no_Uproot_Skin, Condition( function Trig_Ancient_no_Uproot_Skin_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Ancient_no_Uproot_Skin, function Trig_Ancient_no_Uproot_Skin_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Bulding Skin Barracks
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Func015Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Func015Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Func015Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Func015Func003Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Func015Func003Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Func015Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Func015Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A09D', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A099', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A095', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A098', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A097', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A096', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A09A', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09C', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A094', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09B', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09E', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09G', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09H', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09F', GetTriggerUnit() )
    if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Func015C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P1Building, 'h084', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        set udg_P1Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
    else
        if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Func015Func003C() ) then
            call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P2Building, 'h084', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
            set udg_P2Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
        else
            if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Func015Func003Func001C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P3Building, 'h084', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                set udg_P3Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
            else
                if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Func015Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P4Building, 'h084', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                    set udg_P4Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                else
                    if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Func015Func003Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P5Building, 'h084', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                        set udg_P5Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Func015Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P6Building, 'h084', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                            set udg_P6Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Func015Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P7Building, 'h084', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                                set udg_P7Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Func015Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P8Building, 'h084', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                                    set udg_P8Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                                else
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Barracks = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Barracks, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Barracks, Condition( function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Barracks, function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_Actions )
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary_Func015C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A09H', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A099', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A095', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A098', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A097', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A094', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A09A', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09C', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A096', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09B', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09E', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09G', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09D', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09F', GetTriggerUnit() )
    if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary_Func015C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P1Building, 'n003', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        set udg_P1Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
    else
        if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary_Func015Func001C() ) then
            call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P2Building, 'n003', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
            set udg_P2Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
        else
            if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary_Func015Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P3Building, 'n003', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                set udg_P3Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
            else
                if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary_Func015Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P4Building, 'n003', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                    set udg_P4Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                else
                    if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary_Func015Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P5Building, 'n003', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                        set udg_P5Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary_Func015Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P6Building, 'n003', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                            set udg_P6Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary_Func015Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P7Building, 'n003', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                                set udg_P7Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary_Func015Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P8Building, 'n003', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                                    set udg_P8Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                                else
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary, Condition( function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary, function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Infected_Granary_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Bulding Skin Barracks orc
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A09B', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A099', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A095', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A094', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A098', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A097', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A096', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A09A', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09C', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A095', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09H', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09E', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09G', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09D', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09F', GetTriggerUnit() )
    if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc_Func016C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P1Building, 'o002', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        set udg_P1Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
    else
        if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc_Func016Func001C() ) then
            call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P2Building, 'o002', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
            set udg_P2Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
        else
            if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc_Func016Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P3Building, 'o002', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                set udg_P3Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
            else
                if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc_Func016Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P4Building, 'o002', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                    set udg_P4Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                else
                    if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc_Func016Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P5Building, 'o002', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                        set udg_P5Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc_Func016Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P6Building, 'o002', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                            set udg_P6Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc_Func016Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P7Building, 'o002', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                                set udg_P7Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc_Func016Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P8Building, 'o002', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                                    set udg_P8Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                                else
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc, Condition( function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc, function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Barracks_orc_Actions )
endfunction

    return true

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Crypt_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A09G', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A099', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A095', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A094', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A098', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A095', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A096', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A09A', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09C', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A097', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09H', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09E', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09B', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09D', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09F', GetTriggerUnit() )
    if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Crypt_Func016C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P1Building, 'u00I', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        set udg_P1Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
    else
        if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Crypt_Func016Func001C() ) then
            call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P2Building, 'u00I', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
            set udg_P2Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
        else
            if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Crypt_Func016Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P3Building, 'u00I', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                set udg_P3Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
            else
                if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Crypt_Func016Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P4Building, 'u00I', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                    set udg_P4Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                else
                    if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Crypt_Func016Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P5Building, 'u00I', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                        set udg_P5Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Crypt_Func016Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P6Building, 'u00I', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                            set udg_P6Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Crypt_Func016Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P7Building, 'u00I', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                                set udg_P7Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Crypt_Func016Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P8Building, 'u00I', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                                    set udg_P8Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                                else
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bulding_Skin_Crypt takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Crypt = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Crypt, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )

endfunction

    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc_Func016Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc_Func016Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc_Func016Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc_Func016C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A09F', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A098', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A095', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A094', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A097', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A095', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A096', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A099', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09A', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09E', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09H', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09B', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09G', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09D', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09C', GetTriggerUnit() )
    if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc_Func016C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P1Building, 'o01V', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        set udg_P1Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
    else
        if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc_Func016Func001C() ) then
            call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P2Building, 'o01V', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
            set udg_P2Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
        else
            if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc_Func016Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P3Building, 'o01V', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                set udg_P3Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
            else
                if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc_Func016Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P4Building, 'o01V', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                    set udg_P4Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                else
                    if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc_Func016Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P5Building, 'o01V', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                        set udg_P5Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc_Func016Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P6Building, 'o01V', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                            set udg_P6Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc_Func016Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P7Building, 'o01V', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                                set udg_P7Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc_Func016Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    call ReplaceUnitBJ( udg_P8Building, 'o01V', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
                                    set udg_P8Building = GetLastReplacedUnitBJ()
                                else
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc, Condition( function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc, function Trig_Bulding_Skin_Throne_Orc_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gold Income Low
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gold_Income_Low_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A090' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Income_Low_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A092', gg_unit_h02L_0292 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A093', gg_unit_h02L_0292 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A090', gg_unit_h02L_0292 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A091', gg_unit_h02L_0292 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08Z', gg_unit_h02L_0292 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08Y', gg_unit_h02L_0292 )
    call BlzStartUnitAbilityCooldown( gg_unit_h02L_0292, 'A08Y', 5.00 )
    call BlzStartUnitAbilityCooldown( gg_unit_h02L_0292, 'A08Z', 5.00 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Turn_Gold_on_less )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Turn_Gold_on_classic )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Turn_Gold_on_more )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gold_Income_Low takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gold_Income_Low = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Gold_Income_Low, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Gold_Income_Low, Condition( function Trig_Gold_Income_Low_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Gold_Income_Low, function Trig_Gold_Income_Low_Actions )
endfunction

    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08Z', gg_unit_h02L_0292 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A090', gg_unit_h02L_0292 )
    call BlzStartUnitAbilityCooldown( gg_unit_h02L_0292, 'A08Z', 5.00 )
    call BlzStartUnitAbilityCooldown( gg_unit_h02L_0292, 'A090', 5.00 )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Nocardsdissapear
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Nocardsdissapear_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01Z', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Nocardsdissapear_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01Z', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Nocardsdissapear_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), Condition(function Trig_Nocardsdissapear_Func001001002)), function Trig_Nocardsdissapear_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Nocardsdissapear takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Nocardsdissapear = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_Nocardsdissapear, ( 1.00 + 1 ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Nocardsdissapear, function Trig_Nocardsdissapear_Actions )
endfunction

    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( gg_unit_edcm_0336, "bearform" )
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Change tint furbolgs green
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Change_tint_furbolgs_green_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( gg_unit_nfrs_0206, 80.00, 100, 80.00, 0 )
    call RemoveDestructable( gg_dest_ATtr_0638 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( gg_unit_nfra_0210, 80.00, 100, 80.00, 0 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( gg_unit_nfrb_0208, 50.00, 100, 50.00, 0 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( gg_unit_nfrs_0205, 90.00, 100, 90.00, 0 )
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( gg_unit_nfrl_0207, 60.00, 100, 60.00, 0 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( gg_unit_nfrs_0206, 40.00, 80.00, 40.00, 0 )
    call SetUnitAnimation( gg_unit_nfrs_0206, "death" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( gg_unit_nfra_0210, 60.00, 90.00, 60.00, 0 )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( gg_unit_nfr2_0214, 20.00 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( gg_unit_nfrs_0205, 60.00, 90.00, 60.00, 0 )
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( gg_unit_nfrb_0208, 30.00, 70.00, 30.00, 0 )
    call SetUnitAnimation( gg_unit_nfrs_0205, "death" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( gg_unit_nfrg_0209, 50.00, 90.00, 50.00, 0 )
    call SetUnitAnimation( gg_unit_nfrg_0209, "death" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call SetUnitAnimation( gg_unit_nfrb_0208, "death" )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Change_tint_furbolgs_green takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Change_tint_furbolgs_green = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_Change_tint_furbolgs_green, 180.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Change_tint_furbolgs_green, function Trig_Change_tint_furbolgs_green_Actions )
endfunction

    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'Adef', gg_unit_hfoo_0217 )

// Trigger: Doom Gurad attack constant

    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_nbal_0213, "attack", GetAttacker() )
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Doom_Gurad_attack_constant = CreateTrigger(  )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Felguards enter place
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Felguards_enter_place_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_nbal_0213), "Abilities\\Spells\\Demon\\DarkPortal\\DarkPortalTarget.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call ShowUnitShow( gg_unit_nbal_0213 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_nbal_0213, "attack", gg_unit_hfoo_0216 )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_hfoo_0216, "attack", gg_unit_nbal_0213 )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_hfoo_0217, "attack", gg_unit_nbal_0213 )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_nbal_0213, "attack", gg_unit_hfoo_0216 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 5.00 )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_nbal_0213, "attack", gg_unit_hfoo_0216 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 5.00 )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_nbal_0213, "attack", gg_unit_hfoo_0216 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 5.00 )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_nbal_0213, "attack", gg_unit_hfoo_0216 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call KillUnit( gg_unit_hfoo_0216 )
    call KillUnit( gg_unit_hfoo_0217 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Felguards_enter_place takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Felguards_enter_place = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_Felguards_enter_place, 240.00 )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent( gg_trg_Felguards_enter_place, Player(0), "-start", true )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Felguards_enter_place, function Trig_Felguards_enter_place_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Tent_down_demon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_nbal_0211), "Abilities\\Spells\\Demon\\DarkPortal\\DarkPortalTarget.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_nbal_0212), "Abilities\\Spells\\Demon\\DarkPortal\\DarkPortalTarget.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call ShowUnitShow( gg_unit_nbal_0211 )
    call ShowUnitShow( gg_unit_nbal_0212 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_nbal_0213, "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_070) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_nbal_0212, "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_071) )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_nbal_0211, "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_069) )
endfunction
