//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Night elfrun from demon
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Night_elfrun_from_demon_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTimeOfDay() >= 18.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTimeOfDay() <= 6.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Night_elfrun_from_demon_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Night_elfrun_from_demon_Func003Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Night_elfrun_from_demon_Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTimeOfDay() >= 18.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTimeOfDay() <= 6.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Night_elfrun_from_demon_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Night_elfrun_from_demon_Func008Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Night_elfrun_from_demon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'earc', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_073), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 10 )
    if ( Trig_Night_elfrun_from_demon_Func003C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Apiv', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 60, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 15.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'esen', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_073), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 10 )
    if ( Trig_Night_elfrun_from_demon_Func008C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Apiv', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    else
    endif
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 60, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Night_elfrun_from_demon takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Night_elfrun_from_demon = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Night_elfrun_from_demon, 20.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Night_elfrun_from_demon, function Trig_Night_elfrun_from_demon_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Night elf place to run
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Night_elf_place_to_run_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'earc' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'esen' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Night_elf_place_to_run_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Night_elf_place_to_run_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Night_elf_place_to_run_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_074) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Night_elf_place_to_run takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Night_elf_place_to_run = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Night_elf_place_to_run, gg_rct_Region_073 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Night_elf_place_to_run, Condition( function Trig_Night_elf_place_to_run_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Night_elf_place_to_run, function Trig_Night_elf_place_to_run_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Demons kill elves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Demons_kill_elves_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'nbal' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Apiv', GetLastCreatedUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Demons_kill_elves_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Demons_kill_elves_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Demons_kill_elves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_nbal_0212, "attack", GetTriggerUnit() )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_nbal_0211, "attack", GetTriggerUnit() )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_nbal_0213, "attack", GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Demons_kill_elves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Demons_kill_elves = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Demons_kill_elves, gg_rct_Region_070 )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Demons_kill_elves, gg_rct_Region_071 )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Demons_kill_elves, gg_rct_Region_069 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Demons_kill_elves, Condition( function Trig_Demons_kill_elves_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Demons_kill_elves, function Trig_Demons_kill_elves_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Skull kill metamorph
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Skull_kill_metamorph_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SelectHeroSkill( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 'AEme' )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( gg_unit_Edem_0033, "metamorphosis" )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Skull_kill_metamorph takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Skull_kill_metamorph = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_Skull_kill_metamorph, gg_unit_nshr_0038, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Skull_kill_metamorph, function Trig_Skull_kill_metamorph_Actions )
endfunction

    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Avul', gg_unit_nshr_0038 )
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Colour
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Colour_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitColor( gg_unit_Edem_0033, PLAYER_COLOR_BLUE )
    call SetUnitColor( gg_unit_earc_0302, PLAYER_COLOR_BLUE )
    call SetUnitColor( gg_unit_earc_0301, PLAYER_COLOR_BLUE )
    call SetUnitColor( gg_unit_esen_0304, PLAYER_COLOR_BLUE )
    call SetUnitColor( gg_unit_edoc_0303, PLAYER_COLOR_BLUE )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Colour takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Colour = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Colour, function Trig_Colour_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Illidan strike back
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Illidan_strike_back_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_EnvironmentAttacking = GetAttacker()
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_Edem_0033, "attack", GetAttacker() )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( gg_unit_Edem_0033, UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(gg_unit_Edem_0033, 0) + 4 ) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( gg_unit_Edem_0033, ( GetUnitLifePercent(gg_unit_Edem_0033) + 1.00 ) )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Illidan_Attackig_heal )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Illidan_strike_back takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Illidan_strike_back = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_Illidan_strike_back, gg_unit_Edem_0033, EVENT_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Illidan_strike_back, function Trig_Illidan_strike_back_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Illidan Attackig heal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Illidan_Attackig_heal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( gg_unit_Edem_0033, ( GetUnitLifePercent(gg_unit_Edem_0033) + 1.00 ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Illidan_Attackig_heal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Illidan_Attackig_heal = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Illidan_Attackig_heal )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Illidan_Attackig_heal, 0.50 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Illidan_Attackig_heal, function Trig_Illidan_Attackig_heal_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Illidan Attackig again
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Illidan_Attackig_again_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_EnvironmentAttacking ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Illidan_Attackig_again_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Illidan_strike_back )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Illidan_Attackig_heal )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Illidan_Attackig_again takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Illidan_Attackig_again = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Illidan_Attackig_again, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Illidan_Attackig_again, Condition( function Trig_Illidan_Attackig_again_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Illidan_Attackig_again, function Trig_Illidan_Attackig_again_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Illidan Buff
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Illidan_Buff_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( gg_unit_Edem_0033, UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, 10.00 )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 600 )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 600.00 )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 2, false )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 65, 0 )
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 5.00 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Illidan_Buff takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Illidan_Buff = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Illidan_Buff, function Trig_Illidan_Buff_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: IllidanBoom Low
//===========================================================================
function Trig_IllidanBoom_Low_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) <= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) <= 150.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_IllidanBoom_Low_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "stomp" )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_IllidanBoom_Low takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_IllidanBoom_Low = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_IllidanBoom_Low, gg_unit_Edem_0033, EVENT_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_IllidanBoom_Low, Condition( function Trig_IllidanBoom_Low_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_IllidanBoom_Low, function Trig_IllidanBoom_Low_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Illidan Attacked by creeps Official
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Illidan_Attacked_by_creeps_Official_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nenc' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nsty' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nsat' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nsts' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nstl' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nsth' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nslm' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nbal' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nspr' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'nsgt' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Illidan_Attacked_by_creeps_Official_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Illidan_Attacked_by_creeps_Official_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Illidan_Attacked_by_creeps_Official_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_072) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Illidan_Attacked_by_creeps_Official takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Illidan_Attacked_by_creeps_Official = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Illidan_Attacked_by_creeps_Official, gg_rct_Region_072 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Illidan_Attacked_by_creeps_Official, Condition( function Trig_Illidan_Attacked_by_creeps_Official_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Illidan_Attacked_by_creeps_Official, function Trig_Illidan_Attacked_by_creeps_Official_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Creeps begin to appear
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Creeps_begin_to_appear_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_treant )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_doom_Guard )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 5, false )
    call SelectHeroSkill( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 'AEmb' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 'AEmb' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 'AEev' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 'AEmb' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 'AEev' )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 180.00 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_satyr )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 8, false )
    call SelectHeroSkill( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 'AEim' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 'AEim' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 'AEev' )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 180.00 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_Spider )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 10, false )
    call SelectHeroSkill( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 'AEim' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 'AEev' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 'AEmb' )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 180.00 )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_Spider )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_doom_Guard )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_treant )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_satyr )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 20.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_Edem_0033, "move", GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_nshr_0038) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 5.00 )
    call SetUnitAnimation( gg_unit_Edem_0033, "channel" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 5.00 )
    call SetUnitAnimation( gg_unit_Edem_0033, "channel" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 5.00 )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( gg_unit_Edem_0033, "stop" )
    call KillUnit( gg_unit_nshr_0038 )
    call PauseUnitBJ( false, gg_unit_Edem_0033 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_Spider )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_satyr )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_doom_Guard )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_treant )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( gg_unit_Edem_0033, UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 0, 5 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'AIcb', gg_unit_Edem_0033 )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( gg_unit_Edem_0033, 300 )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( gg_unit_Edem_0033, UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0, 300 )
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( gg_unit_Edem_0033, UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION, 15.00 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 120.00 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_Big_tree )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_Big_satyr )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'Utic', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_072), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 10, false )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'ANfd' )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 3000 )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 3000.00 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Apsh', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'ANrc' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AUcs' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AUcs' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AUcs' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AUav' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AUav' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AUav' )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 180.00 )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_Spider )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_doom_Guard )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_treant )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_Big_satyr )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_periodic_Big_tree )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'Emns', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_072), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 10, false )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AEer' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AEer' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AEer' )
    call SetUnitColor( GetLastCreatedUnit(), PLAYER_COLOR_CYAN )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_Edem_0033) )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'Etyr', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetUnitLoc(GetLastCreatedUnit()), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call SetUnitColor( GetLastCreatedUnit(), PLAYER_COLOR_CYAN )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 10, false )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AHfa' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AHfa' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AHfa' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AEar' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AEar' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AEar' )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "move", GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_Edem_0033) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 15.00 )
    call RemoveUnit( gg_unit_Edem_0033 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Creeps_begin_to_appear takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Creeps_begin_to_appear = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_Creeps_begin_to_appear, gg_unit_h028_0281, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Creeps_begin_to_appear, function Trig_Creeps_begin_to_appear_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: periodic treant
//===========================================================================

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'nenc', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Region_072), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 30.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_periodic_treant = CreateTrigger(  )

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Blind Wisps
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Blind_Wisps_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'ewsp' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blind_Wisps_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_RF_SIGHT_RADIUS, 0.00 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Blind_Wisps takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Blind_Wisps = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Blind_Wisps, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Blind_Wisps, Condition( function Trig_Blind_Wisps_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Blind_Wisps, function Trig_Blind_Wisps_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Wisps appearing
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Wisps_appearing_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 1000000000 )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER, 1000000000 )
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( gg_unit_ewsp_0027, "harvest", gg_dest_ATtr_0168 )
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( gg_unit_ewsp_0026, "harvest", gg_dest_ATtr_0167 )
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( gg_unit_ewsp_0029, "harvest", gg_dest_ATtr_0129 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 250.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'ewsp', Player(10), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1P1B2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "harvest", gg_dest_ATtr_0141 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'ewsp', Player(10), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1P2B1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "harvest", gg_dest_ATtr_0162 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 120.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'ewsp', Player(10), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_P3Building), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "harvest", gg_dest_ATtr_0011 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'ewsp', Player(10), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1P4B3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "harvest", gg_dest_ATtr_0108 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 120.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'ewsp', Player(10), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_P5Building), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "harvest", gg_dest_ATtr_0168 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'ewsp', Player(10), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_P3Building), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( GetLastCreatedUnit(), "harvest", gg_dest_ATtr_0162 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 120.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'ewsp', Player(10), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1P3B3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call IssueBuildOrderByIdLocBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'etrp', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1P4B2) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Wisps_appearing takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Wisps_appearing = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_Wisps_appearing, 1.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Wisps_appearing, function Trig_Wisps_appearing_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ghouls Harvest lumber
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ghouls_Harvest_lumber_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( gg_unit_ugho_0019, "harvest", gg_dest_ATtr_0200 )
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( gg_unit_ugho_0018, "harvest", gg_dest_ATtr_0201 )
    call IssueTargetDestructableOrder( gg_unit_ugho_0001, "harvest", gg_dest_ATtr_0204 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ghouls_Harvest_lumber takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ghouls_Harvest_lumber = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Ghouls_Harvest_lumber, function Trig_Ghouls_Harvest_lumber_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: tree Heal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_tree_Heal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetDestructableLifePercentBJ( gg_dest_ATtr_0200, 100 )
    call SetDestructableLifePercentBJ( gg_dest_ATtr_0201, 100 )
    call SetDestructableLifePercentBJ( gg_dest_ATtr_0204, 100 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_tree_Heal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_tree_Heal = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_tree_Heal, 30.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_tree_Heal, function Trig_tree_Heal_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Team1 Defeat
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Team1_Defeat_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDyingUnit() == udg_MainStructureT1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team1_Defeat_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Team1_Defeat_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Team1_Defeat_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Team1_Defeat_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Team1_Defeat_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), 0.00 )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), 2, 0 )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), 2, 1 )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) - ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) / 2 ) ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Team1_Defeat_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Overtime )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(GetPlayableMapRect(), Player(0)), function Trig_Team1_Defeat_Func002A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(GetPlayableMapRect(), Player(2)), function Trig_Team1_Defeat_Func003A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(GetPlayableMapRect(), Player(4)), function Trig_Team1_Defeat_Func004A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(GetPlayableMapRect(), Player(6)), function Trig_Team1_Defeat_Func005A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(GetPlayableMapRect(), Player(8)), function Trig_Team1_Defeat_Func006A )
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ( udg_timer_window_Turn_Timer )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Team1_Defeat takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Team1_Defeat = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Team1_Defeat, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Team1_Defeat, Condition( function Trig_Team1_Defeat_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Team1_Defeat, function Trig_Team1_Defeat_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Team2 Defeat
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Team2_Defeat_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetDyingUnit() == udg_MainStructureT2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team2_Defeat_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Team2_Defeat_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Team2_Defeat_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Team2_Defeat_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Team2_Defeat_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), 0.00 )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), 2, 0 )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), 2, 1 )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) - ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) / 2 ) ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Team2_Defeat_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Overtime )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(GetPlayableMapRect(), Player(1)), function Trig_Team2_Defeat_Func002A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(GetPlayableMapRect(), Player(3)), function Trig_Team2_Defeat_Func003A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(GetPlayableMapRect(), Player(5)), function Trig_Team2_Defeat_Func004A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(GetPlayableMapRect(), Player(7)), function Trig_Team2_Defeat_Func005A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(GetPlayableMapRect(), Player(9)), function Trig_Team2_Defeat_Func006A )
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ( udg_timer_window_Turn_Timer )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Team2_Defeat takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Team2_Defeat = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Team2_Defeat, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Team2_Defeat, Condition( function Trig_Team2_Defeat_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Team2_Defeat, function Trig_Team2_Defeat_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: OrcAiSave
//===========================================================================
function Trig_OrcAiSave_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h00N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OrcAiSave_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_OrcAiSave >= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OrcAiSave_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_OrcAiSave == 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OrcAiSave_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_OrcAiSave_Func001C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O019', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_OrcAiSave_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n023', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
    endif
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( ( udg_OrcAiSave / 2 ), 'o000', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_OrcAiSave = 0
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_OrcAiSave takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_OrcAiSave = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_OrcAiSave, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_OrcAiSave, Condition( function Trig_OrcAiSave_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_OrcAiSave, function Trig_OrcAiSave_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: OrcAiSaveGrow
//===========================================================================
function Trig_OrcAiSaveGrow_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_OrcAiSave < 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Waveorc1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OrcAiSaveGrow_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_OrcAiSaveGrow_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OrcAiSaveGrow_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_OrcAiSave = ( udg_OrcAiSave + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_OrcAiSaveGrow takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_OrcAiSaveGrow = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_OrcAiSaveGrow, 20.00 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_OrcAiSaveGrow, Condition( function Trig_OrcAiSaveGrow_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_OrcAiSaveGrow, function Trig_OrcAiSaveGrow_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Orc Mode ON2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Orc_Mode_ON2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerController(Player(3)) == MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Orc_Mode_ON2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Orc_Mode_ON2_Func001C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_3602" )
        call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_3601" )
        call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Orc_Watch_Towers_Spawn )
        call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Turn_OrcWavesOn )
        call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Waveorc4 )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Orc_Mode_ON2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Orc_Mode_ON2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Orc_Mode_ON2, function Trig_Orc_Mode_ON2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Orc Mode ON
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Orc_Mode_ON_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_1286" )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Orc_Watch_Towers_Spawn )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Turn_OrcWavesOn )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Waveorc4 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Orc_Mode_ON takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Orc_Mode_ON = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent( gg_trg_Orc_Mode_ON, Player(0), "orcon", true )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Orc_Mode_ON, function Trig_Orc_Mode_ON_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Orc Watch Towers Spawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Orc_Watch_Towers_Spawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_TMidT1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_TMidT2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Orc_Watch_Towers_Spawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Orc_Watch_Towers_Spawn = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Orc_Watch_Towers_Spawn )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Orc_Watch_Towers_Spawn, 180.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Orc_Watch_Towers_Spawn, function Trig_Orc_Watch_Towers_Spawn_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Turn OrcWavesOn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Turn_OrcWavesOn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Waveorc1 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 120.00 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Waveorc2 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_WaveorcProtect )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Waveorc3 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 400.00 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Waveorc5 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 200.00 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Waveorc6 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Turn_OrcWavesOn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Turn_OrcWavesOn = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Turn_OrcWavesOn )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Turn_OrcWavesOn, udg_TimerStart )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_Turn_OrcWavesOn, gg_unit_h028_0281, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Turn_OrcWavesOn, function Trig_Turn_OrcWavesOn_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Waveorc1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Waveorc1_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Waveorc1_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Waveorc1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Waveorc1_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o000', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o005', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        if ( Trig_Waveorc1_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'o000', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o005', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        else
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'o005', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o000', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Waveorc1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Waveorc1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Waveorc1 )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Waveorc1, 80.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Waveorc1, function Trig_Waveorc1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: WaveorcProtect
//===========================================================================
function Trig_WaveorcProtect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o01K', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Mine1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o01K', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Mine2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o01K', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Mine3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o01K', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Mine4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_WaveorcProtect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_WaveorcProtect = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_WaveorcProtect )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_WaveorcProtect, 100.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_WaveorcProtect, function Trig_WaveorcProtect_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Waveorc2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Waveorc2_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Waveorc2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Waveorc2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Waveorc2_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01I', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o005', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        if ( Trig_Waveorc2_Func002Func003C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01I', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        else
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o000', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o01I', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Waveorc2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Waveorc2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Waveorc2 )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Waveorc2, 90.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Waveorc2, function Trig_Waveorc2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Waveorc3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Waveorc3_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Waveorc3_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Waveorc3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Waveorc3_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o017', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 6, 'o000', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        if ( Trig_Waveorc3_Func002Func003C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o017', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o01J', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'o00M', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        else
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o01J', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O01A', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o01I', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Waveorc3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Waveorc3 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Waveorc3 )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Waveorc3, 105.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Waveorc3, function Trig_Waveorc3_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Waveorc4
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Waveorc4_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Waveorc4_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Waveorc4_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Waveorc4_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O01A', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01I', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        if ( Trig_Waveorc4_Func002Func003C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O01A', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o000', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o01I', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        else
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o000', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o01I', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Waveorc4 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Waveorc4 )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Waveorc4, 95.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Waveorc4, function Trig_Waveorc4_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Waveorc5
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Waveorc5_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Waveorc5_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Waveorc5_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Waveorc5_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'o00M', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'n023', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00F', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2_Front), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        if ( Trig_Waveorc5_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n023', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o000', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'o01I', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00F', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2_Front), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        else
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n023', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 7, 'o01I', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00F', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2_Front), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Waveorc5 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Waveorc5 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Waveorc5 )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Waveorc5, 100.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Waveorc5, function Trig_Waveorc5_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Waveorc6
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Waveorc6_Func002Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Waveorc6_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Waveorc6_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Waveorc6_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 8, 'o01I', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        if ( Trig_Waveorc6_Func002Func006C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 5, 'o000', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O019', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O01A', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00F', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        else
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 7, 'o01J', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 7, 'o017', Player(3), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Waveorc6 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Waveorc6 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Waveorc6 )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Waveorc6, 140.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Waveorc6, function Trig_Waveorc6_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Player Nr
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Player_Nr_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_PlayerNr = ( udg_PlayerNr + 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Player_Nr_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_PlayerNr = ( udg_PlayerNr + 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Player_Nr_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayerNr >= 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Player_Nr_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAllies(Player(0)), function Trig_Player_Nr_Func002A )
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAllies(Player(1)), function Trig_Player_Nr_Func003A )
    set udg_PlayerNr = ( udg_PlayerNr - 3 )
    if ( Trig_Player_Nr_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_AvalPlayer = 1
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Player_Nr takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Player_Nr = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_Player_Nr, 0.50 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Player_Nr, function Trig_Player_Nr_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hiding Stuff
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hiding_Stuff_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ShowUnitHide( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Hiding_Stuff_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ShowUnitHide( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Hiding_Stuff_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ShowUnitHide( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Hiding_Stuff_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ShowUnitHide( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Hiding_Stuff_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 100.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Hiding_Stuff_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A087', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Hiding_Stuff_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 1.00 )
    call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100, 100, 100, 40.00 )
    call ShowUnitHide( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Hiding_Stuff_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('ncop'), function Trig_Hiding_Stuff_Func001A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h02J'), function Trig_Hiding_Stuff_Func002A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h024'), function Trig_Hiding_Stuff_Func003A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h022'), function Trig_Hiding_Stuff_Func004A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('n026'), function Trig_Hiding_Stuff_Func005A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Hiding_Stuff_Func006001002)), function Trig_Hiding_Stuff_Func006A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hiding_Stuff takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hiding_Stuff = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Hiding_Stuff, function Trig_Hiding_Stuff_Actions )
endfunction

    set udg_P4Building = gg_unit_h084_0030
    set udg_P5Building = gg_unit_h084_0015
    set udg_P6Building = gg_unit_h084_0031
    set udg_P7Building = gg_unit_h084_0024
    set udg_P8Building = gg_unit_h084_0032

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gold Mine attack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gold_Mine_attack_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 'h00N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Mine_attack_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) + 1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_Mine_attack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAllies(GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())), function Trig_Gold_Mine_attack_Func001A )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gold_Mine_attack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gold_Mine_attack = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Gold_Mine_attack, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Gold_Mine_attack, Condition( function Trig_Gold_Mine_attack_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Gold_Mine_attack, function Trig_Gold_Mine_attack_Actions )
endfunction

//
// Default melee game initialization for all players

    call MeleeStartingVisibility(  )
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Melee_Initialization, function Trig_Melee_Initialization_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Turn and gold inc
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Turn_and_gold_inc_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DestroyTextTagBJ( udg_TurnCounterFT )
    call DestroyTextTagBJ( udg_GoldCounterFT )
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ( "TRIGSTR_3722", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_016), 0, 20.00, 100, 100, 100, 0 )
    set udg_TurnCounter = ( udg_TurnCounter + 1 )
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ( I2S(udg_TurnCounter), GetRectCenter(GetPlayableMapRect()), 0, 20.00, 100, 100, 100, 0 )
    set udg_TurnCounterFT = GetLastCreatedTextTag()
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ( "TRIGSTR_3723", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_017), 0, 20.00, 100, 100, 100, 0 )
    call CreateTextTagLocBJ( I2S(udg_P1Gold), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_018), 0, 20.00, 100, 100, 100, 0 )
    set udg_GoldCounterFT = GetLastCreatedTextTag()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Turn_and_gold_inc takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Turn_and_gold_inc = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Turn_and_gold_inc, udg_TurnTimer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Turn_and_gold_inc, function Trig_Turn_and_gold_inc_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Random Hints
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 12 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 11 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 9 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Random_Hints_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Random_Hints_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 12)
    if ( Trig_Random_Hints_Func002C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_3587" )
    else
        if ( Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002C() ) then
            call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_3588" )
        else
            if ( Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_3591" )
            else
                if ( Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_3592" )
                else
                    if ( Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_3593" )
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_3594" )
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_3595" )
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_3596" )
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                        call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_3597" )
                                    else
                                        if ( Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                            call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_3598" )
                                        else
                                            if ( Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_3599" )
                                            else
                                                if ( Trig_Random_Hints_Func002Func002Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                                    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_3600" )
                                                else
                                                endif
                                            endif
                                        endif
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Random_Hints takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Random_Hints = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Random_Hints, 120.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Random_Hints, function Trig_Random_Hints_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hints
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hints_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_746" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_1301" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_1299" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 3.00 )
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_761" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 190.00 )
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_1300" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 5.00 )
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_ALWAYSHINT, "TRIGSTR_747" )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hints takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hints = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_Hints, 5 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Hints, function Trig_Hints_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Building decay P1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Building_decay_P1_Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(8) )
endfunction

function Trig_Building_decay_P1_Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01L', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Building_decay_P1_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Building_decay_P1_Func001001002001(), Trig_Building_decay_P1_Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Building_decay_P1_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_StrDecayP1 = ( udg_StrDecayP1 + 2.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Building_decay_P1_Func002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(8) )
endfunction

function Trig_Building_decay_P1_Func002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01L', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Building_decay_P1_Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Building_decay_P1_Func002001002001(), Trig_Building_decay_P1_Func002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Building_decay_P1_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit()) - udg_StrDecayP1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Building_decay_P1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Building_decay_P1_Func001001002)), function Trig_Building_decay_P1_Func001A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Building_decay_P1_Func002001002)), function Trig_Building_decay_P1_Func002A )
    set udg_StrDecayP1 = 0.00
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Building_decay_P1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Building_decay_P1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Building_decay_P1, 30.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Building_decay_P1, function Trig_Building_decay_P1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(9) )
endfunction

function Trig_Building_decay_P2_Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01L', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Building_decay_P2_Func001001002001(), Trig_Building_decay_P2_Func001001002002() )
endfunction

endfunction

    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(9) )
endfunction

    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01L', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Building_decay_P2_Func002001002001(), Trig_Building_decay_P2_Func002001002002() )
endfunction

    set udg_StrDecayP1 = 0.00
endfunction
