//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DefendingDecay
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DefendingDecay_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A001', GetFilterUnit()) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_DefendingDecay_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A07Z', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendingDecay_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_DefendingDecay_Func001Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit()) - 40.00 ) )
    else
        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit()) - 20.00 ) )
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_DefendingDecay_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_DefendingDecay_Func001001002)), function Trig_DefendingDecay_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DefendingDecay takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DefendingDecay = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_DefendingDecay, 30.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_DefendingDecay, function Trig_DefendingDecay_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Overtimestart
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Overtimestart_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Overtime )
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce( GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_2603" )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Overtimestart takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Overtimestart = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Overtimestart, udg_timer_Overtime )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Overtimestart, function Trig_Overtimestart_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Overtime
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Overtime_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit()) - 10.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Overtime_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect()), function Trig_Overtime_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Overtime takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Overtime = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Overtime )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Overtime, 10.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Overtime, function Trig_Overtime_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Newtral is neutral
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Newtral_is_neutral_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), Player(10), bj_ALLIANCE_NEUTRAL )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), bj_ALLIANCE_NEUTRAL )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(10), GetEnumPlayer(), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), GetEnumPlayer(), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
endfunction

function Trig_Newtral_is_neutral_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Newtral_is_neutral_Func001A )
    call SetPlayerColorBJ( Player(10), ConvertPlayerColor(24), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(10), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), Player(10), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Newtral_is_neutral takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Newtral_is_neutral = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Newtral_is_neutral, function Trig_Newtral_is_neutral_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Neutral is not buffable
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Neutral_is_not_buffable_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01M', GetEnumUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_SIGHT_RADIUS, 0.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Neutral_is_not_buffable_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(10)), function Trig_Neutral_is_not_buffable_Func002A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Neutral_is_not_buffable takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Neutral_is_not_buffable = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_Neutral_is_not_buffable, 1.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Neutral_is_not_buffable, function Trig_Neutral_is_not_buffable_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Team1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Team1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09I', GetTriggerUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team1_Func002Func003Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team1_Func002Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team1_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team1_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Team1_Func002C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00Z', GetTriggerUnit() )
        call SetUnitOwner( GetTriggerUnit(), Player(8), false )
    else
        if ( Trig_Team1_Func002Func003C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00W', GetTriggerUnit() )
            call SetUnitOwner( GetTriggerUnit(), Player(8), false )
        else
            if ( Trig_Team1_Func002Func003Func003C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00Y', GetTriggerUnit() )
                call SetUnitOwner( GetTriggerUnit(), Player(8), false )
            else
                if ( Trig_Team1_Func002Func003Func003Func004C() ) then
                    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00U', GetTriggerUnit() )
                    call SetUnitOwner( GetTriggerUnit(), Player(8), false )
                else
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Team1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Team1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Team1, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Team1, Condition( function Trig_Team1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Team1, function Trig_Team1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Team2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Team2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09I', GetTriggerUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team2_Func002Func003Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team2_Func002Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team2_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Team2_Func002C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A010', GetTriggerUnit() )
        call SetUnitOwner( GetTriggerUnit(), Player(9), false )
    else
        if ( Trig_Team2_Func002Func003C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00X', GetTriggerUnit() )
            call SetUnitOwner( GetTriggerUnit(), Player(9), false )
        else
            if ( Trig_Team2_Func002Func003Func003C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00T', GetTriggerUnit() )
                call SetUnitOwner( GetTriggerUnit(), Player(9), false )
            else
                if ( Trig_Team2_Func002Func003Func003Func004C() ) then
                    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00V', GetTriggerUnit() )
                    call SetUnitOwner( GetTriggerUnit(), Player(9), false )
                else
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Team2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Team2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Team2, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Team2, Condition( function Trig_Team2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Team2, function Trig_Team2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: T1 Player Number
//===========================================================================
function Trig_T1_Player_Number_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_T1Players = ( udg_T1Players + 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_T1_Player_Number_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAllies(Player(0)), function Trig_T1_Player_Number_Func002A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_T1_Player_Number takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_T1_Player_Number = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_T1_Player_Number, function Trig_T1_Player_Number_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: T2 Player Number
//===========================================================================
function Trig_T2_Player_Number_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_T2Players = ( udg_T2Players + 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_T2_Player_Number_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAllies(Player(0)), function Trig_T2_Player_Number_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_T2_Player_Number = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_T2_Player_Number, function Trig_T2_Player_Number_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: No Player Leaving
//===========================================================================
function Trig_No_Player_Leaving_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_P1RGold = udg_P1Gold
    set udg_P2RGold = udg_P2Gold
    set udg_P3RGold = udg_P3Gold
    set udg_P4RGold = udg_P4Gold
    set udg_P5RGold = udg_P5Gold
    set udg_P6RGold = udg_P6Gold
    set udg_P7RGold = udg_P7Gold
    set udg_P8RGold = udg_P8Gold
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_No_Player_Leaving takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_No_Player_Leaving = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_No_Player_Leaving, udg_TurnTimer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_No_Player_Leaving, function Trig_No_Player_Leaving_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Players Leaving
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Players_Leaving_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(0)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_LEFT ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Players_Leaving_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(1)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_LEFT ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Players_Leaving_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(2)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_LEFT ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Players_Leaving_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(3)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_LEFT ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Players_Leaving_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(4)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_LEFT ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Players_Leaving_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(5)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_LEFT ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Players_Leaving_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(6)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_LEFT ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Players_Leaving_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(Player(7)) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_LEFT ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Players_Leaving_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Players_Leaving_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_P3RGold = ( udg_P3Gold + ( udg_P1Gold / ( udg_T1Players - 1 ) ) )
        set udg_P5RGold = ( udg_P5RGold + ( udg_P1Gold / ( udg_T1Players - 1 ) ) )
        set udg_P7RGold = ( udg_P7RGold + ( udg_P1Gold / ( udg_T1Players - 1 ) ) )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Players_Leaving_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_P4RGold = ( udg_P4Gold + ( udg_P2Gold / ( udg_T2Players - 1 ) ) )
        set udg_P6RGold = ( udg_P6RGold + ( udg_P2Gold / ( udg_T2Players - 1 ) ) )
        set udg_P8RGold = ( udg_P8RGold + ( udg_P2Gold / ( udg_T2Players - 1 ) ) )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Players_Leaving_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_P1RGold = ( udg_P1Gold + ( udg_P3Gold / ( udg_T1Players - 1 ) ) )
        set udg_P5RGold = ( udg_P5RGold + ( udg_P3Gold / ( udg_T1Players - 1 ) ) )
        set udg_P7RGold = ( udg_P7RGold + ( udg_P3Gold / ( udg_T1Players - 1 ) ) )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Players_Leaving_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_P2RGold = ( udg_P2Gold + ( udg_P4Gold / ( udg_T2Players - 1 ) ) )
        set udg_P6RGold = ( udg_P6RGold + ( udg_P4Gold / ( udg_T2Players - 1 ) ) )
        set udg_P8RGold = ( udg_P8RGold + ( udg_P4Gold / ( udg_T2Players - 1 ) ) )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Players_Leaving_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_P1RGold = ( udg_P1RGold + ( udg_P5Gold / ( udg_T1Players - 1 ) ) )
        set udg_P3RGold = ( udg_P3RGold + ( udg_P5Gold / ( udg_T1Players - 1 ) ) )
        set udg_P7RGold = ( udg_P7RGold + ( udg_P5Gold / ( udg_T1Players - 1 ) ) )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Players_Leaving_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_P2RGold = ( udg_P2RGold + ( udg_P6Gold / ( udg_T2Players - 1 ) ) )
        set udg_P4RGold = ( udg_P4RGold + ( udg_P6Gold / ( udg_T2Players - 1 ) ) )
        set udg_P8RGold = ( udg_P8RGold + ( udg_P6Gold / ( udg_T2Players - 1 ) ) )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Players_Leaving_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_P1RGold = ( udg_P1RGold + ( udg_P7Gold / ( udg_T1Players - 1 ) ) )
        set udg_P3RGold = ( udg_P3RGold + ( udg_P7Gold / ( udg_T1Players - 1 ) ) )
        set udg_P5RGold = ( udg_P5RGold + ( udg_P7Gold / ( udg_T1Players - 1 ) ) )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Players_Leaving_Func009C() ) then
        set udg_P2RGold = ( udg_P2RGold + ( udg_P8Gold / ( udg_T2Players - 1 ) ) )
        set udg_P4RGold = ( udg_P4RGold + ( udg_P8Gold / ( udg_T2Players - 1 ) ) )
        set udg_P6RGold = ( udg_P6RGold + ( udg_P8Gold / ( udg_T2Players - 1 ) ) )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Players_Leaving takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Players_Leaving = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Players_Leaving, udg_TurnTimer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Players_Leaving, function Trig_Players_Leaving_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: PfromT1Leaves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_PfromT1Leaves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_FAILED, "TRIGSTR_1600" )
    set udg_T1GoldCap = ( udg_T1GoldCap + 15 )
    set udg_T1Players = ( udg_T1Players - 1 )
    set udg_AvalPlayer = ( udg_AvalPlayer + 1 )
    set udg_CardGettingLeaversP1 = ( udg_CardGettingLeaversP1 + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_PfromT1Leaves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_PfromT1Leaves = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave( gg_trg_PfromT1Leaves, Player(0) )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave( gg_trg_PfromT1Leaves, Player(2) )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave( gg_trg_PfromT1Leaves, Player(4) )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave( gg_trg_PfromT1Leaves, Player(6) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_PfromT1Leaves, function Trig_PfromT1Leaves_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: PfromT2Leaves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_PfromT2Leaves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_FAILED, "TRIGSTR_1601" )
    set udg_T2GoldCap = ( udg_T2GoldCap + 15 )
    set udg_T2Players = ( udg_T2Players - 1 )
    set udg_AvalPlayer = ( udg_AvalPlayer + 1 )
    set udg_CardGettingLeaversP2 = ( udg_CardGettingLeaversP2 + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_PfromT2Leaves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_PfromT2Leaves = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave( gg_trg_PfromT2Leaves, Player(1) )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave( gg_trg_PfromT2Leaves, Player(3) )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave( gg_trg_PfromT2Leaves, Player(5) )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave( gg_trg_PfromT2Leaves, Player(7) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_PfromT2Leaves, function Trig_PfromT2Leaves_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Initial Gold Cap
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Initial_Gold_Cap_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_T1GoldCap = 15
    set udg_T2GoldCap = 15
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Initial_Gold_Cap takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Initial_Gold_Cap = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Initial_Gold_Cap, function Trig_Initial_Gold_Cap_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gold cap P1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gold_cap_P1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(Player(0), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) >= udg_T1GoldCap ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gold_cap_P1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(0), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, udg_T1GoldCap )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gold_cap_P1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gold_cap_P1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerStateEvent( gg_trg_Gold_cap_P1, Player(0), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, GREATER_THAN, 15.00 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Gold_cap_P1, Condition( function Trig_Gold_cap_P1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Gold_cap_P1, function Trig_Gold_cap_P1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gold cap P2
//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(Player(1), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) >= udg_T2GoldCap ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(1), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, udg_T2GoldCap )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Punish GoldT1 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Punish_GoldT1_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(udg_MainStructureT1) <= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Punish_GoldT1_1_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) + 1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Punish_GoldT1_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAllies(Player(0)), function Trig_Punish_GoldT1_1_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Punish_GoldT1_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Punish_GoldT1_1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Punish_GoldT1_1, 30.00 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Punish_GoldT1_1, Condition( function Trig_Punish_GoldT1_1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Punish_GoldT1_1, function Trig_Punish_GoldT1_1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Punish GoldT2 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Punish_GoldT2_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(udg_MainStructureT2) <= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Punish_GoldT2_1_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) + 1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Punish_GoldT2_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAllies(Player(1)), function Trig_Punish_GoldT2_1_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Punish_GoldT2_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Punish_GoldT2_1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Punish_GoldT2_1, 30.00 )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Punish_GoldT2_1, Condition( function Trig_Punish_GoldT2_1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Punish_GoldT2_1, function Trig_Punish_GoldT2_1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gold Effect
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gold_Effect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1_Front), "UI\\Feedback\\GoldCredit\\GoldCredit.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2_Front), "UI\\Feedback\\GoldCredit\\GoldCredit.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gold_Effect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gold_Effect = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Gold_Effect, udg_TurnTimer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Gold_Effect, function Trig_Gold_Effect_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Turn Gold on classic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Turn_Gold_on_classic_Func001Func002Func003Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_integer_Income_Increase == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Turn_Gold_on_classic_Func001Func002Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_integer_Income_Increase == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Turn_Gold_on_classic_Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_integer_Income_Increase == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Turn_Gold_on_classic_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_integer_Income_Increase == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Turn_Gold_on_classic_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_integer_Income_Increase == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Turn_Gold_on_classic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Turn_Gold_on_classic_Func001C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Gain )
        set udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[0] = 2.00
        set udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[1] = 35.00
        set udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[2] = 70.00
        set udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[3] = 80.00
        set udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[4] = 95.00
        set udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[5] = 100.00
        set udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[6] = 110.00
        set udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[7] = 120.00
        set udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[8] = 130.00
        set udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[9] = 140.00
        set udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[10] = 150.00
        set udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[11] = 160.00
        set udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[12] = 170.00
        set udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[13] = 180.00
        set udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[14] = 190.00
    else
        set udg_integer[0] = udg_integer_Income_Increase
        if ( Trig_Turn_Gold_on_classic_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_3814" )
        else
            call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, ( "|cffffff00Gold income|r raised to " + ( I2S(udg_integer_Income_Increase) + "." ) ) )
            if ( Trig_Turn_Gold_on_classic_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
            else
                if ( Trig_Turn_Gold_on_classic_Func001Func002Func003Func001C() ) then
                else
                    if ( Trig_Turn_Gold_on_classic_Func001Func002Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call StartTimerBJ( udg_timer_Income_Increase, false, udg_real_Income_Timer_Lengths[udg_integer_Income_Increase] )
    set udg_P1Gold = udg_integer[0]
    set udg_P2Gold = udg_integer[0]
    set udg_P3Gold = udg_integer[0]
    set udg_P4Gold = udg_integer[0]
    set udg_P5Gold = udg_integer[0]
    set udg_P6Gold = udg_integer[0]
    set udg_P7Gold = udg_integer[0]
    set udg_P8Gold = udg_integer[0]
    set udg_integer_Income_Increase = ( udg_integer_Income_Increase + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Turn_Gold_on_classic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Turn_Gold_on_classic = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Turn_Gold_on_classic, udg_TimerStart )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Turn_Gold_on_classic, udg_timer_Income_Increase )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Turn_Gold_on_classic, function Trig_Turn_Gold_on_classic_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Turn Gold on less
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Turn_Gold_on_less_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Gain )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Overtimestart )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2.00 )
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_2780" )
    set udg_P1Gold = 1
    set udg_P2Gold = 1
    set udg_P3Gold = 1
    set udg_P4Gold = 1
    set udg_P5Gold = 1
    set udg_P6Gold = 1
    set udg_P7Gold = 1
    set udg_P8Gold = 1
    call TriggerSleepAction( 40.00 )
    set udg_P1Gold = 2
    set udg_P2Gold = 2
    set udg_P3Gold = 2
    set udg_P4Gold = 2
    set udg_P5Gold = 2
    set udg_P6Gold = 2
    set udg_P7Gold = 2
    set udg_P8Gold = 2
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_2746" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 80.00 )
    set udg_P1Gold = 3
    set udg_P2Gold = 3
    set udg_P3Gold = 3
    set udg_P4Gold = 3
    set udg_P5Gold = 3
    set udg_P6Gold = 3
    set udg_P7Gold = 3
    set udg_P8Gold = 3
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_2747" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 120.00 )
    set udg_P1Gold = 4
    set udg_P2Gold = 4
    set udg_P3Gold = 4
    set udg_P4Gold = 4
    set udg_P5Gold = 4
    set udg_P6Gold = 4
    set udg_P7Gold = 4
    set udg_P8Gold = 4
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_2748" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 160.00 )
    set udg_P1Gold = 5
    set udg_P2Gold = 5
    set udg_P3Gold = 5
    set udg_P4Gold = 5
    set udg_P5Gold = 5
    set udg_P6Gold = 5
    set udg_P7Gold = 5
    set udg_P8Gold = 5
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_2749" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 200.00 )
    set udg_P1Gold = 6
    set udg_P2Gold = 6
    set udg_P3Gold = 6
    set udg_P4Gold = 6
    set udg_P5Gold = 6
    set udg_P6Gold = 6
    set udg_P7Gold = 6
    set udg_P8Gold = 6
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_2750" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 210.00 )
    set udg_P1Gold = 7
    set udg_P2Gold = 7

    set udg_P4Gold = 7
    set udg_P5Gold = 7
    set udg_P6Gold = 7
    set udg_P7Gold = 7
    set udg_P8Gold = 7
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_2751" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 220.00 )
    set udg_P1Gold = 8
    set udg_P2Gold = 8
    set udg_P3Gold = 8
    set udg_P4Gold = 8
    set udg_P5Gold = 8
    set udg_P6Gold = 8
    set udg_P7Gold = 8
    set udg_P8Gold = 8
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_2752" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 230.00 )
    set udg_P1Gold = 9

    set udg_P1Gold = 10

    set udg_P8Gold = 10

    set udg_P1Gold = 11
    set udg_P2Gold = 11

    set udg_P1Gold = 13
    set udg_P2Gold = 13
    set udg_P3Gold = 13
    set udg_P4Gold = 13
    set udg_P5Gold = 13
    set udg_P6Gold = 13
    set udg_P7Gold = 13
    set udg_P8Gold = 13
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_2757" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 280.00 )
    set udg_P1Gold = 14
    set udg_P2Gold = 14
    set udg_P3Gold = 14
    set udg_P4Gold = 14
    set udg_P5Gold = 14
    set udg_P6Gold = 14
    set udg_P7Gold = 14
    set udg_P8Gold = 14
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_2758" )

    set udg_P2Gold = 15
    set udg_P3Gold = 15
    set udg_P4Gold = 15
    set udg_P5Gold = 15
    set udg_P6Gold = 15
    set udg_P7Gold = 15
    set udg_P8Gold = 15
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_2759" )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Overtime )
endfunction

function Trig_Turn_Gold_on_more_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Gain )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2.00 )
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_2781" )
    set udg_P1Gold = 2
    set udg_P2Gold = 2
    set udg_P3Gold = 2
    set udg_P4Gold = 2
    set udg_P5Gold = 2
    set udg_P6Gold = 2
    set udg_P7Gold = 2
    set udg_P8Gold = 2
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    set udg_P1Gold = 3
    set udg_P2Gold = 3
    set udg_P3Gold = 3
    set udg_P4Gold = 3
    set udg_P5Gold = 3
    set udg_P6Gold = 3
    set udg_P7Gold = 3
    set udg_P8Gold = 3
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_2733" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 40.00 )
    set udg_P1Gold = 4
    set udg_P2Gold = 4
    set udg_P3Gold = 4
    set udg_P4Gold = 4
    set udg_P5Gold = 4
    set udg_P6Gold = 4
    set udg_P7Gold = 4
    set udg_P8Gold = 4
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_2734" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 50.00 )
    set udg_P1Gold = 5
    set udg_P2Gold = 5
    set udg_P3Gold = 5
    set udg_P4Gold = 5
    set udg_P5Gold = 5
    set udg_P6Gold = 5
    set udg_P7Gold = 5
    set udg_P8Gold = 5
    call QuestMessageBJ( GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_2735" )

    set gg_trg_Turn_Gold_on_more = CreateTrigger(  )

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Starting gold
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Starting_gold_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Starting_gold_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Starting_gold_Func002A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Starting_gold takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Starting_gold = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Starting_gold, function Trig_Starting_gold_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gain
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gain_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(0), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(Player(0), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) + udg_P1RGold ) )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(1), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(Player(1), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) + udg_P2RGold ) )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(2), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(Player(2), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) + udg_P3RGold ) )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(3), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(Player(3), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) + udg_P4RGold ) )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(4), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(Player(4), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) + udg_P5RGold ) )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(5), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(Player(5), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) + udg_P6RGold ) )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) + udg_P7RGold ) )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) + udg_P8RGold ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gain takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gain = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Gain )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Gain, udg_TurnTimer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Gain, function Trig_Gain_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Defensive abilities
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Defensive_abilities_Func001Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AEah', GetEnumUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHad', GetEnumUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08C', GetEnumUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Arsk', GetEnumUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ACrk', GetEnumUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AJ', GetEnumUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOwk', GetEnumUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AEev', GetEnumUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ACev', GetEnumUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Adef', GetEnumUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ACrn', GetEnumUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Defensive_abilities_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Defensive_abilities_Func001Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defensive_abilities_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Defensive_abilities_Func001Func001C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AR', GetEnumUnit() )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Defensive_abilities_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect()), function Trig_Defensive_abilities_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Defensive_abilities takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Defensive_abilities = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Defensive_abilities, 2 )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Defensive_abilities, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Defensive_abilities, function Trig_Defensive_abilities_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: OuoetT1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_OuoetT1_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == udg_FarstriderUnitTypeT1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OuoetT1_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_OuoetT1_Func004Func001C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple( GetEnumUnit(), udg_NeFarstriderGroupT1 )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_OuoetT1_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_NeFarstriderGroupT1) != 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OuoetT1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_FarstriderUnitT1 = GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_NeFarstriderGroupT1)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( udg_FarstriderUnitT1, udg_FarstriderGroupT1 )
    set udg_FarstriderUnitTypeT1 = GetUnitTypeId(udg_FarstriderUnitT1)
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_NeFarstriderGroupT1, function Trig_OuoetT1_Func004A )
    if ( Trig_OuoetT1_Func005C() ) then
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    else
         call DestroyGroup(udg_NeFarstriderGroupT1)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_OuoetT1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_OuoetT1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_OuoetT1, function Trig_OuoetT1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: OuoetT2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_OuoetT2_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == udg_FarstriderUnitTypeT2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OuoetT2_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_OuoetT2_Func004Func001C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple( GetEnumUnit(), udg_NeFarstriderGroupT2 )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_OuoetT2_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_NeFarstriderGroupT2) != 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_OuoetT2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_FarstriderUnitT2 = GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_NeFarstriderGroupT2)
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( udg_FarstriderUnitT2, udg_FarstriderGroupT2 )
    set udg_FarstriderUnitTypeT2 = GetUnitTypeId(udg_FarstriderUnitT2)
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_NeFarstriderGroupT2, function Trig_OuoetT2_Func004A )
    if ( Trig_OuoetT2_Func005C() ) then
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
    else
         call DestroyGroup(udg_NeFarstriderGroupT2)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_OuoetT2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_OuoetT2, function Trig_OuoetT2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unit Defend2 then attack T1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T1_Func006Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T1_Func006Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T1_Func006Func002Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T1_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A003', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T1_Func006Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T1_Func006C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A003', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T1, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T1, Condition( function Trig_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T1, function Trig_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unit Defend2 then attack T2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T2_Func006Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Unit_Defend2_then_attack_T2_Func006Func002C() ) then

    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetTriggerUnit() )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Keep Attacking
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Keep_Attacking_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A000', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Keep_Attacking_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "stop" )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Keep_Attacking takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Keep_Attacking = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Keep_Attacking, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Keep_Attacking, Condition( function Trig_Keep_Attacking_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Keep_Attacking, function Trig_Keep_Attacking_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unit ReAttackT1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unit_ReAttackT1_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A000', GetFilterUnit()) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_ReAttackT1_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetEnumUnit()) == String2OrderIdBJ("stand down") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_ReAttackT1_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Unit_ReAttackT1_Func001Func001C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn) )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_ReAttackT1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Unit_ReAttackT1_Func001001002)), function Trig_Unit_ReAttackT1_Func001A )
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Unit_ReAttackT1, function Trig_Unit_ReAttackT1_Actions )
endfunction

        return false

    return true

function Trig_Unit_ReDefendT1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    if ( Trig_Unit_ReDefendT1_Func002C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        if ( Trig_Unit_ReDefendT1_Func002Func002C() ) then
            call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
            if ( Trig_Unit_ReDefendT1_Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
                if ( Trig_Unit_ReDefendT1_Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1D1) )
                    call TriggerSleepAction( 10.00 )
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "patrol", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1D2) )
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unit_ReDefendT1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unit_ReDefendT1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Unit_ReDefendT1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ISSUED_ORDER )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Unit_ReDefendT1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Unit_ReDefendT1, Condition( function Trig_Unit_ReDefendT1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Unit_ReDefendT1, function Trig_Unit_ReDefendT1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unit Defend Down to UpT1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unit_Defend_Down_to_UpT1_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A003', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AL', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A001', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00N', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

        return true

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif

        return true

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A001', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00N', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_ReDefendT2_Func002Func003Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_ReDefendT2_Func002Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_Unit_ReDefendT2_Func002Func003Func003Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_ReDefendT2_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetTriggerUnit()) == String2OrderIdBJ("stand down") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Unit_ReDefendT2_Func002Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Unit_ReDefendT2_Func002Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_ReDefendT2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Unit_ReDefendT2_Func002Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_ReDefendT2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    if ( Trig_Unit_ReDefendT2_Func002C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        if ( Trig_Unit_ReDefendT2_Func002Func002C() ) then
            call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
            if ( Trig_Unit_ReDefendT2_Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
                if ( Trig_Unit_ReDefendT2_Func002Func002Func002Func002C() ) then
                    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2D1) )
                    call TriggerSleepAction( 10.00 )
                    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "patrol", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2D2) )
                else
                endif
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unit_ReDefendT2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unit_ReDefendT2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Unit_ReDefendT2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ISSUED_ORDER )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Unit_ReDefendT2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Unit_ReDefendT2, Condition( function Trig_Unit_ReDefendT2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Unit_ReDefendT2, function Trig_Unit_ReDefendT2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Leaving UnitT1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Leaving_UnitT1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A015', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Leaving_UnitT1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportTarget.mdl" )
    call RemoveUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Leaving_UnitT1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Leaving_UnitT1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Leaving_UnitT1, gg_rct_T1Spawn )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Leaving_UnitT1, Condition( function Trig_Leaving_UnitT1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Leaving_UnitT1, function Trig_Leaving_UnitT1_Actions )
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Aeye', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( Trig_T1SentryWardFront1_Func001C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "evileye", GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    else
    endif
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_T1SentryWardFront2_true, gg_rct_T2_Front )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_T1SentryWardFront2_true, Condition( function Trig_T1SentryWardFront2_true_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_T1SentryWardFront2_true, function Trig_T1SentryWardFront2_true_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Stasis Trap
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Stasis_Trap_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Asta', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) >= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stasis_Trap_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Stasis_Trap_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stasis_Trap_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "stasistrap", GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Stasis_Trap takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Stasis_Trap = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Stasis_Trap, gg_rct_T1_Front )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Stasis_Trap, gg_rct_T1_Enterence )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Stasis_Trap, gg_rct_Middle )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Stasis_Trap, gg_rct_T2_Enterence )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Stasis_Trap, gg_rct_T2_Front )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Stasis_Trap, Condition( function Trig_Stasis_Trap_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Stasis_Trap, function Trig_Stasis_Trap_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Retreating after midT1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Retreating_after_midT1_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01U', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Retreating_after_midT1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Retreating_after_midT1_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Retreating_after_midT1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A015', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ByeBye_T1) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Retreating_after_midT1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Retreating_after_midT1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Retreating_after_midT1, gg_rct_Middle )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Retreating_after_midT1, Condition( function Trig_Retreating_after_midT1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Retreating_after_midT1, function Trig_Retreating_after_midT1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Firebolt
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Firebolt_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Awfb', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'Awfb') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Firebolt_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttacker()) < 150.00 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitManaPercent(GetAttacker()) >= 80.00 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Firebolt_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttacker()) >= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Firebolt_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Firebolt_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Firebolt_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
        if ( Trig_Firebolt_Func002Func004C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetAttacker(), "firebolt", GetAttackedUnitBJ() )
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_Firebolt_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetAttacker(), "firebolt", GetAttackedUnitBJ() )
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Firebolt takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Firebolt = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Firebolt, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Firebolt, Condition( function Trig_Firebolt_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Firebolt, function Trig_Firebolt_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summoned Mana Gain
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summoned_Mana_Gain_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09O', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Summoned_Mana_Gain_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Summoned_Mana_Gain_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summoned_Mana_Gain_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 8.00 ) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summoned_Mana_Gain_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 'n00R'), function Trig_Summoned_Mana_Gain_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Summoned_Mana_Gain takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Summoned_Mana_Gain = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Summoned_Mana_Gain, GetEntireMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Summoned_Mana_Gain, Condition( function Trig_Summoned_Mana_Gain_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Summoned_Mana_Gain, function Trig_Summoned_Mana_Gain_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: ms per dead build
//===========================================================================
function Trig_ms_per_dead_build_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetDyingUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AM', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_ms_per_dead_build_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetKillingUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetKillingUnitBJ()) + ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetTriggerUnit()) / 10.00 ) ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_ms_per_dead_build takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_ms_per_dead_build = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_ms_per_dead_build, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_ms_per_dead_build, Condition( function Trig_ms_per_dead_build_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_ms_per_dead_build, function Trig_ms_per_dead_build_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Priest heal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Priest_heal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Ahea', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_heal_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_heal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 5)
    if ( Trig_Priest_heal_Func002C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetAttacker(), "stop" )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Priest_heal = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Priest_heal, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Priest_heal, function Trig_Priest_heal_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: True Strikers
//===========================================================================
function Trig_True_Strikers_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A4', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_True_Strikers_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_True_Strikers_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_True_Strikers_Func002C() ) then
        call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) - 0.50 ) )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_True_Strikers takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_True_Strikers = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_True_Strikers, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_True_Strikers, Condition( function Trig_True_Strikers_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_True_Strikers, function Trig_True_Strikers_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Skyfury Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Skyfury_Cast_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A1', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skyfury_Cast_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A1', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skyfury_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Skyfury_Cast_Func001C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "thunderbolt", GetAttacker() )
    else
        if ( Trig_Skyfury_Cast_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetAttacker(), "thunderbolt", GetAttackedUnitBJ() )
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Skyfury_Cast = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Skyfury_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Skyfury_Cast, function Trig_Skyfury_Cast_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Skyfury loss
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Skyfury_loss_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0A1' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skyfury_loss_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A0A1', GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Skyfury_loss takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Skyfury_loss = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Skyfury_loss, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Skyfury_loss, Condition( function Trig_Skyfury_loss_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Skyfury_loss, function Trig_Skyfury_loss_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Skyfury
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Skyfury_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A2', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skyfury_Func002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Skyfury_Func002001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Skyfury_Func002001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Skyfury_Func002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Skyfury_Func002001002002001(), Trig_Skyfury_Func002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Skyfury_Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Skyfury_Func002001002001(), Trig_Skyfury_Func002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Skyfury_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0A1', GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Weapons\\RedDragonBreath\\RedDragonMissile.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Skyfury_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Skyfury_Func002001002)), function Trig_Skyfury_Func002A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Skyfury takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Skyfury = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Skyfury, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Skyfury, Condition( function Trig_Skyfury_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Skyfury, function Trig_Skyfury_Actions )
endfunction

    endif

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Priest def heal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Priest_def_heal_Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A001', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_def_heal_Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Ahea', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_def_heal_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Priest_def_heal_Func001001002001(), Trig_Priest_def_heal_Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_def_heal_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "stop" )
endfunction

function Trig_Priest_def_heal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Priest_def_heal_Func001001002)), function Trig_Priest_def_heal_Func001A )
endfunction
