    set gg_trg_Priest_def_heal = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Priest_def_heal, 15.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Priest_def_heal, function Trig_Priest_def_heal_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Arcane Touch bonus Dmg
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Arcane_Touch_bonus_Dmg_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08V', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Touch_bonus_Dmg_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetTriggerUnit(), 0) + 5 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetTriggerUnit(), 1) + 5 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetTriggerUnit(), 2) + 5 ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Arcane_Touch_bonus_Dmg takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Arcane_Touch_bonus_Dmg = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Arcane_Touch_bonus_Dmg, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Arcane_Touch_bonus_Dmg, Condition( function Trig_Arcane_Touch_bonus_Dmg_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Arcane_Touch_bonus_Dmg, function Trig_Arcane_Touch_bonus_Dmg_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Conjurus Rex
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Conjurus_Rex_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09O', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Conjurus_Rex_Func002Func001Func001Func005001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'H017' )
endfunction

function Trig_Conjurus_Rex_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Conjurus_Rex_Func002Func001Func001Func005001001002))) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Conjurus_Rex_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Conjurus_Rex_Func002Func002Func005001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'H017' )
endfunction

function Trig_Conjurus_Rex_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Conjurus_Rex_Func002Func002Func005001001002))) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Conjurus_Rex_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Conjurus_Rex_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Conjurus_Rex_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Conjurus_Rex_Func002Func002C() ) then
            call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetTriggerUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetTriggerUnit()) + ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetTriggerUnit()) / 20 ) ) )
            call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) / 20.00 ) ) )
            call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetTriggerUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetTriggerUnit()) + ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetTriggerUnit()) / 20 ) ) )
            call SetUnitManaBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) / 20.00 ) ) )
        else
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_Conjurus_Rex_Func002Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_Conjurus_Rex_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetTriggerUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetTriggerUnit()) + ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetTriggerUnit()) / 20 ) ) )
                call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetTriggerUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetTriggerUnit()) + ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetTriggerUnit()) / 20 ) ) )
                call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) / 20.00 ) ) )
                call SetUnitManaBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) / 20.00 ) ) )
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Conjurus_Rex takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Conjurus_Rex = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Conjurus_Rex, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Conjurus_Rex, Condition( function Trig_Conjurus_Rex_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Conjurus_Rex, function Trig_Conjurus_Rex_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: a20 mana per level
//===========================================================================
function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09N', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetFilterUnit()) > 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func001001002001(), Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 20.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func002Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func002Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetFilterUnit()) > 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func002Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func002Func001001002001(), Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func002Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func002Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 20.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func001001002)), function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func001A )
    else
        if ( Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func002Func001001002)), function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Func001Func002Func001A )
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_a20_mana_per_level takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_a20_mana_per_level = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_a20_mana_per_level, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_a20_mana_per_level, Condition( function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_a20_mana_per_level, function Trig_a20_mana_per_level_Actions )
endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Bonus_Fire_orb_Air_Rifleman_Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00A', GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Demon\\DarkPortal\\DarkPortalTarget.mdl" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Bonus_Fire_orb_Air_Rifleman_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bonus_Fire_orb_Air_Rifleman_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Bonus_Fire_orb_Air_Rifleman_Func001C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(1, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Bonus_Fire_orb_Air_Rifleman_Func001Func002001002002))), function Trig_Bonus_Fire_orb_Air_Rifleman_Func001Func002A )
    else
        call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(1, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Bonus_Fire_orb_Air_Rifleman_Func001Func001001002002))), function Trig_Bonus_Fire_orb_Air_Rifleman_Func001Func001A )
    endif
endfunction

function InitTrig_Bonus_Fire_orb_Air_Rifleman takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bonus_Fire_orb_Air_Rifleman = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Bonus_Fire_orb_Air_Rifleman, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Bonus_Fire_orb_Air_Rifleman, Condition( function Trig_Bonus_Fire_orb_Air_Rifleman_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Bonus_Fire_orb_Air_Rifleman, function Trig_Bonus_Fire_orb_Air_Rifleman_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DefendAbility
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DefendAbility_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttacker(), UNIT_TYPE_RANGED_ATTACKER) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Adef', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendAbility_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_DefendAbility_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DefendAbility_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "defend" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 20.00 )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "undefend" )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DefendAbility takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DefendAbility = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_DefendAbility, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_DefendAbility, Condition( function Trig_DefendAbility_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_DefendAbility, function Trig_DefendAbility_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Militia
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Militia_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A016', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Militia_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Militia_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    if ( Trig_Militia_Func002C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 'h00T', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Militia takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Militia = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Militia, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Militia, Condition( function Trig_Militia_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Militia, function Trig_Militia_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pain Field
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pain_Field_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01A', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pain_Field_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01A', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pain_Field_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Pain_Field_Func002C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1DMid) )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 8.00 )
        call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetTriggerUnit(), 0.00 )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call SetUnitAnimation( GetTriggerUnit(), "channel" )
    else
        if ( Trig_Pain_Field_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2DMid) )
            call TriggerSleepAction( 8.00 )
            call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetTriggerUnit(), 0.00 )
            call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
            call SetUnitAnimation( GetTriggerUnit(), "channel" )
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pain_Field takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pain_Field = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Pain_Field, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Pain_Field, function Trig_Pain_Field_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Noxious Summons
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Noxious_Summons_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09O', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Noxious_Summons_Func002Func001Func001Func003001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'u019' )
endfunction

function Trig_Noxious_Summons_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Noxious_Summons_Func002Func001Func001Func003001001002))) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Noxious_Summons_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Noxious_Summons_Func002Func002Func003001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'u019' )
endfunction

function Trig_Noxious_Summons_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Noxious_Summons_Func002Func002Func003001001002))) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Noxious_Summons_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Noxious_Summons_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Noxious_Summons_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Noxious_Summons_Func002Func002C() ) then
            call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 80.00, 100, 80.00, 0 )
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Aspo', GetTriggerUnit() )
        else
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_Noxious_Summons_Func002Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_Noxious_Summons_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 80.00, 100, 80.00, 0 )
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Aspo', GetTriggerUnit() )
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Noxious_Summons takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Noxious_Summons = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Noxious_Summons, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Noxious_Summons, Condition( function Trig_Noxious_Summons_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Noxious_Summons, function Trig_Noxious_Summons_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Speed from dead
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Speed_from_dead_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(10) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Speed_from_dead_Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Speed_from_dead_Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08P', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Speed_from_dead_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Speed_from_dead_Func001001002001(), Trig_Speed_from_dead_Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Speed_from_dead_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Piercing Thrust Yellow.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A08P', GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08P', GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetEnumUnit()) + ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetEnumUnit()) / 5.00 ) ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Speed_from_dead_Func002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Speed_from_dead_Func002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08P', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Speed_from_dead_Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Speed_from_dead_Func002001002001(), Trig_Speed_from_dead_Func002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Speed_from_dead_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Piercing Thrust Yellow.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A08P', GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08P', GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetEnumUnit()) + ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetEnumUnit()) / 5.00 ) ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Speed_from_dead_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Speed_from_dead_Func001001002)), function Trig_Speed_from_dead_Func001A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Speed_from_dead_Func002001002)), function Trig_Speed_from_dead_Func002A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Speed_from_dead takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Speed_from_dead = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Speed_from_dead, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Speed_from_dead, Condition( function Trig_Speed_from_dead_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Speed_from_dead, function Trig_Speed_from_dead_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Corrupt Blight
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Corrupt_Blight_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A082', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Corrupt_Blight_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Corrupt_Blight_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Corrupt_Blight_Func001C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01G', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01G', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Corrupt_Blight takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Corrupt_Blight = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Corrupt_Blight, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Corrupt_Blight, Condition( function Trig_Corrupt_Blight_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Corrupt_Blight, function Trig_Corrupt_Blight_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Skeleton Archer Spawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Skeleton_Archer_Spawn_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09X', GetKillingUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skeleton_Archer_Spawn_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Skeleton_Archer_Spawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Skeleton_Archer_Spawn_Func001C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n004', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n004', GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Skeleton_Archer_Spawn, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Skeleton_Archer_Spawn, function Trig_Skeleton_Archer_Spawn_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unit GuideT1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unit_GuideT1_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_GuideT1_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A000', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Unit_GuideT1_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_GuideT1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Unit_GuideT1_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_GuideT1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unit_GuideT1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unit_GuideT1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Unit_GuideT1, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Unit_GuideT1, Condition( function Trig_Unit_GuideT1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Unit_GuideT1, function Trig_Unit_GuideT1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unit ReGuideT1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unit_ReGuideT1_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A000', GetFilterUnit()) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_ReGuideT1_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitCurrentOrder(GetEnumUnit()) == String2OrderIdBJ("stand down") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_ReGuideT1_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Unit_ReGuideT1_Func001Func001C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn) )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_ReGuideT1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(0), Condition(function Trig_Unit_ReGuideT1_Func001001002)), function Trig_Unit_ReGuideT1_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Unit_ReGuideT1, 1.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Unit_ReGuideT1, function Trig_Unit_ReGuideT1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Stone Form
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Stone_Form_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) <= 110.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Astn', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stone_Form_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Stone_Form_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stone_Form_Func001Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_TransportingOUnit) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stone_Form_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stone_Form_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Stone_Form_Func001C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn) )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 3.00 )
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "stoneform" )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "unstoneform" )
    else
        if ( Trig_Stone_Form_Func001Func006C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn) )
            call TriggerSleepAction( 3.00 )
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "stoneform" )
            call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
            call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "unstoneform" )
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Stone_Form takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Stone_Form = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Stone_Form, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Stone_Form, Condition( function Trig_Stone_Form_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Stone_Form, function Trig_Stone_Form_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Acolyte BetterRenew
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Acolyte_BetterRenew_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A00B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Acolyte_BetterRenew_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00B', GetSpellTargetUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitType(GetSpellTargetUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Acolyte_BetterRenew_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Acolyte_BetterRenew_Func005Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Acolyte_BetterRenew_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "stop" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    if ( Trig_Acolyte_BetterRenew_Func005C() ) then
        call DoNothing(  )
    else
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetSpellTargetUnit(), "stop" )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetSpellTargetUnit(), "stop" )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetSpellTargetUnit(), "stop" )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetSpellTargetUnit(), "stop" )
    endif
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Acolyte_BetterRenew takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Acolyte_BetterRenew = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Acolyte_BetterRenew, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Acolyte_BetterRenew, Condition( function Trig_Acolyte_BetterRenew_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Acolyte_BetterRenew, function Trig_Acolyte_BetterRenew_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cultist Path Finding
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00B', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "stop" )
endfunction

function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01P', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(8) )
endfunction

function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func002001002001(), Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1_Front) )
endfunction

function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func003001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01P', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func003001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(9) )
endfunction

function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func003001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func003001002001(), Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func003001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2_Front) )
endfunction

function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func001001002)), function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func001A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func002001002)), function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func002A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func003001002)), function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Func003A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cultist_Path_Finding takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cultist_Path_Finding = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Cultist_Path_Finding, 15.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Cultist_Path_Finding, function Trig_Cultist_Path_Finding_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cultist Ritual
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cultist_Ritual_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00G', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Cultist_Ritual_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ( true, GetEnumUnit() )
    call PauseUnitBJ( false, GetEnumUnit() )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "tranquility" )
endfunction

function Trig_Cultist_Ritual_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Cultist_Ritual_Func001001002)), function Trig_Cultist_Ritual_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cultist_Ritual takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cultist_Ritual = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Cultist_Ritual, 5.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Cultist_Ritual, function Trig_Cultist_Ritual_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cultist Ritual Activatel
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cultist_Ritual_Activatel_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00G', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cultist_Ritual_Activatel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01P', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "tranquility" )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cultist_Ritual_Activatel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cultist_Ritual_Activatel = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Cultist_Ritual_Activatel, gg_rct_T1_Front )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Cultist_Ritual_Activatel, gg_rct_T2_Front )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Cultist_Ritual_Activatel, Condition( function Trig_Cultist_Ritual_Activatel_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Cultist_Ritual_Activatel, function Trig_Cultist_Ritual_Activatel_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Scavenger
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Scavenger_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Acn2', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Scavenger_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetKillingUnitBJ(), "cannibalize" )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08F', GetKillingUnitBJ() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Scavenger = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Scavenger, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Scavenger, Condition( function Trig_Scavenger_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Scavenger, function Trig_Scavenger_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kill bonus 20 life
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kill_bonus_20_life_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A023', GetKillingUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kill_bonus_20_life_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetKillingUnitBJ()) < 800.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kill_bonus_20_life_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Kill_bonus_20_life_Func001C() ) then
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetKillingUnitBJ(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetKillingUnitBJ()) + 50 ) )
        call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetKillingUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetKillingUnitBJ()) + 50.00 ) )
        call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetKillingUnitBJ(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 0) + 8 ), 0 )
        call SetUnitScalePercent( GetKillingUnitBJ(), ( 100.00 + ( I2R(BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetKillingUnitBJ(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0)) / 3.00 ) ), ( 100.00 + ( I2R(BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetKillingUnitBJ(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0)) / 3.00 ) ), ( 100.00 + ( I2R(BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 0)) / 3.00 ) ) )
        call SetUnitVertexColorBJ( GetKillingUnitBJ(), 100, ( 100.00 - ( I2R(BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetKillingUnitBJ(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0)) / 2.00 ) ), ( 100.00 - ( I2R(BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetKillingUnitBJ(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0)) / 2.00 ) ), 0 )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kill_bonus_20_life takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kill_bonus_20_life = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Kill_bonus_20_life, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Kill_bonus_20_life, Condition( function Trig_Kill_bonus_20_life_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Kill_bonus_20_life, function Trig_Kill_bonus_20_life_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: life when attacking 5
//===========================================================================
function Trig_life_when_attacking_5_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A009', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_life_when_attacking_5_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetAttacker(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttacker()) + ( I2R(BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetAttacker(), 0)) / 2.00 ) ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_life_when_attacking_5 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_life_when_attacking_5 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_life_when_attacking_5, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_life_when_attacking_5, Condition( function Trig_life_when_attacking_5_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_life_when_attacking_5, function Trig_life_when_attacking_5_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Advancing Bonus HP T1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T1_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08M', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T1_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A08M', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetTriggerUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetTriggerUnit()) + ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetTriggerUnit()) / 4 ) ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) / 4.00 ) ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T1, gg_rct_T2_Region )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T1, Condition( function Trig_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T1, function Trig_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Advancing Bonus HP T2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T2_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08M', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T2_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A08M', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetTriggerUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetTriggerUnit()) + ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetTriggerUnit()) / 4 ) ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) / 4.00 ) ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T2, gg_rct_T1_Region )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T2, Condition( function Trig_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T2, function Trig_Advancing_Bonus_HP_T2_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_HordeUnity1Aval == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_HordeUnity_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.40 )
    if ( Trig_HordeUnity_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002C() ) then
            call ShowUnitShow( gg_unit_o01Q_0290 )
            set udg_HordeUnity1Grunt = true
            call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func004001002)), function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func004A )
            if ( Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func005C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func005Func002001002)), function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func005Func002A )
            else
            endif
        else
            if ( Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                call ShowUnitShow( gg_unit_o01S_0284 )
                set udg_HordeUnity1Troll = true
                call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func001Func005001002)), function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func001Func005A )
                if ( Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func001Func006C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func001Func006Func002001002)), function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func001Func006Func002A )
                else
                endif
            else
                if ( Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call ShowUnitShow( gg_unit_o01R_0285 )
                    set udg_HordeUnity1Tauren = true
                    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func001Func002Func004001002)), function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func001Func002Func004A )
                    if ( Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func001Func002Func005C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func001Func002Func005Func001001002)), function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func002Func001Func002Func005Func001A )
                    else
                    endif
                else
                endif
            endif
        endif
    else
        if ( Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ShowUnitShow( gg_unit_o01Q_0286 )
                set udg_HordeUnity2Grunt = true
                call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func004001002)), function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func004A )
                if ( Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func005C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func005Func002001002)), function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func005Func002A )
                else
                endif
            else
                if ( Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call ShowUnitShow( gg_unit_o01S_0287 )
                    set udg_HordeUnity2Troll = true
                    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func004001002)), function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func004A )
                    if ( Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func005C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func005Func002001002)), function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func005Func002A )
                    else
                    endif
                else
                    if ( Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call ShowUnitShow( gg_unit_o01R_0288 )
                        set udg_HordeUnity2Tauren = true
                        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003001002)), function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func003A )
                        if ( Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func004C() ) then
                            call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func004Func002001002)), function Trig_HordeUnity_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func004Func002A )
                        else
                        endif
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_HordeUnity takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_HordeUnity = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_HordeUnity, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_HordeUnity, function Trig_HordeUnity_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pillage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pillage_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Asa2', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Asal', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Pillage_Func006Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Pillage_Func006C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00V', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00U', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00T', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00Y', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage_Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00X', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00W', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A010', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00Z', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Pillage_Func001C() ) then
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 1, Player(0), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
    else
        if ( Trig_Pillage_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 1, Player(1), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
        else
            if ( Trig_Pillage_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 1, Player(2), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
            else
                if ( Trig_Pillage_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 1, Player(3), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
                else
                    if ( Trig_Pillage_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 1, Player(4), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Pillage_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 1, Player(5), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Pillage_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 1, Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Pillage_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 1, Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
                                else
                                    call DoNothing(  )
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'Asal', GetAttacker() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'Asa2', GetAttacker() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), "UI\\Feedback\\GoldCredit\\GoldCredit.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pillage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pillage = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Pillage, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Pillage, Condition( function Trig_Pillage_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Pillage, function Trig_Pillage_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pillage2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pillage2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Asa2', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Asal', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Pillage2_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage2_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00V', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage2_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00U', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage2_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00T', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage2_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00Y', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage2_Func002Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00X', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage2_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00W', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage2_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A010', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00Z', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pillage2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Pillage2_Func002C() ) then
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 1, Player(0), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
    else
        if ( Trig_Pillage2_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 1, Player(1), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
        else
            if ( Trig_Pillage2_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 1, Player(2), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
            else
                if ( Trig_Pillage2_Func002Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 1, Player(3), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
                else
                    if ( Trig_Pillage2_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 1, Player(4), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Pillage2_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 1, Player(5), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Pillage2_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 1, Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Pillage2_Func002Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ( 1, Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD )
                                else
                                    call DoNothing(  )
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'Asal', GetKillingUnitBJ() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'Asa2', GetKillingUnitBJ() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetDyingUnit()), "UI\\Feedback\\GoldCredit\\GoldCredit.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pillage2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pillage2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Pillage2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Pillage2, Condition( function Trig_Pillage2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Pillage2, function Trig_Pillage2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Slave Summoning
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Slave_Summoning_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "waterelemental" )
endfunction

function Trig_Slave_Summoning_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('o004'), function Trig_Slave_Summoning_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Slave_Summoning takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Slave_Summoning = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Slave_Summoning, 30.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Slave_Summoning, function Trig_Slave_Summoning_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sacrifice to Empower
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func001Func003001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A011', GetFilterUnit()) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func001Func003001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func001Func003001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func001Func003001002001(), Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func001Func003001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DeathPact\\DeathPactCaster.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_STR, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 2 )
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 2 )
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func003001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A011', GetFilterUnit()) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func003001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func003001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func003001002001(), Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func003001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DeathPact\\DeathPactCaster.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_STR, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 2 )
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 2 )
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    if ( Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func003001002)), function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func003A )
    else
        if ( Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func001Func003001002)), function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Func002Func001Func003A )
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sacrifice_to_Empower takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sacrifice_to_Empower = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Sacrifice_to_Empower, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Sacrifice_to_Empower, Condition( function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Sacrifice_to_Empower, function Trig_Sacrifice_to_Empower_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unit Sacrifice Walk
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A011', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Func001Func001Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Func001Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Func001Func001Func003Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Func001Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Func001Func003Func001C() ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Func001Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Func001C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1_Front) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2_Front) )
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk, Condition( function Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk, function Trig_Unit_Sacrifice_Walk_Actions )
endfunction

endfunction

        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Lightning_Shield1_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Lightning_Shield1_Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_RANGED_ATTACKER) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Alsh', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Lightning_Shield1_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AI', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bouncy_mid_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_MAXIMUM_NUMBER_OF_TARGETS, 1, 7 )
endfunction
