    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Bouncy_mid, Condition( function Trig_Bouncy_mid_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Bouncy_mid, function Trig_Bouncy_mid_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Building armor life
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Building_armor_life_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AH', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Building_armor_life_Func001001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitIdType(GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Building_armor_life_Func001001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Building_armor_life_Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Building_armor_life_Func001001002001001(), Trig_Building_armor_life_Func001001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Building_armor_life_Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Building_armor_life_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Building_armor_life_Func001001002001(), Trig_Building_armor_life_Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Building_armor_life_Func001Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_MainStructureT1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetEnumUnit() != udg_MainStructureT2 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Building_armor_life_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Building_armor_life_Func001Func001Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Building_armor_life_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Building_armor_life_Func001Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100 )
        call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Building_armor_life_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Building_armor_life_Func001001002)), function Trig_Building_armor_life_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Building_armor_life takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Building_armor_life = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Building_armor_life, gg_rct_Middle )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Building_armor_life, Condition( function Trig_Building_armor_life_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Building_armor_life, function Trig_Building_armor_life_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Observation and action T1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Observation_and_action_T1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttacker(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A3', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Observation_and_action_T1_Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A3', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Observation_and_action_T1_Func001001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Observation_and_action_T1_Func001001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Observation_and_action_T1_Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Observation_and_action_T1_Func001001002002001(), Trig_Observation_and_action_T1_Func001001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Observation_and_action_T1_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Observation_and_action_T1_Func001001002001(), Trig_Observation_and_action_T1_Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Observation_and_action_T1_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\SpiritLink\\SpiritLinkZapTarget.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 1 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 1 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Observation_and_action_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Observation_and_action_T1_Func001001002)), function Trig_Observation_and_action_T1_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Observation_and_action_T1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Observation_and_action_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Observation_and_action_T1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Observation_and_action_T1, Condition( function Trig_Observation_and_action_T1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Observation_and_action_T1, function Trig_Observation_and_action_T1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Observation and action T2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Observation_and_action_T2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttacker(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A3', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Observation_and_action_T2_Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0A3', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Observation_and_action_T2_Func001001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Observation_and_action_T2_Func001001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Observation_and_action_T2_Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Observation_and_action_T2_Func001001002002001(), Trig_Observation_and_action_T2_Func001001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Observation_and_action_T2_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Observation_and_action_T2_Func001001002001(), Trig_Observation_and_action_T2_Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Observation_and_action_T2_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\SpiritLink\\SpiritLinkZapTarget.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 1 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 1 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Observation_and_action_T2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Observation_and_action_T2_Func001001002)), function Trig_Observation_and_action_T2_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Observation_and_action_T2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Observation_and_action_T2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Observation_and_action_T2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Observation_and_action_T2, Condition( function Trig_Observation_and_action_T2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Observation_and_action_T2, function Trig_Observation_and_action_T2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Heal Offensive 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09L', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001Func001001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A000', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001Func001001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001Func001001002001001(), Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001Func001001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001Func001001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), Player(1)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001Func001001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09L', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001Func001001002002001(), Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001Func001001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001Func001001002001(), Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 3.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func002001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A000', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func002001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func002001002001001(), Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func002001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func002001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), Player(0)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func002001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09L', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func002001002002001(), Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func002001002001(), Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 3.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func002001002)), function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func002A )
    else
        if ( Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001Func001001002)), function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Func001Func001Func001A )
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Heal_Offensive_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Heal_Offensive_1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Heal_Offensive_1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Heal_Offensive_1, Condition( function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Heal_Offensive_1, function Trig_Heal_Offensive_1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Field Experience
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Field_Experience_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09K', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Field_Experience_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetAttacker(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetAttacker(), 0) + 1 ), 0 )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetAttacker(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetAttacker(), 1) + 1 ), 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Field_Experience takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Field_Experience = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Field_Experience, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Field_Experience, Condition( function Trig_Field_Experience_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Field_Experience, function Trig_Field_Experience_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sleeping unit
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sleeping_unit_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A02D', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sleeping_unit_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponBooleanFieldBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_BF_ATTACKS_ENABLED, 0, false )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponBooleanFieldBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_BF_ATTACKS_ENABLED, 1, false )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponBooleanFieldBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_BF_ATTACKS_ENABLED, 2, false )
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetTriggerUnit(), 0.00 )
    call SetUnitTurnSpeedBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 1.00 )
    call PauseUnitBJ( true, GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sleeping_unit takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sleeping_unit = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Sleeping_unit, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Sleeping_unit, Condition( function Trig_Sleeping_unit_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Sleeping_unit, function Trig_Sleeping_unit_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Obtain Shadow Meld1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Obtain_Shadow_Meld1_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01T', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Obtain_Shadow_Meld1_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01S', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Obtain_Shadow_Meld1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Obtain_Shadow_Meld1_Func001001002)), function Trig_Obtain_Shadow_Meld1_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Obtain_Shadow_Meld1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Obtain_Shadow_Meld1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterGameStateEventTimeOfDay( gg_trg_Obtain_Shadow_Meld1, EQUAL, 18.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Obtain_Shadow_Meld1, function Trig_Obtain_Shadow_Meld1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Obtain Shadow Meld2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Obtain_Shadow_Meld2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01T', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTimeOfDay() >= 18.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Obtain_Shadow_Meld2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Obtain_Shadow_Meld2_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Obtain_Shadow_Meld2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01S', GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Obtain_Shadow_Meld2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Obtain_Shadow_Meld2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Obtain_Shadow_Meld2, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Obtain_Shadow_Meld2, Condition( function Trig_Obtain_Shadow_Meld2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Obtain_Shadow_Meld2, function Trig_Obtain_Shadow_Meld2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shadow Meld Casting
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shadow_Meld_Casting_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01S', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_Meld_Casting_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadow_Meld_Casting_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "windwalk" )
    if ( Trig_Shadow_Meld_Casting_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_ShadowMeldRetreat = PolarProjectionBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), 400.00, 180.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "move", udg_ShadowMeldRetreat )
    else
        set udg_ShadowMeldRetreat = PolarProjectionBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()), -400.00, 180.00)
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "move", udg_ShadowMeldRetreat )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shadow_Meld_Casting takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shadow_Meld_Casting = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Shadow_Meld_Casting, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Shadow_Meld_Casting, Condition( function Trig_Shadow_Meld_Casting_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Shadow_Meld_Casting, function Trig_Shadow_Meld_Casting_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Losing Shadow Meld1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Losing_Shadow_Meld1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A01S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Losing_Shadow_Meld1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01S', GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

function InitTrig_Losing_Shadow_Meld1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Losing_Shadow_Meld1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Losing_Shadow_Meld1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Losing_Shadow_Meld1, Condition( function Trig_Losing_Shadow_Meld1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Losing_Shadow_Meld1, function Trig_Losing_Shadow_Meld1_Actions )
endfunction

    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01T', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Losing_Shadow_Meld2_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01S', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sentinel
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sentinel_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A020', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sentinel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "evileye", GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sentinel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sentinel = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Sentinel, gg_rct_T1_Front )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Sentinel, gg_rct_T1_Enterence )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Sentinel, gg_rct_Middle )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Sentinel, gg_rct_T2_Enterence )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Sentinel, gg_rct_T2_Front )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Sentinel, Condition( function Trig_Sentinel_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Sentinel, function Trig_Sentinel_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: NE Morph Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_NE_Morph_Copy_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'e00P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Arav', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NE_Morph_Copy_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_NE_Morph_Copy_Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NE_Morph_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Abrf', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NE_Morph_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_NE_Morph_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_NE_Morph_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_NE_Morph_Copy_Func001C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetAttacker(), "ravenform" )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_NE_Morph_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "bearform" )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_NE_Morph_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_NE_Morph_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_NE_Morph_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_NE_Morph_Copy, function Trig_NE_Morph_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Breath of Fire
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 70.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'ANbf') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANbf', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetAttacker(), "breathoffire", GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Breath_of_Fire takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Breath_of_Fire = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Breath_of_Fire, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Breath_of_Fire, Condition( function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Breath_of_Fire, function Trig_Breath_of_Fire_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Rain of Fire
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 85.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'ANrf') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANrf', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetAttacker(), "rainoffire", GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Rain_of_Fire takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Rain_of_Fire = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Rain_of_Fire, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Rain_of_Fire, Condition( function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Rain_of_Fire, function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Death Coil Heal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Death_Coil_Heal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) <= 30.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Heal_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AUdc', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Heal_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Heal_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Death_Coil_Heal_Func002002003001(), Trig_Death_Coil_Heal_Func002002003002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Heal_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'Brej') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Heal_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_DeathCoilGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Heal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_DeathCoilPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_DeathCoilGroup = GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_DeathCoilPoint, Condition(function Trig_Death_Coil_Heal_Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_Death_Coil_Heal_Func003C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Death_Coil_Heal_Func003Func001C() ) then
            set udg_DeathCoilUnit = GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_DeathCoilGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( udg_DeathCoilUnit, "deathcoil", GetTriggerUnit() )
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_DeathCoilPoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_DeathCoilGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Death_Coil_Heal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Death_Coil_Heal = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Death_Coil_Heal, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Death_Coil_Heal, Condition( function Trig_Death_Coil_Heal_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Death_Coil_Heal, function Trig_Death_Coil_Heal_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Death Coil Damage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) <= 60.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) >= 20.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AUdc', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Func003002003001(), Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Func003002003002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Func004Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitManaPercent(udg_DeathCoilUnit) >= 95.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'Brej') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_DeathCoilGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_DeathCoilPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_DeathCoilGroup = GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_DeathCoilPoint, Condition(function Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Func003002003))
    if ( Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Func004C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Func004Func001C() ) then
            set udg_DeathCoilUnit = GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_DeathCoilGroup)
            if ( Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Func004Func001Func004C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ( udg_DeathCoilUnit, "deathcoil", GetTriggerUnit() )
            else
                call DoNothing(  )
            endif
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_DeathCoilPoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_DeathCoilGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Death_Coil_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Death_Coil_Damage = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Death_Coil_Damage, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Death_Coil_Damage, Condition( function Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Death_Coil_Damage, function Trig_Death_Coil_Damage_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Death Pact
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Death_Pact_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) >= 110.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) <= 600.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Death_Pact_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AUdp', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Death_Pact_Func003002003001(), Trig_Death_Pact_Func003002003002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func004Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_UNDEAD) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_MECHANICAL) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_DeathPactUnit) < 300.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Death_Pact_Func004Func002Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_DeathPactGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Pact_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_DeathPactPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_DeathPactGroup = GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(600.00, udg_DeathPactPoint, Condition(function Trig_Death_Pact_Func003002003))
    if ( Trig_Death_Pact_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_DeathPactUnit = GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_DeathPactGroup)
        if ( Trig_Death_Pact_Func004Func002C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( udg_DeathPactUnit, "deathpact", GetTriggerUnit() )
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_DeathPactPoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_DeathPactGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Death_Pact takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Death_Pact = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Death_Pact, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Death_Pact, Condition( function Trig_Death_Pact_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Death_Pact, function Trig_Death_Pact_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hero Cripple
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hero_Cripple_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00F', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'A00F') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Cripple_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Hero_Cripple_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Cripple_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 200.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Cripple_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Hero_Cripple_Func002C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetAttacker(), "cripple", GetAttackedUnitBJ() )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hero_Cripple takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hero_Cripple = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Hero_Cripple, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Hero_Cripple, Condition( function Trig_Hero_Cripple_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Hero_Cripple, function Trig_Hero_Cripple_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sleep
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sleep_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) >= 250.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sleep_Func003002003001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AUsl', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Sleep_Func003002003001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ACsl', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Sleep_Func003002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Sleep_Func003002003001001(), Trig_Sleep_Func003002003001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Sleep_Func003002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Sleep_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Sleep_Func003002003001(), Trig_Sleep_Func003002003002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Sleep_Func004Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'BUsl') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_SleepRandom == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sleep_Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Sleep_Func004Func002Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sleep_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_SleepGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sleep_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_SleepPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_SleepGroup = GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_SleepPoint, Condition(function Trig_Sleep_Func003002003))
    if ( Trig_Sleep_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_SleepRandom = GetRandomInt(1, 5)
        if ( Trig_Sleep_Func004Func002C() ) then
            set udg_SleepUnit = GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_SleepGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( udg_SleepUnit, "sleep", GetTriggerUnit() )
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_SleepPoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_SleepGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sleep takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sleep = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Sleep, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Sleep, Condition( function Trig_Sleep_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Sleep, function Trig_Sleep_Actions )
endfunction

        return false
    endif

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AUfn', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

// Trigger: Antimagic Shell
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Antimagic_Shell_Func002002003001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00Q', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Antimagic_Shell_Func002002003001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Aams', GetFilterUnit()) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Antimagic_Shell_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Antimagic_Shell_Func002002003001001(), Trig_Antimagic_Shell_Func002002003001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Antimagic_Shell_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellTargetUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Antimagic_Shell_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Antimagic_Shell_Func002002003001(), Trig_Antimagic_Shell_Func002002003002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Antimagic_Shell_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 'Bams') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Antimagic_Shell_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_AntiMagicShellGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Antimagic_Shell_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_AntiMagicShellPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    set udg_AntiMagicShellGroup = GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(1500.00, udg_AntiMagicShellPoint, Condition(function Trig_Antimagic_Shell_Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_Antimagic_Shell_Func003C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Antimagic_Shell_Func003Func001C() ) then
            set udg_AntiMagicShellUnit = GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_AntiMagicShellGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( udg_AntiMagicShellUnit, "antimagicshell", GetSpellTargetUnit() )
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_AntiMagicShellPoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_AntiMagicShellGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Antimagic_Shell takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Antimagic_Shell = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Antimagic_Shell, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Antimagic_Shell, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Antimagic_Shell, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CHANNEL )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Antimagic_Shell, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CAST )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Antimagic_Shell, function Trig_Antimagic_Shell_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Far Sight
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Far_Sight_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOfs', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Far_Sight_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "farsight", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2_Front) )
endfunction

function Trig_Far_Sight_Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOfs', GetEnumUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Far_Sight_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "farsight", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1_Front) )
endfunction

function Trig_Far_Sight_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Far_Sight_Func001001002)), function Trig_Far_Sight_Func001A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Far_Sight_Func002001002)), function Trig_Far_Sight_Func002A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Far_Sight takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Far_Sight = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Far_Sight, 30.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Far_Sight, function Trig_Far_Sight_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Chain LightningPain
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Chain_LightningPain_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOcl', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01G', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Chain_LightningPain_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Chain_LightningPain_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chain_LightningPain_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetAttacker(), "fingerofdeath", GetAttackedUnitBJ() )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetAttacker(), "chainlightning", GetAttackedUnitBJ() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Chain_LightningPain takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Chain_LightningPain = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Chain_LightningPain, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Chain_LightningPain, Condition( function Trig_Chain_LightningPain_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Chain_LightningPain, function Trig_Chain_LightningPain_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mirror Image
//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOmi', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mirror_Image_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "mirrorimage" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "attack", GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Mirror_Image, function Trig_Mirror_Image_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shockwave
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shockwave_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'AOsh') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOsh', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shockwave_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Shockwave_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shockwave_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetAttacker(), "shockwave", GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shockwave takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shockwave = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Shockwave, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Shockwave, Condition( function Trig_Shockwave_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Shockwave, function Trig_Shockwave_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: War Stomp
//===========================================================================
function Trig_War_Stomp_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOws', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttacker(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_War_Stomp_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_War_Stomp_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_War_Stomp_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) < 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_War_Stomp_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_War_Stomp_Func002C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "stomp" )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_War_Stomp takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_War_Stomp = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_War_Stomp, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_War_Stomp, Condition( function Trig_War_Stomp_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_War_Stomp, function Trig_War_Stomp_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mana burn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mana_burn_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AEmb', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Ambd', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Amnb', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Ambb', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_burn_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetTriggerUnit()) >= 40.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Mana_burn_Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mana_burn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "manaburn", GetAttacker() )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetSpellTargetUnit(), "manaburn", GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mana_burn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mana_burn = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Mana_burn, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Mana_burn, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Mana_burn, Condition( function Trig_Mana_burn_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Mana_burn, function Trig_Mana_burn_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AEmb', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Ambd', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Amnb', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Ambb', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Mana_burn2_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Immolation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Immolation_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AEim', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttacker(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttacker(), UNIT_TYPE_RANGED_ATTACKER) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Immolation_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Immolation_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Immolation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "immolation" )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Immolation = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Immolation, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Immolation, Condition( function Trig_Immolation_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Immolation, function Trig_Immolation_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Scout
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Scout_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AEst', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Scout_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "scout" )
endfunction

function Trig_Scout_Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AEst', GetEnumUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Scout_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "scout" )
endfunction

function Trig_Scout_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Scout_Func001001002)), function Trig_Scout_Func001A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Scout_Func002001002)), function Trig_Scout_Func002A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Scout takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Scout = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Scout, 30.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Scout, function Trig_Scout_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tranquility
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tranquility_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AEtq', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Tranquility_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "tranquility" )
endfunction

function Trig_Tranquility_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Tranquility_Func001001002)), function Trig_Tranquility_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Tranquility takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tranquility = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Tranquility, 90.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Tranquility, function Trig_Tranquility_Actions )
endfunction

        return false
    endif

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Entangle2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Entangle2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AEer', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Entangle2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Entangle2_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Entangle2_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Entangle2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Entangle2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Entangle2_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
        if ( Trig_Entangle2_Func002Func002C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetAttacker(), "entanglingroots", GetAttackedUnitBJ() )
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Entangle2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Entangle2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Entangle2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Entangle2, Condition( function Trig_Entangle2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Entangle2, function Trig_Entangle2_Actions )
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttacker(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Holy Light
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Holy_Light_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) <= 30.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Func002002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHhb', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Func002002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Func002002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Holy_Light_Func002002003001(), Trig_Holy_Light_Func002002003002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'Brej') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_HealingGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Light_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_HealingPoint = GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_HealingGroup = GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(400.00, udg_HealingPoint, Condition(function Trig_Holy_Light_Func002002003))
    if ( Trig_Holy_Light_Func003C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Holy_Light_Func003Func001C() ) then
            set udg_HealingUnit = GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_HealingGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( udg_HealingUnit, "holybolt", GetTriggerUnit() )
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_HealingPoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_HealingGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Holy_Light takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Holy_Light = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Holy_Light, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Holy_Light, Condition( function Trig_Holy_Light_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Holy_Light, function Trig_Holy_Light_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Storm Bolt
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANsb', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), 'ANsb') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitManaPercent(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttacker(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) < 70.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttacker()) >= 225.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func002C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "thunderbolt", GetAttacker() )
    else
        if ( Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "thunderbolt", GetAttacker() )
        else
            if ( Trig_Storm_Bolt_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "thunderbolt", GetAttacker() )
            else
                call DoNothing(  )
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Storm_Bolt takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Storm_Bolt = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Storm_Bolt, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Storm_Bolt, Condition( function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Storm_Bolt, function Trig_Storm_Bolt_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Storm Bolt2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Storm_Bolt2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHtb', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), 'AHtb') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Storm_Bolt2_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt2_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitManaPercent(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt2_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttacker(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) < 70.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttacker()) >= 225.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Storm_Bolt2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Storm_Bolt2_Func002C() ) then
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "thunderbolt", GetAttacker() )
    else
        if ( Trig_Storm_Bolt2_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "thunderbolt", GetAttacker() )
        else
            if ( Trig_Storm_Bolt2_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetAttackedUnitBJ(), "thunderbolt", GetAttacker() )
            else
                call DoNothing(  )
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Blizzard
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Blizzard_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttacker()) >= 75.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'AHbz') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AHbz', GetAttacker()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_GROUND) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blizzard_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Blizzard_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blizzard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetAttacker(), "blizzard", GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) )
endfunction

    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Blizzard, Condition( function Trig_Blizzard_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Blizzard, function Trig_Blizzard_Actions )
endfunction

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01H', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A02C', GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetAttackedUnitBJ()) >= 125.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldownRemaining(GetAttacker(), 'AHwe') == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Water_ElementalDemonFofNature_Func001Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Water_ElementalDemonFofNature_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

endfunction

    if ( Trig_Blademaster_Level_Func001C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOmi' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOcr' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOwk' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Blademaster_Level_Func002C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOmi' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOcr' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOwk' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Blademaster_Level_Func003C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOwk' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOcr' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOmi' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Blademaster_Level_Func004C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOmi' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOcr' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOwk' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Blademaster_Level_Func005C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOmi' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOcr' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOwk' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Blademaster_Level_Func006C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOmi' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOcr' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOwk' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Blademaster_Level_Func007C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOmi' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOcr' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOwk' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Blademaster_Level_Func008C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOmi' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOcr' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOwk' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Blademaster_Level_Func009C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOmi' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOcr' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOwk' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Blademaster_Level_Func010C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOmi' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOcr' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOwk' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction
