//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ghost Travel
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func001002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func001002001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func001002001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'U00M' )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func001002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func001002001002002001(), Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func001002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func001002001002001(), Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func001002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A018', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func002001002001(), Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "blink", GetUnitLoc(udg_TravelTargetGroup) )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func003002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func003002001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func003002001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'U00M' )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func003002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func003002001002002001(), Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func003002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func003002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func003002001002001(), Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func003002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func004001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A018', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func004001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func004001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func004001002001(), Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func004001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "blink", GetUnitLoc(udg_TravelTargetGroup) )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TravelTargetGroup = GroupPickRandomUnit(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func001002001002)))
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func002001002)), function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func002A )
    set udg_TravelTargetGroup = GroupPickRandomUnit(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func003002001002)))
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func004001002)), function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Func004A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ghost_Travel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ghost_Travel = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Ghost_Travel, 15.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Ghost_Travel, function Trig_Ghost_Travel_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ghost go back
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ghost_go_back_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'U00M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_go_back_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_go_back_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_go_back_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Ghost_go_back_Func001C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1D2) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Ghost_go_back_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2D1) )
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ghost_go_back takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ghost_go_back = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Ghost_go_back, gg_rct_Middle )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Ghost_go_back, Condition( function Trig_Ghost_go_back_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Ghost_go_back, function Trig_Ghost_go_back_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kel Thuzad Level
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Level_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'U00M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Level_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Level_Func001C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A00I' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A018' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A00J' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kel_Thuzad_Level takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kel_Thuzad_Level = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzad_Level, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzad_Level, GetEntireMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzad_Level, function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Level_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ghosts Guidence Kel Thuzad
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitManaPercent(GetTriggerUnit()) <= 30.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_Func005002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'U00M' )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_Func005002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_Func005002003001(), Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_Func005002003002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetAttacker(), 'Brej') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_GuidenceGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GuidencePoint = GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
    set udg_GuidenceGroup = GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(9999999.00, udg_GuidencePoint, Condition(function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_Func005002003))
    if ( Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_Func006C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_Func006Func001C() ) then
            set udg_GuidenceUnit = GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_GuidenceGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( udg_GuidenceUnit, "rejuvination", GetTriggerUnit() )
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GuidencePoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GuidenceGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad, Condition( function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad, function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ghosts Guidence Kel Thuzad 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitManaPercent(GetAttacker()) <= 30.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2_Func005002003001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'U00M' )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2_Func005002003002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetAttacker())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2_Func005002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2_Func005002003001(), Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2_Func005002003002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetAttacker(), 'Brej') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_GuidenceGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GuidencePoint = GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
    set udg_GuidenceGroup = GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(9999999.00, udg_GuidencePoint, Condition(function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2_Func005002003))
    if ( Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2_Func006C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2_Func006Func001C() ) then
            set udg_GuidenceUnit = GroupPickRandomUnit(udg_GuidenceGroup)
            call IssueTargetOrderBJ( udg_GuidenceUnit, "rejuvination", GetAttacker() )
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GuidencePoint)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GuidenceGroup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2, Condition( function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2, function Trig_Ghosts_Guidence_Kel_Thuzad_2_Actions )
endfunction

    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif

        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AUan' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AUdc' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A024' )

        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AUfn' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AUfa' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AUdr' )
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "frostarmoron" )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Lich_Level_Func002C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AUfa' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AUdr' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AUfn' )
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "frostarmoron" )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Archmage_Levels_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Archmage_Levels_Func001C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHmt' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHbz' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHwe' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHab' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Archmage_Levels_Func002C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHmt' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHwe' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHbz' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHab' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Archmage_Levels_Func003C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHmt' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHwe' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHbz' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHab' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Archmage_Levels_Func004C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHmt' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHbz' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHwe' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHab' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Archmage_Levels_Func005C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHmt' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHbz' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHwe' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHab' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Archmage_Levels_Func006C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHmt' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHbz' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHwe' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHab' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Archmage_Levels_Func007C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHmt' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHwe' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHbz' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHab' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Archmage_Levels_Func008C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHmt' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHwe' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHbz' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHab' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Archmage_Levels_Func009C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHmt' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHbz' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHwe' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHab' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Anasterian_Sunstrider_Levels = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Anasterian_Sunstrider_Levels, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Anasterian_Sunstrider_Levels, GetEntireMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Anasterian_Sunstrider_Levels, function Trig_Anasterian_Sunstrider_Levels_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sylvanas Windrunner Level
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sylvanas_Windrunner_Level_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H00Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sylvanas_Windrunner_Level_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Sylvanas_Windrunner_Level_Func001C() ) then
        call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "coldarrows" )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AEsf' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A0AA' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AEar' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AOwk' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sylvanas_Windrunner_Level takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sylvanas_Windrunner_Level = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Sylvanas_Windrunner_Level, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Sylvanas_Windrunner_Level, GetEntireMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Sylvanas_Windrunner_Level, function Trig_Sylvanas_Windrunner_Level_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Paladin Level
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Paladin_Level_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H00U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Paladin_Level_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H00X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Paladin_Level_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H005' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Paladin_Level_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H00L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Paladin_Level_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H003' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Paladin_Level_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H00V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Paladin_Level_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H01U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Paladin_Level_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Paladin_Level_Func001C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHre' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHhb' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHad' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHds' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Paladin_Level_Func002C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHre' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHhb' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHds' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHad' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Paladin_Level_Func003C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHre' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHhb' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHad' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHds' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Paladin_Level_Func004C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHre' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHhb' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHds' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHad' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Paladin_Level_Func005C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHre' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHhb' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHds' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHad' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Paladin_Level_Func006C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHre' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHhb' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHad' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHds' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Paladin_Level_Func007C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHre' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHhb' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHad' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHds' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Paladin_Level takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Paladin_Level = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Paladin_Level, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Paladin_Level, GetEntireMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Paladin_Level, function Trig_Paladin_Level_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mountain Level
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mountain_Level_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H00H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mountain_Level_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H01T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mountain_Level_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Mountain_Level_Func001C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHav' )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHtb' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHtc' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHbh' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Mountain_Level_Func002C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHav' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHtc' )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHtb' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AHbh' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mountain_Level takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mountain_Level = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Mountain_Level, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Mountain_Level, GetEntireMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Mountain_Level, function Trig_Mountain_Level_Actions )
endfunction

        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A02C' )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Keeper_of_the_Grove_Level_Func002C() ) then
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'A02C' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AEtq' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AEer' )
        call SelectHeroSkill( GetTriggerUnit(), 'AEah' )

        call DoNothing(  )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Jaina Hero summon cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Jaina_Hero_summon_cast_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "spiritwolf" )
endfunction

function Trig_Jaina_Hero_summon_cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('H01M'), function Trig_Jaina_Hero_summon_cast_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Jaina_Hero_summon_cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Jaina_Hero_summon_cast = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Jaina_Hero_summon_cast, 20.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Jaina_Hero_summon_cast, function Trig_Jaina_Hero_summon_cast_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Jaina unit replace
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Jaina_unit_replace_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h08J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Jaina_unit_replace_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Jaina_unit_replace_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Jaina_unit_replace_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Jaina_unit_replace_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Jaina_unit_replace_Func002C() ) then
        call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 'H01U', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
    else
        if ( Trig_Jaina_unit_replace_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 'H01T', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
        else
            if ( Trig_Jaina_unit_replace_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 'H01R', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Jaina_unit_replace takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Jaina_unit_replace = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Jaina_unit_replace, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Jaina_unit_replace, Condition( function Trig_Jaina_unit_replace_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Jaina_unit_replace, function Trig_Jaina_unit_replace_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Death Mourner
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Death_Mourner_Func001Func001Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AG', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Mourner_Func001Func001Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit()) + 25.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Mourner_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Mourner_Func001Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AG', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Mourner_Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit()) + 25.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Mourner_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Mourner_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Death_Mourner_Func001C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Death_Mourner_Func001Func002001002)), function Trig_Death_Mourner_Func001Func002A )
    else
        if ( Trig_Death_Mourner_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Death_Mourner_Func001Func001Func001001002)), function Trig_Death_Mourner_Func001Func001Func001A )
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Death_Mourner takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Death_Mourner = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Death_Mourner, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Death_Mourner, function Trig_Death_Mourner_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Level 10 after half P1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Level_10_after_half_P1_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AD', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_10_after_half_P1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Level_10_after_half_P1_Func001C() ) then
        call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 10, true )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Level_10_after_half_P1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Level_10_after_half_P1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Level_10_after_half_P1, gg_rct_T2_Region )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Level_10_after_half_P1, function Trig_Level_10_after_half_P1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Level 10 after half P2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Level_10_after_half_P2_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AD', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Level_10_after_half_P2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Level_10_after_half_P2_Func001C() ) then
        call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 10, true )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Level_10_after_half_P2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Level_10_after_half_P2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Level_10_after_half_P2, gg_rct_T1_Region )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Level_10_after_half_P2, function Trig_Level_10_after_half_P2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Frost Enhancements
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func001Func002001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func001Func002001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func001Func002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func001Func002001002001001(), Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func001Func002001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func001Func002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(8) )
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func001Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func001Func002001002001(), Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func001Func002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func001Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) <= 5.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 2 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 2.00 ) )
    if ( Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func001Func002Func003C() ) then
        call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + 0.20 ) )
    else
        call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + 0.10 ) )
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('U00T', Player(8)) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func002Func002001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func002Func002001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func002Func002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func002Func002001002001001(), Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func002Func002001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func002Func002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(9) )
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func002Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func002Func002001002001(), Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func002Func002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func002Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) <= 5.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func002Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 2 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 2.00 ) )
    if ( Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func002Func002Func003C() ) then
        call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + 0.20 ) )
    else
        call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + 0.10 ) )
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('U00T', Player(9)) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func001C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func001Func002001002)), function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func001Func002A )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func002C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func002Func002001002)), function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Func002Func002A )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Frost_Enhancements takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Frost_Enhancements = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Frost_Enhancements, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Frost_Enhancements, function Trig_Frost_Enhancements_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Proof of Dominance Sylvanas
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func001Func002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func001Func002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(8) )
endfunction

function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func001Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func001Func002001002001(), Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func001Func002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 5 ) )
        call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 5.00 ) )
        call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 10.00 ) )
        call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ), false )
        call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 1 ) )
        call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 1 ) )
        call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 1 ) )
    else
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 2 ) )
        call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 2.00 ) )
        call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 5.00 ) )
        call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 1 ) )
        call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 1 ) )
        call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 1 ) )
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('U00R', Player(8)) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func002Func002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func002Func002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(9) )
endfunction

function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func002Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func002Func002001002001(), Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func002Func002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func002Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func002Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 5 ) )
        call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 5.00 ) )
        call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 10.00 ) )
        call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ), false )
        call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 1 ) )
        call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 1 ) )
        call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 1 ) )
    else
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 2 ) )
        call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 2.00 ) )
        call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 5.00 ) )
        call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 1 ) )
        call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 1 ) )
        call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 1 ) )
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('U00R', Player(9)) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func001C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func001Func002001002)), function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func001Func002A )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func002C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func002Func002001002)), function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Func002Func002A )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas, function Trig_Proof_of_Dominance_Sylvanas_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Getting prstg dmg
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Getting_prstg_dmg_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09P', GetKillingUnitBJ()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Getting_prstg_dmg_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Getting_prstg_dmg_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 2 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 3 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 4 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Getting_prstg_dmg_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Getting_prstg_dmg_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Getting_prstg_dmg_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Getting_prstg_dmg_Func001C() ) then
        call IncUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A09Q', GetKillingUnitBJ() )
    else
        if ( Trig_Getting_prstg_dmg_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09Q', GetKillingUnitBJ() )
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09R', GetKillingUnitBJ() )
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Getting_prstg_dmg takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Getting_prstg_dmg = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Getting_prstg_dmg, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Getting_prstg_dmg, Condition( function Trig_Getting_prstg_dmg_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Getting_prstg_dmg, function Trig_Getting_prstg_dmg_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Using prstg dmg
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Using_prstg_dmg_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetAttackedUnitBJ() != udg_MainStructureT1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetAttackedUnitBJ() != udg_MainStructureT2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Using_prstg_dmg_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetAttacker()) == 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Using_prstg_dmg_Func003Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetAttacker()) == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Using_prstg_dmg_Func003Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetAttacker()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Using_prstg_dmg_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetAttacker()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Using_prstg_dmg_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Q', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Using_prstg_dmg_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Using_prstg_dmg_Func003C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ( GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetAttackedUnitBJ()) / 33.00 ), ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL )
    else
        if ( Trig_Using_prstg_dmg_Func003Func001C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ( GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetAttackedUnitBJ()) / 16.00 ), ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL )
        else
            if ( Trig_Using_prstg_dmg_Func003Func001Func001C() ) then
                call UnitDamageTargetBJ( GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetAttackedUnitBJ()) / 11.00 ), ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL )
            else
                if ( Trig_Using_prstg_dmg_Func003Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call UnitDamageTargetBJ( GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetAttackedUnitBJ()) / 8.00 ), ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL )
                else
                    if ( Trig_Using_prstg_dmg_Func003Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call UnitDamageTargetBJ( GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetAttackedUnitBJ()) / 6.00 ), ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_NORMAL )
                    else
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Using_prstg_dmg takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Using_prstg_dmg = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Using_prstg_dmg, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Using_prstg_dmg, Condition( function Trig_Using_prstg_dmg_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Using_prstg_dmg, function Trig_Using_prstg_dmg_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Illidan BOOM
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Illidan_BOOM_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E00V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Illidan_BOOM_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "stomp" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A02E', GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Illidan_BOOM takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Illidan_BOOM = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Illidan_BOOM, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Illidan_BOOM, Condition( function Trig_Illidan_BOOM_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Illidan_BOOM, function Trig_Illidan_BOOM_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Talisman of the Wild
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A02F', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09O', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_Func001001002)), function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Talisman_of_the_Wild takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Talisman_of_the_Wild = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Talisman_of_the_Wild, 20.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Talisman_of_the_Wild, function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tyrande rally1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tyrande_rally1_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_rally1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetTriggerUnit(), false) >= 18 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Tyrande_rally1_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_rally1_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A029', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_rally1_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetEnumUnit() )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "stop" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "stop" )
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_rally1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Tyrande_rally1_Func001001002)), function Trig_Tyrande_rally1_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Tyrande_rally1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tyrande_rally1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Tyrande_rally1, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Tyrande_rally1, Condition( function Trig_Tyrande_rally1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Tyrande_rally1, function Trig_Tyrande_rally1_Actions )
endfunction

// Trigger: Tyrande rally2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tyrande_rally2_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_rally2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetTriggerUnit(), false) >= 18 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Tyrande_rally2_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_rally2_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A029', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_rally2_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetEnumUnit() )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "stop" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "stop" )
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_rally2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Tyrande_rally2_Func001001002)), function Trig_Tyrande_rally2_Func001A )
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Tyrande_rally2, function Trig_Tyrande_rally2_Actions )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Default Arthas Unholy Aura
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 'B001') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func001Func002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B001') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func001Func002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(9) )
endfunction

function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func001Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func001Func002001002001(), Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func001Func002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit()) == 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 2 ) )
        call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 5.00 ) )
    else
        call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 5.00 ) )
        call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 5.00 ) )
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'B001') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(8) )
endfunction

function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func002001002001(), Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit()) == 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func002Func001C() ) then
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 2 ) )
        call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 5.00 ) )
    else
        call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 5.00 ) )
        call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 5.00 ) )
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func002001002)), function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func002A )
    else
        if ( Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func001Func002001002)), function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Func001Func001Func002A )
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura, Condition( function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura, function Trig_Default_Arthas_Unholy_Aura_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Slip Away Heal P1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Slip_Away_Heal_P1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A021', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_Heal_P1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 100 )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 100 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A021', GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Slip_Away_Heal_P1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Slip_Away_Heal_P1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Slip_Away_Heal_P1, gg_rct_T1Spawn )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Slip_Away_Heal_P1, Condition( function Trig_Slip_Away_Heal_P1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Slip_Away_Heal_P1, function Trig_Slip_Away_Heal_P1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Slip Away LeaveP1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Slip_Away_LeaveP1_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A01Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_LeaveP1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Slip_Away_LeaveP1_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_LeaveP1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetSpellTargetUnit(), "stop" )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetSpellTargetUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Slip_Away_LeaveP1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Slip_Away_LeaveP1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Slip_Away_LeaveP1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Slip_Away_LeaveP1, Condition( function Trig_Slip_Away_LeaveP1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Slip_Away_LeaveP1, function Trig_Slip_Away_LeaveP1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dbl bonus from slaves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'N00F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves_Func002Func001Func003001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A011', GetFilterUnit()) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves_Func002Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Call of Dread Green.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_STR, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 4 )
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 4 )
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves_Func002Func003001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A011', GetFilterUnit()) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves_Func002Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Call of Dread Green.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_STR, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 4 )
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 4 )
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetTriggerUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves_Func002C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves_Func002Func003001002)), function Trig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves_Func002Func003A )
    else
        if ( Trig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves_Func002Func001Func003001002)), function Trig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves_Func002Func001Func003A )
        else
            call DoNothing(  )
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves, Condition( function Trig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves, function Trig_Dbl_bonus_from_slaves_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pleagues Grain
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pleagues_Grain_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'U004' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pleagues_Grain_Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'h00M' )
endfunction

function Trig_Pleagues_Grain_Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitDeadBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Pleagues_Grain_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Pleagues_Grain_Func001001002001(), Trig_Pleagues_Grain_Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Pleagues_Grain_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\RaiseSkeletonWarrior\\RaiseSkeleton.mdl" )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Pleagues_Grain_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), Condition(function Trig_Pleagues_Grain_Func001001002)), function Trig_Pleagues_Grain_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pleagues_Grain takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pleagues_Grain = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grain, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_CAST )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grain, Condition( function Trig_Pleagues_Grain_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grain, function Trig_Pleagues_Grain_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Windwalk1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Windwalk1_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOwk', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AJ', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Windwalk1_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'AOwk' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Windwalk1_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Windwalk1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Windwalk1_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Windwalk1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 100.00 ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Windwalk1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Windwalk1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Windwalk1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Windwalk1, Condition( function Trig_Windwalk1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Windwalk1, function Trig_Windwalk1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'AOwk' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('AOwk', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Paladin Low Heal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Paladin_Low_Heal_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01K', GetSpellTargetUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'AHhb' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Paladin_Low_Heal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Paladin_Low_Heal_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Paladin_Low_Heal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetSpellTargetUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetSpellTargetUnit()) - 50.00 ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Paladin_Low_Heal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Paladin_Low_Heal = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Paladin_Low_Heal, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Paladin_Low_Heal, Condition( function Trig_Paladin_Low_Heal_Conditions ) )
