//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Soul Crystal Effect
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Soul_Crystal_Effect_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A01J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Crystal_Effect_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(udg_SoulCrystalVictim) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Crystal_Effect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_SoulCrystalVictim = GetSpellTargetUnit()
    if ( Trig_Soul_Crystal_Effect_Func002C() ) then
        call SetUnitInvulnerable( udg_SoulCrystalVictim, true )
        call PauseUnitBJ( true, udg_SoulCrystalVictim )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
        call SetUnitOwner( udg_SoulCrystalVictim, Player(9), true )
        call SetUnitPositionLoc( udg_SoulCrystalVictim, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn) )
        call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_SoulCrystalVictim )
        call SetUnitInvulnerable( udg_SoulCrystalVictim, false )
    else
        call SetUnitInvulnerable( udg_SoulCrystalVictim, true )
        call PauseUnitBJ( true, udg_SoulCrystalVictim )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 2 )
        call SetUnitOwner( udg_SoulCrystalVictim, Player(8), true )
        call SetUnitPositionLoc( udg_SoulCrystalVictim, GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn) )
        call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_SoulCrystalVictim )
        call SetUnitInvulnerable( udg_SoulCrystalVictim, false )
    endif
    set udg_SoulCrystalVictim = null
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Soul_Crystal_Effect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Soul_Crystal_Effect = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Soul_Crystal_Effect, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Soul_Crystal_Effect, Condition( function Trig_Soul_Crystal_Effect_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Soul_Crystal_Effect, function Trig_Soul_Crystal_Effect_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Soul Crystal Attack
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Soul_Crystal_Attack_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetAttacker(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01J', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Crystal_Attack_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "manaburn", GetAttacker() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Soul_Crystal_Attack takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Soul_Crystal_Attack = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Soul_Crystal_Attack, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Soul_Crystal_Attack, Condition( function Trig_Soul_Crystal_Attack_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Soul_Crystal_Attack, function Trig_Soul_Crystal_Attack_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: XP gain
//===========================================================================
function Trig_XP_gain_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A014', GetEnumUnit(), 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_XP_gain_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerHandicapXPBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), 200.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_XP_gain_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerHandicapXPBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), 300.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_XP_gain_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerHandicapXPBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), 400.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_XP_gain_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A014', GetEnumUnit() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A013', GetEnumUnit(), 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_XP_gain_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A013', GetEnumUnit(), 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_XP_gain_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h00N'), function Trig_XP_gain_Func001A )
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_XP_gain_Func002A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 120.00 )
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_XP_gain_Func004A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 120.00 )
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_XP_gain_Func006A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 120.00 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h00N'), function Trig_XP_gain_Func008A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 360.00 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfTypeIdAll('h00N'), function Trig_XP_gain_Func010A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_XP_gain takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_XP_gain = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_XP_gain, 1.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_XP_gain, function Trig_XP_gain_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Goblin LaboratoryNoZP1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1_Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n014' )
endfunction

function Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1_Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00Z', GetFilterUnit()) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1_Func001001002001(), Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1_Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1_Func001Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Shock Blast Yellow.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
    if ( Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1_Func001Func004C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06Q', true, Player(0) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h06Q', 1, Player(0) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1_Func001Func004Func001C() ) then
            call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06X', true, Player(0) )
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h06X', 1, Player(0) )
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1_Func001001002)), function Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1, 60.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1, function Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Goblin LaboratoryNoZP2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP2_Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n014' )
endfunction

function Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP2_Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A010', GetFilterUnit()) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP2_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP2_Func001001002001(), Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP2_Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP2_Func001Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP2_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP2_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Shock Blast Yellow.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
    if ( Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP2_Func001Func004C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06Q', true, Player(1) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h06Q', 1, Player(1) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Goblin_LaboratoryNoZP2_Func001Func004Func001C() ) then
            call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06X', true, Player(1) )
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h06X', 1, Player(1) )
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Shock Blast Green.mdx" )

    if ( Trig_Demon_GateP5_Func001Func004C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07K', true, Player(4) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07K', 1, Player(4) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Demon_GateP5_Func001Func004Func003C() ) then
            call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03W', true, Player(4) )
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03W', 1, Player(4) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Demon_GateP5_Func001Func004Func003Func003C() ) then
                call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03X', true, Player(4) )
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03X', 1, Player(4) )
            else

                    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04J', true, Player(4) )
                    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h04J', 1, Player(4) )
                else
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Dragoon_RoostP5_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragoon_RoostP5_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Shock Blast Red.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Dragoon_RoostP5_Func001Func004C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06J', true, Player(4) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h06J', 1, Player(4) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Dragoon_RoostP5_Func001Func004Func003C() ) then
            call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06K', true, Player(4) )
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h06K', 1, Player(4) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Dragoon_RoostP5_Func001Func004Func003Func003C() ) then
                call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06H', true, Player(4) )
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h06H', 1, Player(4) )
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Dragoon_RoostP5_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Dragoon_RoostP5_Func001001002)), function Trig_Dragoon_RoostP5_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragoon_RoostP5 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragoon_RoostP5 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Dragoon_RoostP5, 60.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Dragoon_RoostP5, function Trig_Dragoon_RoostP5_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dragoon RoostP6
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dragoon_RoostP6_Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n00G' )
endfunction

function Trig_Dragoon_RoostP6_Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00T', GetFilterUnit()) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Dragoon_RoostP6_Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Dragoon_RoostP6_Func001001002001(), Trig_Dragoon_RoostP6_Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Dragoon_RoostP6_Func001Func004Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragoon_RoostP6_Func001Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragoon_RoostP6_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragoon_RoostP6_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Shock Blast Red.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Dragoon_RoostP6_Func001Func004C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06J', true, Player(5) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h06J', 1, Player(5) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Dragoon_RoostP6_Func001Func004Func003C() ) then
            call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06K', true, Player(5) )
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h06K', 1, Player(5) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Dragoon_RoostP6_Func001Func004Func003Func003C() ) then
                call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06H', true, Player(5) )
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h06H', 1, Player(5) )
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Dragoon_RoostP6_Func001001002)), function Trig_Dragoon_RoostP6_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pleagues Grains ClickerT1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_ClickerT1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h02J_0289 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_ClickerT1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner( gg_unit_h02J_0289, GetTriggerPlayer(), true )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pleagues_Grains_ClickerT1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_ClickerT1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_ClickerT1, Player(0), true )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_ClickerT1, Player(2), true )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_ClickerT1, Player(4), true )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_ClickerT1, Player(6), true )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_ClickerT1, Condition( function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_ClickerT1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_ClickerT1, function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_ClickerT1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pleagues Grains ClicketT2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_ClicketT2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_h02J_0291 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_ClicketT2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner( gg_unit_h02J_0291, GetTriggerPlayer(), true )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pleagues_Grains_ClicketT2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_ClicketT2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_ClicketT2, Player(1), true )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_ClicketT2, Player(3), true )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_ClicketT2, Player(5), true )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_ClicketT2, Player(7), true )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_ClicketT2, Condition( function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_ClicketT2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_ClicketT2, function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_ClicketT2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pleagues Grains counterT1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_counterT1_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_PleaguesGrainsT1 = ( udg_PleaguesGrainsT1 + 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_counterT1_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PleaguesGrainsT1 == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_counterT1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'h00M'), function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_counterT1_Func001A )
    if ( Trig_Pleagues_Grains_counterT1_Func002C() ) then
        call ShowUnitHide( gg_unit_h02J_0289 )
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( gg_unit_h02J_0289, 1 )
        call SetUnitLifeBJ( gg_unit_h02J_0289, 1.00 )
    else
        call ShowUnitShow( gg_unit_h02J_0289 )
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( gg_unit_h02J_0289, udg_PleaguesGrainsT1 )
        call SetUnitLifeBJ( gg_unit_h02J_0289, 9999999.00 )
    endif
    set udg_PleaguesGrainsT1 = 0
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pleagues_Grains_counterT1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_counterT1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_counterT1, 2.00 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_counterT1, function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_counterT1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pleagues Grains counterT2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_counterT2_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_PleaguesGrainsT2 = ( udg_PleaguesGrainsT2 + 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_counterT2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PleaguesGrainsT2 == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_counterT2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(9), 'h00M'), function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_counterT2_Func001A )
    if ( Trig_Pleagues_Grains_counterT2_Func002C() ) then
        call ShowUnitHide( gg_unit_h02J_0291 )
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( gg_unit_h02J_0291, 1 )
        call SetUnitLifeBJ( gg_unit_h02J_0291, 1.00 )
    else
        call ShowUnitShow( gg_unit_h02J_0291 )
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( gg_unit_h02J_0291, udg_PleaguesGrainsT2 )
        call SetUnitLifeBJ( gg_unit_h02J_0291, 9999999.00 )
    endif
    set udg_PleaguesGrainsT2 = 0
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pleagues_Grains_counterT2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_counterT2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_counterT2, 0.50 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Pleagues_Grains_counterT2, function Trig_Pleagues_Grains_counterT2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ancient Root heal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ancient_Root_heal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetIssuedOrderIdBJ() == String2OrderIdBJ("root") ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Root_heal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 13.00 )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) + 20.00 ) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.25 )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) + 20.00 ) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.25 )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) + 20.00 ) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.25 )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) + 20.00 ) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.25 )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetTriggerUnit()) + 20.00 ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ancient_Root_heal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ancient_Root_heal = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Ancient_Root_heal, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ISSUED_POINT_ORDER )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Ancient_Root_heal, Condition( function Trig_Ancient_Root_heal_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Ancient_Root_heal, function Trig_Ancient_Root_heal_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ancient Up BaseT1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ancient_Up_BaseT1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01V', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Up_BaseT1_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ancient_Up_BaseT1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Ancient_Up_BaseT1_Func001C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "root", GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_T2DS1) )
    else
        call DoNothing(  )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ancient_Up_BaseT1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ancient_Up_BaseT1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Ancient_Up_BaseT1, gg_rct_T2_Enterence )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Ancient_Up_BaseT1, Condition( function Trig_Ancient_Up_BaseT1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Ancient_Up_BaseT1, function Trig_Ancient_Up_BaseT1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Uproot
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Uproot_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e00F' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e00E' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Uproot_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Uproot_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Uproot_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), "unroot" )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Uproot takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Uproot = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Uproot, GetPlayableMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Uproot, Condition( function Trig_Uproot_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Uproot, function Trig_Uproot_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Building Death
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Building_Death_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_T2B[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Building_Death_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_T2B[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Building_Death_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_T2B[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Building_Death_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_T2B[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Building_Death_Func001Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_T1B[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Building_Death_Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_T1B[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Building_Death_Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_T1B[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Building_Death_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_T1B[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Building_Death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Building_Death_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_T1B[1] = null
    else
        if ( Trig_Building_Death_Func001Func001C() ) then
            set udg_T1B[2] = null
        else
            if ( Trig_Building_Death_Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_T1B[3] = null
            else
                if ( Trig_Building_Death_Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_T1B[4] = null
                else
                    if ( Trig_Building_Death_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        set udg_T2B[1] = null
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Building_Death_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                            set udg_T2B[2] = null
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Building_Death_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                set udg_T2B[3] = null
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Building_Death_Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                                    set udg_T2B[4] = null
                                else
                                    call DoNothing(  )
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Building_Death takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Building_Death = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Building_Death, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Building_Death, function Trig_Building_Death_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Upgrade to Cannon Tower
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Upgrade_to_Cannon_Tower_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A005', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Upgrade_to_Cannon_Tower_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call IssueTrainOrderByIdBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 'h00E' )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Upgrade_to_Cannon_Tower takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Upgrade_to_Cannon_Tower = CreateTrigger(  )

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Upgrade_to_Cannon_Tower, function Trig_Upgrade_to_Cannon_Tower_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Upgrade to Spirit Tower
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Upgrade_to_Spirit_Tower_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'u00N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Upgrade_to_Spirit_Tower_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call IssueTrainOrderByIdBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 'u00O' )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), 'u00O', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Upgrade_to_Spirit_Tower, function Trig_Upgrade_to_Spirit_Tower_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Timer
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Timer_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call TimerDialogDisplayForPlayerBJ( true, GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ(), GetEnumPlayer() )
endfunction

function Trig_Timer_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call StartTimerBJ( udg_TurnTimer, true, 30.00 )
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ( udg_TurnTimer, "TRIGSTR_124" )
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Timer_Func004A )
    set udg_timer_window_Turn_Timer = GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Timer takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Timer = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Timer, function Trig_Timer_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remove T1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remove_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportTarget.mdl" )
    call RemoveUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Remove_T1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Remove_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Remove_T1, gg_rct_ByeBye_T1 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Remove_T1, function Trig_Remove_T1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remove T2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remove_T2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportTarget.mdl" )
    call RemoveUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Remove_T2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Remove_T2, gg_rct_ByeBye_T2 )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Remove_T2, function Trig_Remove_T2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Force allyance
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Force_allyance_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(0), Player(8), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(2), Player(8), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(4), Player(8), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(6), Player(8), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(1), Player(9), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(3), Player(9), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(5), Player(9), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ( Player(7), Player(9), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Force_allyance takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Force_allyance = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Force_allyance, function Trig_Force_allyance_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Guard Towers T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_RANGED_ATTACKER) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002001(), Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001(), Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0) + 50.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1) + 50.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 2) + 50.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04W', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0) + 50.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1) + 50.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 2) + 50.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04W', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Guard_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Guard_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
endfunction

    endif

        return false

function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002001(), Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001(), Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h044', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00J', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00K', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_T1_Region, Condition(function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

        return true
    endif
    return false

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Reinforce T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06M', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06M', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h06M', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    endif

        return true
    endif

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif

    endif
    if ( not Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(8) )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00A', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001002002001(), Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001002001(), Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001001(), Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A000', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01M', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002001(), Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001(), Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetEnumUnit()) + 60.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05Y', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h00C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 60.00 ) )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(2, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002))), function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001002001(), Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001001(), Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001(), Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001(), Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 5 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 5 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 5 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08V', GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Blink\\BlinkTarget.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06E', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Regional Defenders T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func004Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) > 250 )
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) < 600 )
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001001(), Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002001(), Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001(), Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitScalePercent( GetEnumUnit(), ( 100.00 + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) / 33.00 ) ), ( 100.00 + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) / 33.00 ) ), ( 100.00 + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) / 33.00 ) ) )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 50 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 50.00 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Adef', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AR', GetEnumUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06L', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'h00A', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06L', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h06L', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func004C() ) then
            call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06E', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h06E', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func004Func004C() ) then
                call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05Y', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h05Y', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001001002))) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h038', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 5, 'h00D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'h00D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h038' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001001002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A001', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001001002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A003', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001001002001002001(), Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001001002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001001002001001(), Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001001002001(), Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Cavalery_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001001002))) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    else

    endif

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then

        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(udg_MainStructureT1) < 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03U', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 6, 'h00A', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h037' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001(), Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 10 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 10 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 10 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h037', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 10 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 10 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 10 ) )
endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Captains_assistence_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Captains_assistence_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mercenarys1_T1_Copy_Copy_Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Mercenarys1_T1_Copy_Copy_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Mercenarys1_T1_Copy_Copy_Func004Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mercenarys1_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Mercenarys1_T1_Copy_Copy_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mercenarys1_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05V', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Mercenarys1_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Mercenarys1_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Mercenarys1_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Mercenarys1_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Mercenarys1_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Mercenarys1_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Mercenarys1_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Heart of Searinox T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h050' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(8) )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00A', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002001(), Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002001(), Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001001(), Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerAlly(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), Player(0)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01M', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002001(), Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001(), Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A00A', GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Demon\\DarkPortal\\DarkPortalTarget.mdl" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h050', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(2, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002))), function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction
