//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Reinforcements Run T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01M', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002002001(), Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002001(), Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06N', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_OutUnit[1] )
    call ShowUnitShow( udg_OutUnit[1] )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_OutUnit[1] = GroupPickRandomUnit(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002)))
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(udg_OutUnit[1]), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportTarget.mdl" )
    call PauseUnitBJ( true, udg_OutUnit[1] )
    call ShowUnitHide( udg_OutUnit[1] )
    call SetUnitPositionLoc( udg_OutUnit[1], GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( udg_OutUnit[1], 100 )
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ( udg_OutUnit[1], 100 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 90.00 )
    call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_OutUnit[1] )
    call ShowUnitShow( udg_OutUnit[1] )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00D', Player(8), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Reinforcements Run T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01M', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002002001(), Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002001(), Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06N', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_OutUnit[2] )
    call ShowUnitShow( udg_OutUnit[2] )
    set udg_OutUnit[2] = GroupPickRandomUnit(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008002001002)))
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(udg_OutUnit[2]), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportTarget.mdl" )
    call PauseUnitBJ( true, udg_OutUnit[2] )
    call ShowUnitHide( udg_OutUnit[2] )
    call SetUnitPositionLoc( udg_OutUnit[2], GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( udg_OutUnit[2], 100 )
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ( udg_OutUnit[2], 100 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 90.00 )
    call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_OutUnit[2] )
    call ShowUnitShow( udg_OutUnit[2] )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00D', Player(9), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Arthas T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Arthas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Arthas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h02S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Arthas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Arthas_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Arthas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Arthas_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02S', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H003', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03Q', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03Q', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Arthas_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Arthas_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Arthas_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Arthas_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Arthas_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Arthas_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Arthas_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'H005' )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetHeroLevel(GetFilterUnit()) != 10 )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001002002001(), Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001002001(), Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnumUnit()) + 10 ), true )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100 )
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100 )
    call BlzEndUnitAbilityCooldown( GetEnumUnit(), 'AHhb' )
    call BlzEndUnitAbilityCooldown( GetEnumUnit(), 'AHds' )
    call BlzEndUnitAbilityCooldown( GetEnumUnit(), 'A081' )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'H005' )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001001002001(), Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001001002))) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07S', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001001002)), function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001A )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h044', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h044', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )

// Trigger: Muradin s Scouts T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Muradin_s_Scouts_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Muradin_s_Scouts_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Muradin_s_Scouts_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Muradin_s_Scouts_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Muradin_s_Scouts_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Muradin_s_Scouts_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05Z', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H00H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h044', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h044', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Muradin_s_Scouts_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Muradin_s_Scouts_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Muradin_s_Scouts_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Muradin_s_Scouts_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Muradin_s_Scouts_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Muradin_s_Scouts_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Muradin_s_Scouts_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then

    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true

        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Boats_Burners_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boats_Burners_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h034', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H00L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H00H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05U', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h05U', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05V', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h05V', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

endfunction

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H00H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05U', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h05U', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05V', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h05V', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Frostmourne T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'H00H' )
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001(), Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_WEAPON_SOUND, 0, 5 )
    call BlzSetUnitSkin( GetEnumUnit(), BlzGetUnitSkin(gg_unit_h022_0162) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 0, 5 )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 40 ), 0 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08H', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'ACce', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_WEAPON_SOUND, 0, 5 )
    call BlzSetUnitSkin( GetEnumUnit(), BlzGetUnitSkin(gg_unit_h022_0162) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 0, 5 )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 40 ), 0 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08H', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'ACce', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\FreezingBreath\\FreezingBreathMissile.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'H003'), function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'H00L'), function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func005A )
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04N', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Culling of Stratholme T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h03Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09V', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001(), Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09U', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001002001001(), Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001002002001(), Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001002001(), Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001001(), Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE))) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002001(), Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 100 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 100.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 2 ), 0 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08I', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable( GetEnumUnit(), true )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A015', GetEnumUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h001', Player(8), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponBooleanFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_BF_ATTACKS_ENABLED, 0, false )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ByeBye_T1) )
    call RemoveUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(1, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007001002002))), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007A )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'H005' )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001(), Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002() )
endfunction

    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 150 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 150.00 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08I', GetEnumUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 5 ), 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable( GetEnumUnit(), true )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), 0 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A015', GetEnumUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', Player(0), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponBooleanFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_BF_ATTACKS_ENABLED, 0, false )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ByeBye_T1) )
    call RemoveUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(1, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func008001002002))), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func008A )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09T', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetEnumUnit()) + 100 ) )
    call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 100.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION, ( BlzGetUnitRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION) + 2.00 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08I', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable( GetEnumUnit(), true )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), 0 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A015', GetEnumUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', Player(0), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponBooleanFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_BF_ATTACKS_ENABLED, 0, false )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ByeBye_T1) )
    call RemoveUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(1, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func008001002002))), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func008A )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A080', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001(), Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "stop" )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09U', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc( GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn) )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A003', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03Q', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Culling of Stratholme T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h03Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09V', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08I', GetEnumUnit() )

    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09T', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func008001002002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func008001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE))) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func008001002002001(), Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func008001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetEnumUnit()) + 100 ) )
    call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 100.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION, ( BlzGetUnitRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION) + 2.00 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08I', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable( GetEnumUnit(), true )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), 0 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A015', GetEnumUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', Player(0), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponBooleanFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_BF_ATTACKS_ENABLED, 0, false )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ByeBye_T1) )
    call RemoveUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(1, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func008001002002))), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func008A )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A080', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001(), Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "stop" )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09U', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc( GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn) )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A003', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03Q', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Village Roamers T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0) >= 110.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1) >= 110.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 2) >= 110.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002001(), Trig_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002002() )
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u000', Player(8), GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

function Trig_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07U', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'n029', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'u000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Village_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Scourge_Summoners_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A081', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08K', GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DeathCoil\\DeathCoilSpecialArt.mdl" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Scourge_Summoners_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06S', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n004', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Scourge_Summoners_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Scourge_Summoners_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Scourge_Summoners_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001(), Trig_Scourge_Summoners_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Scourge_Summoners_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A081', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08K', GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DeathCoil\\DeathCoilSpecialArt.mdl" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Scourge_Summoners_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06S', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n004', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Scourge_Summoners_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Scourge_Summoners_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Scourge_Summoners_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Scourge_Summoners_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Scourge_Summoners_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Scourge_Summoners_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Scourge_Summoners_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Scourge_Summoners_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

// Trigger: Skeleton Archers T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Skeleton_Archers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Skeleton_Archers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Skeleton_Archers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Skeleton_Archers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

endfunction

        return true

function Trig_Undead_Diversion_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Diversion_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Diversion_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Undead_Diversion_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Undead_Diversion_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Diversion_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 8 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 8.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Undead_Diversion_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07Q', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'u000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Undead_Diversion_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Undead_Diversion_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Guardian_Wyrm_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Guardian_Wyrm_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )

endfunction

function Trig_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A084', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

function Trig_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04S', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u00D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u00E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Grave_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    endif

endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Northrend_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Northrend_Roamers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A )

function Trig_Araj_the_Summoner_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h02R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Araj_the_Summoner_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Araj_the_Summoner_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_Araj_the_Summoner_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Araj_the_Summoner_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetFilterUnit()) > 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Araj_the_Summoner_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Araj_the_Summoner_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001(), Trig_Araj_the_Summoner_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Araj_the_Summoner_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A083', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A022', GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Heal Blue.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Araj_the_Summoner_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02R', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u007', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'u009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'U00C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Araj_the_Summoner_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_Araj_the_Summoner_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gargoyle Flock T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001(), Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GargoyleFlock1 = ( udg_GargoyleFlock1 + 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04O', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
    set udg_GargoyleFlock1 = ( udg_GargoyleFlock1 / 2 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( udg_GargoyleFlock1, 'u00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_GargoyleFlock1 = 0
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gargoyle Flock T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001(), Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GargoyleFlock2 = ( udg_GargoyleFlock2 + 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04O', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
    set udg_GargoyleFlock2 = ( udg_GargoyleFlock2 / 2 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( udg_GargoyleFlock2, 'u00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_GargoyleFlock2 = 0
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Gargoyle_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dark Conversion2 T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

        return false
    endif

        return false

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01M', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002001001(), Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetFilterUnit()) <= 700.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002002002001(), Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002002001(), Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002001(), Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001(), Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DarkRitual\\DarkRitualTarget.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call RemoveUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03S', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(2, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002))), function Trig_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( ( udg_DarkConvT1 + 2 ), 'n01G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_DarkConvT1 = ( udg_DarkConvT1 + 1 )
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Dark_Conversion2_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )

endfunction

function Trig_MalGanis_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_MalGanis_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MalGanis_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_MalGanis_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_MalGanis_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05R', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'u009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'U00A', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03S', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03S', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03T', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03T', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_MalGanis_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_MalGanis_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_MalGanis_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_MalGanis_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: March of the Scourge T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_March_of_the_Scourge_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_March_of_the_Scourge_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_March_of_the_Scourge_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_March_of_the_Scourge_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_March_of_the_Scourge_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05T', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'u007', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'u009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'u001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) - 8 ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_March_of_the_Scourge_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_March_of_the_Scourge_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u007', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

// Trigger: Kel Thuzard Guards T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then

        return true
    endif

    return true

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001002001001(), Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001002002001(), Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001002001(), Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001001(), Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetFilterUnit(), false) >= 25 )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001(), Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + 5.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05H', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'u006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(9999999, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002))), function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction
