    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001001(), Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetFilterUnit(), false) >= 25 )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001(), Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + 5.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05H', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'u006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(9999999, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002))), function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Kel_Thuzard_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spirit Towers T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h079' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func004Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( udg_MainStructureT1, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_MainStructureT1) + 5.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h079', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u00O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u00O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then

        return true

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h03Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Disease_Cloud_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Disease_Cloud_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Disease_Cloud_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03Y', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u011', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2DS1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 90.00, 'Bapl', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u011', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2DS2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 90.00, 'Bapl', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Grain Shipment T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GrainShipmentP1 = ( udg_GrainShipmentP1 + 3.00 )
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\AnimateDead\\AnimateDeadTarget.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit()) - udg_GrainShipmentP1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04R', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'h00M'), function Trig_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
    set udg_GrainShipmentP1 = 0.00
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03Y', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03Y', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'n01G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_T2D1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'n01G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_T2D2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Grain_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pleagued_Grains_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Pleagued_Grains_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pleagued_Grains_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06C', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'h00M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Storage2T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'h00M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Storage1T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06C', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h06C', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AARed Dragon Roost T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[4] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[3] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[2] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[1] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06I', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_T1B[1] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
        if ( Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func002C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            set udg_T1B[2] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        else
            if ( Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func002Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                set udg_T1B[3] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
            else
                if ( Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                    set udg_T1B[4] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
                else
                    call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAllies(Player(0)), "TRIGSTR_3729" )
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_T2B[1] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
        if ( Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005Func001C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            set udg_T2B[2] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        else
            if ( Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005Func001Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                set udg_T2B[3] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
            else
                if ( Trig_AARed_Dragon_Roost_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                    set udg_T2B[4] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
                else
                    call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAllies(Player(1)), "TRIGSTR_3728" )
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AARed_Dragon_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AARed_Dragon_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_AARed_Dragon_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AARed_Dragon_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06H', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) - 2 ) )
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AARed_Dragon_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AARed_Dragon_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AARed_Dragon_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AARed_Dragon_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_AARed_Dragon_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AARed_Dragon_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06H', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) - 2 ) )
endfunction

// Trigger: AATormentors T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AATormentors_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AATormentors_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AATormentors_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AATormentors_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_AATormentors_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AATormentors_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07K', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n00J', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00K', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AATormentors_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AATormentors_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AATormentors_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AATormentors_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AATormentors_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AATormentors_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AATormentors_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false

        return false

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01F', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01M', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002001(), Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002001(), Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001(), Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001(), Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01F', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001(), Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001(), Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h040', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002)), function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AADragon_Control_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AABook of Demon Lore T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h035' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002001 takes nothing returns boolean

endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Y', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002 takes nothing returns boolean

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002001(), Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Acri', GetEnumUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Auhf', GetEnumUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1) + 50.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 2 ), 0 )
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION, ( BlzGetUnitRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION) + 1 ) )
    if ( Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func004C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Acri', GetEnumUnit() )
    else
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'Acri', GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Acri', GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
    endif
    if ( Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func005C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Auhf', GetEnumUnit() )
    else
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'Auhf', GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Auhf', GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
    endif
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Call of Dread Green.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001(), Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001(), Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_STR, GetEnumUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 2 )
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetEnumUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 2 )
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetEnumUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 2 )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Call of Dread Green.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())) == false )
endfunction

    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A027', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001(), Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, ( BlzGetUnitRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE) + 1.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + 1.00 ) )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Call of Dread Green.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h035', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002)), function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AABook of Demon Lore T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h035' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Y', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002001(), Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002001(), Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Acri', GetEnumUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Auhf', GetEnumUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1) + 50.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 2 ), 0 )
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION, ( BlzGetUnitRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION) + 1 ) )
    if ( Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005Func004C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Acri', GetEnumUnit() )
    else
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'Acri', GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Acri', GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
    endif
    if ( Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005Func005C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Auhf', GetEnumUnit() )
    else
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'Auhf', GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Auhf', GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
    endif
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Call of Dread Green.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001(), Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001(), Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetEnumUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 2 )
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetEnumUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 2 )
    call ModifyHeroStat( bj_HEROSTAT_STR, GetEnumUnit(), bj_MODIFYMETHOD_ADD, 2 )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Call of Dread Green.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A027', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001(), Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001(), Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, ( BlzGetUnitRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE) + 1.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + 1.00 ) )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Call of Dread Green.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h035', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002)), function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AABook_of_Demon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AADemon Gate T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h03V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[4] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[3] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[2] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[1] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03V', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_T1B[1] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
        if ( Trig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func001C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            set udg_T1B[2] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        else
            if ( Trig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func001Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                set udg_T1B[3] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
            else
                if ( Trig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                    set udg_T1B[4] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
                else
                    call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAllies(Player(0)), "TRIGSTR_3727" )
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AADemon_Gate_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Gate_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03V', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_AADemon_Gate_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_T2B[1] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
        if ( Trig_AADemon_Gate_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005Func001C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            set udg_T2B[2] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        else
            if ( Trig_AADemon_Gate_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005Func001Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                set udg_T2B[3] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
            else
                if ( Trig_AADemon_Gate_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                    set udg_T2B[4] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
                else
                    call DisplayTextToForce( bj_FORCE_PLAYER[1], "TRIGSTR_3726" )
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1) + 50.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 2 ), 0 )
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION, ( BlzGetUnitRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION) + 1 ) )
    if ( Trig_AADemon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func004C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Awfb', GetEnumUnit() )
    else
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'Awfb', GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Acri', GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
    endif
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Call of Dread Green.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03W', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005001002)), function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func005A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AADemon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AADemon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AADemon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AADemon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AADemon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AADemon Lore T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h03W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Y', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002001(), Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002001(), Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Awfb', GetEnumUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1) + 50.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 2 ), 0 )
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION, ( BlzGetUnitRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION) + 1 ) )
    if ( Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005Func004C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Awfb', GetEnumUnit() )
    else
        call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'Awfb', GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('Acri', GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
    endif
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Call of Dread Green.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A027', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001(), Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001(), Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, ( BlzGetUnitRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE) + 1.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + 1.00 ) )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Call of Dread Green.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03W', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005001002)), function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func005A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AADemon_Lore_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AAWarlocks Visions T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AAWarlocks_Visions_T1_Copy_Copy_Func004Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AAWarlocks_Visions_T1_Copy_Copy_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AAWarlocks_Visions_T1_Copy_Copy_Func004Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AAWarlocks_Visions_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_AAWarlocks_Visions_T1_Copy_Copy_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AAWarlocks_Visions_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07V', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h059', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h059', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h059', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h059', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AAWarlocks_Visions_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AAWarlocks_Visions_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AAWarlocks_Visions_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AAWarlocks_Visions_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AAWarlocks_Visions_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AAWarlocks_Visions_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AAWarlocks_Visions_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AAFel_Empowerment_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_AAFel_Empowerment_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )

function Trig_AAFel_Empowerment_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, ( BlzGetUnitRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE) + 1.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + 1.00 ) )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Call of Dread Green.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_AAFel_Empowerment_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04F', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AAFel_Empowerment_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_AAFel_Empowerment_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AAFel_Empowerment_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_AAFel_Empowerment_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AAFel_Empowerment_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AAFel_Empowerment_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AAFel_Empowerment_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AAFel_Empowerment_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AAFel_Empowerment_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AAFel_Empowerment_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AAFel_Empowerment_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AAOrcish Pillagers T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AAOrcish_Pillagers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AAOrcish_Pillagers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h069' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AAOrcish_Pillagers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AAOrcish_Pillagers_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_AAOrcish_Pillagers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o003', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

function Trig_AARaiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06G', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o003', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Aens', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Aens', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 0) == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 1) == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 2) == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002001(), Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001(), Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001(), Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 10 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 10 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 10 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02Y', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'o009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

    return true

function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 0) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 1) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 2) == 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002001(), Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001(), Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001(), Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 5 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 5 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 5 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h031', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00A', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AABlackrock Warriors T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h031' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_AABlackrock_Warriors_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AABlackrock Scouts T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AABlackrock_Scouts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Scouts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h02Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AABlackrock_Scouts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Scouts_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_AABlackrock_Scouts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Scouts_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02Z', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O008', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08M', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08M', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08M', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08M', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08M', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08M', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
endfunction

    set gg_trg_AABlackrock_Scouts_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AABlackrock_Scouts_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h02W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08A', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08D', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 200 ) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08A', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08D', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 200 ) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08A', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 200 ) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08A', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )

    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08A', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction
