    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08D', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 200 ) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 1400 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02W', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00A', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Aens', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011A )
    if ( Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func012C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func012Func002001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func012Func002A )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Aens', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func012Func005001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func012Func005A )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func012Func007001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func012Func007A )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AABlackrock Defenders T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h02W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08A', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08D', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 200 ) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08A', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08D', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 200 ) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func011001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08A', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08D', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 200 ) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08A', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08D', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 200 ) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012Func005001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08A', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08D', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 200 ) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08A', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08D', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 200 ) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) == 1400 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02W', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00A', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Aens', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func011001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func011A )
    if ( Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012Func002001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012Func002A )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Aens', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012Func005001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012Func005A )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012Func007001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012Func007A )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AABlackrock_Defenders_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AABlackrock Invaders T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AABlackrock_Invaders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h02X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AABlackrock_Invaders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_AABlackrock_Invaders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) < 100.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Invaders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 1) + 1 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08G', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Invaders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) < 100.00 )
endfunction

    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08G', GetEnumUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 1) + 1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Invaders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) < 100.00 )
endfunction

    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08G', GetEnumUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 1) + 1 ) )
endfunction

    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) < 100.00 )
endfunction

    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 1) + 1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Invaders_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02X', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Invaders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Invaders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Invaders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Invaders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Invaders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Invaders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Invaders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func012001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Invaders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func012A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_AABlademaster_of_the_Blackrock_Clan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AABlademaster_of_the_Blackrock_Clan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h032' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AABlademaster_of_the_Blackrock_Clan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_AABlademaster_of_the_Blackrock_Clan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABlademaster_of_the_Blackrock_Clan_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h032', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O007', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n008', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1_Front), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AABlademaster_of_the_Blackrock_Clan_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AABlademaster_of_the_Blackrock_Clan_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AABlademaster_of_the_Blackrock_Clan_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AABlademaster_of_the_Blackrock_Clan_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AABlademaster_of_the_Blackrock_Clan_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: AASlave Shipment T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AASlave_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AASlave_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h072' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AASlave_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AASlave_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_AASlave_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AASlave_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h072', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n008', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n008', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n008', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_AASlave_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_AASlave_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AASlave_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AASlave_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AASlave_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AASlave_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AASlave_Shipment_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

// Trigger: AABlackrock Slavers T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06I' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h030' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08B', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001001(), Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), Player(0)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001(), Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01D', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002001001(), Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), Player(0)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002001(), Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 25 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 25.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001A )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h030', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n00D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002001001(), Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002001002() )

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), Player(1)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002001(), Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 25 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 25.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001A )
endfunction

function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h030', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n00D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_AABlackrock_Slavers_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shade T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) > 250 )
endfunction

function Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) < 600 )
endfunction

function Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001001(), Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001(), Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001(), Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitScalePercent( GetEnumUnit(), ( 100.00 + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) / 33.00 ) ), ( 100.00 + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) / 33.00 ) ), ( 100.00 + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) / 33.00 ) ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'ACev', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AR', GetEnumUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 50 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 50.00 ) )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\CarrionSwarm\\CarrionSwarmDamage.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06V', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u00K', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Shade_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01M', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002001(), Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001001(), Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE))) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001(), Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ( true, GetEnumUnit() )
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 'u00J', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\Darksummoning\\DarkSummonTarget.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call RemoveUnit( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h052', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(1, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002))), function Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u00J', Player(0), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1_Front), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Hidden_Cultist_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A001', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001(), Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002() )

endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, ( BlzGetUnitRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE) + 1.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07B', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u00N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u00N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summon Spirit Towers T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A001', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001(), Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), Player(1)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, ( BlzGetUnitRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE) + 1.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07B', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u00N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u00N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Summon_Spirit_Towers_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Total Destruction  T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Total_Destruction__T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Total_Destruction__T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Total_Destruction__T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Total_Destruction__T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Total_Destruction__T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Total_Destruction__T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local unit udg_Distructor
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07L', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'U00W', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_Distructor = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_Distructor, "farsight", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2DMid) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_Distructor, "earthquake", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2DMid) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 5.00 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A015', udg_Distructor )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_Distructor, "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ByeBye_T1) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call RemoveUnit( udg_Distructor )
    set udg_Distructor = null
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Total_Destruction__T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Total_Destruction__T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Total_Destruction__T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Total_Destruction__T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Total_Destruction__T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Total_Destruction__T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Total_Destruction__T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_Distructor, "farsight", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1DMid) )

    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_Distructor, "earthquake", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1DMid) )

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then

    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then

        return true

    return true

function Trig_Elves_Ambushers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Elves_Ambushers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Elves_Ambushers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Elves_Ambushers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001(), Trig_Elves_Ambushers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Elves_Ambushers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), Player(1)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Elves_Ambushers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Elves_Ambushers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Elves_Ambushers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Elves_Ambushers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'h00N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elves_Ambushers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Elves_Ambushers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001C() ) then
        call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) - 3.00 ) )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Elves_Ambushers__T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h049', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Elves_Ambushers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Elves_Ambushers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true

        return false
    endif

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crypt_Fiends__T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09O', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Crypt_Fiends__T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Aspo', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Crypt_Fiends__T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03P', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'u019', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Crypt_Fiends__T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Crypt_Fiends__T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Crypt_Fiends__T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Crypt_Fiends__T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )

function Trig_Northrend_Company__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 10 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 10.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Northrend_Company__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Northrend_Company__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002)), function Trig_Northrend_Company__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001A )
endfunction

function Trig_Northrend_Company__T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h064', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Northrend_Company__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Northrend_Company__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

function Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A085', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002001001(), Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), Player(0)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002001(), Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 10 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 10.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002)), function Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001A )
endfunction

function Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h064', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Northrend_Company__T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kel Thuzad s Guardians T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_s_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_s_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Kel_Thuzad_s_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_s_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Kel_Thuzad_s_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_s_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(udg_MainStructureT1) <= 50.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_s_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05G', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'u00D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u00E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    if ( Trig_Kel_Thuzad_s_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'u00D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u00E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Kel_Thuzad_s_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzad_s_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzad_s_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_s_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzad_s_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_s_Guardians_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Praying Gargoyles  T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func001Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) > udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func001Func006C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1 = GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit = GetEnumUnit()
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08X', udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit, ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit) / 2 ) )
        call BlzSetUnitArmor( udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit, 0.00 )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06D', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'u00Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect()), function Trig_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Praying_Gargoyles__T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Praying_Gargoyles__T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Praying_Gargoyles__T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Praying_Gargoyles__T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Praying_Gargoyles__T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Praying_Gargoyles__T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Praying_Gargoyles__T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Praying_Gargoyles__T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Crude Contraptions  T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h03O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 0) == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 1) == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 2) == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002001(), Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001(), Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001(), Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08S', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AR', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03O', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'u00L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Crude_Contraptions__T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Graveyard_Roamers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Graveyard_Roamers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Graveyard_Roamers__T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Graveyard_Roamers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Graveyard_Roamers__T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04T', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u018', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08P', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u018', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08P', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08P', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08P', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08P', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
endfunction

endfunction

    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08C', GetEnumUnit() )

    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'U00H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'u00L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Dalaran_Siegers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_Dalaran_Siegers__T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )

    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Dalaran_Siegers__T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Dalaran_Siegers__T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Dalaran_Siegers__T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Dalaran_Siegers__T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Arthas evil T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Arthas_evil_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Arthas_evil_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h02T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Arthas_evil_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Arthas_evil_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Arthas_evil_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Arthas_evil_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02T', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'U00H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u018', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Arthas_evil_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Arthas_evil_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Arthas_evil_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Arthas_evil_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Arthas_evil_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summoning Ritual T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summoning_Ritual_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Summoning_Ritual_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Summoning_Ritual_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summoning_Ritual_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Summoning_Ritual_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Summoning_Ritual_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07C', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'U00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04J', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h04J', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04J', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h04J', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h059', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h059', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Summoning_Ritual_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Summoning_Ritual_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Summoning_Ritual_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Elven Banshees  T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h046' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitIdType(GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001001(), Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), Player(0)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001(), Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 50 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 50.00 ) )
    call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 30.00 ) )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ), false )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 10 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 10 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 10 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h046', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'U00R', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u00S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T2_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 50 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 50.00 ) )
    call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 30.00 ) )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ), false )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 10 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 10 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 10 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h046', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_Elven_Banshees__T2_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'U00R', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'u00S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction
