//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kel Thuzad Lich  T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 'U00T', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetHeroLevel(GetEnumUnit()), false )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_VUnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05E', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_VUnitGroup = GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'U00M')
    if ( Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy_Func007C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'U00M'), function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func001A )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'U00T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T2_Copy_Copy_Func007Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 'U00T', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetLastReplacedUnitBJ(), GetHeroLevel(GetEnumUnit()), false )
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T2_Copy_Copy_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_VUnitGroup) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05E', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_VUnitGroup = GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(9), 'U00M')
    if ( Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T2_Copy_Copy_Func007C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(9), 'U00M'), function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T2_Copy_Copy_Func007Func001A )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'U00T', Player(9), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )

    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Kel_Thuzad_Lich__T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    if ( ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A04J' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Ghost_of_Kel_Thuzad__T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_of_Kel_Thuzad__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetHeroLevel(GetFilterUnit()) != 1 )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Ghost_of_Kel_Thuzad__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001002002001(), Trig_Ghost_of_Kel_Thuzad__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001002002002() )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Ghost_of_Kel_Thuzad__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001002001(), Trig_Ghost_of_Kel_Thuzad__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001002002() )
endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_of_Kel_Thuzad__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Ghost_of_Kel_Thuzad__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004001001002))) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ghost_of_Kel_Thuzad__T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05F', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Ghost_of_Kel_Thuzad__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Ghost_of_Kel_Thuzad__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001002)), function Trig_Ghost_of_Kel_Thuzad__T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003A )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'U00M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AR', GetEnumUnit() )
    endif
endfunction

    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 5, false )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04X', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h02Q', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), 405 )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), 400 )
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION, 1.20 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Aslo', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Aivs', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Aply', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), 405 )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), 400 )
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION, 1.20 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Adis', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Ainf', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), 405 )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), 400 )
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION, 1.20 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Adis', GetEnumUnit() )

    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), 405 )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), 400 )
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION, 1.20 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Auhf', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Acri', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h077', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'h01G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'h010'), function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'h011'), function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'h01G'), function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'h00B'), function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'h016'), function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'o00U'), function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Func012A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'o00S'), function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'u00S'), function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Func014A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'u00E'), function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Func015A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'u001'), function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Func016A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'e00X'), function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Func017A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'n00B'), function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Func018A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'n01C'), function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Func019A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sorceresses Leagues T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T2_Copy_Copy_Func004Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T2_Copy_Copy_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h077' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T2_Copy_Copy_Func004Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T2_Copy_Copy_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), 405 )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), 400 )
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION, 1.20 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Aslo', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Aivs', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Aply', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(9), 'o00U'), function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(9), 'o00S'), function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T2_Copy_Copy_Func013A )

    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(9), 'u00E'), function Trig_Sorceresses_Leagues_T2_Copy_Copy_Func015A )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pain Field T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pain_Field_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Pain_Field_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Pain_Field_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pain_Field_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Pain_Field_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pain_Field_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06A', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H01F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Guardian Elementals T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetHeroLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 10 )
endfunction

function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001001002001(), Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func003001001002))) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04X', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n012', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h01E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Guardian Elementals T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetHeroLevel(GetFilterUnit()) >= 10 )
endfunction

function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002001001002001(), Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002001001002))) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04X', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n012', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h01E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Guardian_Elementals_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

        return false
    endif

        return false
    endif

        return false
    endif

    if ( not ( udg_Random == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_Enhanced_Prisoner_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04A', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Enhanced_Prisoner_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00Y', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        if ( Trig_Enhanced_Prisoner_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n010', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        else
            if ( Trig_Enhanced_Prisoner_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002Func002C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

    call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 100.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetEnumUnit()) + 100 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Acor', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03M', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00X', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.02 )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 9)
    if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001A )
    else
        if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func001001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func001A )
        else
            if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func002001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func002A )
            else
                if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func001001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func001A )
                else
                    if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func001001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func001A )
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002A )
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                                call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func001001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func001A )
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                                    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func001001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func001A )
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                                        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001A )
                                    else
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 90.00 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03M', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03M', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 100.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetEnumUnit()) + 100 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Acor', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'n00X' )
endfunction

    call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 100.00 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'ACcl', GetEnumUnit() )

    if ( not ( udg_Random == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03M', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00X', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.02 )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 9)
    if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001A )
    else
        if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002C() ) then
            call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func001001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func001A )
        else
            if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002C() ) then
                call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func002001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func002A )
            else
                if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func001001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func001A )
                else
                    if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func001001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func001A )
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                            call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func002A )
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
                                call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func001001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func001A )
                            else
                                if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002C() ) then
                                    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func001001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func001A )
                                else
                                    if ( Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002C() ) then
                                        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001001002)), function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001Func002Func002Func001A )
                                    else
                                    endif
                                endif
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 90.00 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03M', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03M', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Council_Wizzard_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Anasterian Sunstrider The Last HopeT1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Anasterian_Sunstrider_The_Last_HopeT1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Anasterian_Sunstrider_The_Last_HopeT1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h02P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Anasterian_Sunstrider_The_Last_HopeT1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Anasterian_Sunstrider_The_Last_HopeT1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Anasterian_Sunstrider_The_Last_HopeT1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Anasterian_Sunstrider_The_Last_HopeT1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02P', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H01A', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H01C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Anasterian_Sunstrider_The_Last_HopeT1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Anasterian_Sunstrider_The_Last_HopeT1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Anasterian_Sunstrider_The_Last_HopeT1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Anasterian_Sunstrider_The_Last_HopeT1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Anasterian_Sunstrider_The_Last_HopeT1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Doril MagefontT1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h03Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnumUnit()) + 3 ), true )
endfunction

function Trig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03Z', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h010', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H018', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Doril_MagefontT1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Doril MagefontT2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h03Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnumUnit()) + 3 ), true )
endfunction

function Trig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03Z', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h010', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H018', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Doril_MagefontT2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true

        return true
    endif

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n00W', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

// Trigger: Nilas ArcanisterT1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h063' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h063', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h016', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H015', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy_Func009C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h053', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h053', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func003C() ) then
            call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h045', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h045', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func003Func003C() ) then
                call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h070', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h070', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Nilas_ArcanisterT1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h02U', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04D', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h04D', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n00S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H014', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09N', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
endfunction

    return true
endfunction

function Trig_LandazarT2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05N', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n00S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H014', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09N', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_LandazarT2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_LandazarT2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_LandazarT2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_LandazarT2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_LandazarT2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_LandazarT2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_LandazarT2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sky Fury TowerT1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sky_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Sky_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h070' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Sky_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Sky_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sky_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Sky_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Sky_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Sky_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001(), Trig_Sky_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002() )

endfunction

function Trig_Sky_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0A2', GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Demon\\DemonBoltImpact\\DemonBoltImpact.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Sky_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h070', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Sky_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Sky_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Earth_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002001(), Trig_Earth_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002002() )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Earth_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001(), Trig_Earth_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002() )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0A0', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Earth_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h045', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00U', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n00U', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Earth_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Earth_Fury_TowerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01C', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n00T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Dragonhaws_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Dragonhaws_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )

    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01C', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Dragonhaws_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h041', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n00T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Dragonhaws_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Dragonhaws_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragonhaws_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragonhaws_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Dragonhaws_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Dragonhaws_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Dragonhaws_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Dragonhaws_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Dragonhaws_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Elven SiegersT1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h048' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) > 250 )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) < 600 )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001(), Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001(), Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitScalePercent( GetEnumUnit(), ( 100.00 + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) / 33.00 ) ), ( 100.00 + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) / 33.00 ) ), ( 100.00 + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) / 33.00 ) ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0A9', GetEnumUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 50 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 50.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h048', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Elven_SiegersT1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: FarstridersT1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy_Func012002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy_Func012002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy_Func012002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy_Func012002002001(), Trig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy_Func012002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy_Func015A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\ReplenishHealth\\ReplenishHealthCasterOverhead.mdl" )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) / 2 ) ) )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetEnumUnit()) + ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetEnumUnit()) / 2 ) ) )
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitManaPercent(GetEnumUnit()) + 75.00 ) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit()) + 75.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) / 2 ) ), 0 )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) / 2 ) ), 1 )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) / 2 ) ), 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04D', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n00S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h011', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_NeFarstriderGroupT1 = GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy_Func012002002))
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_OuoetT1 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_FarstriderGroupT1, function Trig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy_Func015A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_FarstridersT1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_FarstridersT2_Copy_Copy_Func015A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\ReplenishHealth\\ReplenishHealthCasterOverhead.mdl" )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) / 2 ) ) )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetEnumUnit()) + ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetEnumUnit()) / 2 ) ) )
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitManaPercent(GetEnumUnit()) + 75.00 ) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit()) + 75.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) / 2 ) ), 0 )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) / 2 ) ), 1 )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) / 2 ) ), 1 )
endfunction

    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04D', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n00S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h011', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_NeFarstriderGroupT2 = GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_FarstridersT2_Copy_Copy_Func012002002))
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_OuoetT2 )

    set gg_trg_High_Elven_Guard_TowerT2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_High_Elven_Guard_TowerT2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_High_Elven_Guard_TowerT2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_High_Elven_Guard_TowerT2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_High_Elven_Guard_TowerT2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_High_Elven_Guard_TowerT2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Elven DefendersT1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h047' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func005Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func003001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08A', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = ( udg_Random + 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random >= 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 0) == 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0) + 200.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random >= 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random >= 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h047', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    set udg_Random = 0
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func003001002)), function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func003A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func008C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h08I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h010', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func009C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 5, 'n00Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n00Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func010C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002)), function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001A )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Func011C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 5, 'h00Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H00Y', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Elven_DefendersT1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Elven_DefendersT2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h047', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    set udg_Random = 0
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Elven_DefendersT2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Elven_DefendersT2_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
    if ( Trig_Elven_DefendersT2_Copy_Copy_Func008C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h08I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h010', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Elven_DefendersT2_Copy_Copy_Func009C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 5, 'n00Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n00Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
    if ( Trig_Elven_DefendersT2_Copy_Copy_Func010C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Elven_DefendersT2_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002)), function Trig_Elven_DefendersT2_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001A )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Elven_DefendersT2_Copy_Copy_Func011C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 5, 'h00Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H00Y', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
    endif
endfunction

// Trigger: Sylvanas WindrunnerT1 Copy Copy

function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001(), Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(9) )
endfunction

function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func004001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AR', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func004001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func004001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func004001002001(), Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func004001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 20 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 20.00 ) )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\Feedback\\SpellBreakerAttack.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 20 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 20.00 ) )
    call SetHeroXP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( GetHeroXP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 300 ), true )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func004001002)), function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func004A )
endfunction

function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07D', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H00Y', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_T1_Region, Condition(function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Sylvanas_WindrunnerT1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

        return true

endfunction

endfunction
