endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Champions_of_TruthT1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001(), Trig_Champions_of_TruthT1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT1_Copy_Copy_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0A4', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AQ', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03H', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00W', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H00X', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Champions_of_TruthT1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Champions_of_TruthT1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Champions_of_TruthT1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Champions_of_TruthT1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Champions_of_TruthT1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Champions of TruthT2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h03H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetFilterUnit()) >= 600.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002001(), Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Func010001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001(), Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0A4', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AQ', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03H', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00W', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H00X', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Champions_of_TruthT2_Copy_Copy_Actions )

endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002001002002001(), Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002001002 takes nothing returns boolean

function Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002001001(), Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerAlly(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), Player(0)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01M', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002002001(), Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002001(), Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\HealingWave\\HealingWaveTarget.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(4, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001001002002))), function Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001A )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03I', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'h00S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_Champions_of_the_LightT1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h03G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) > 250 )
endfunction

    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) < 600 )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001(), Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002() )

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitScalePercent( GetEnumUnit(), ( 100.00 + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) / 33.00 ) ), ( 100.00 + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) / 33.00 ) ), ( 100.00 + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) / 33.00 ) ) )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 50 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 50.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 100.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002001(), Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002002() )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001(), Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func001001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) > 250 )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func001001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) < 600 )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func001001002001001(), Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func001001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func001001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func001001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func001001002002001(), Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func001001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func001001002001(), Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, ( BlzGetUnitRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE) + 0.10 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func001001002)), function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009Func001A )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03G', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H00U', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Champions of PeaceT2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h03G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) > 250 )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) < 600 )
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT2_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitScalePercent( GetEnumUnit(), ( 100.00 + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) / 33.00 ) ), ( 100.00 + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) / 33.00 ) ), ( 100.00 + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) / 33.00 ) ) )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 50 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 50.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Champions_of_PeaceT2_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetFilterUnit()) >= 100.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Militia_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Militia_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 6, 'h00S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Vandermar_s_Guard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Vandermar_s_Guard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Vandermar_s_Guard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Vandermar_s_Guard_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07T', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h00R', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(udg_MainStructureT1) - R2I(GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_MainStructureT1)) ) ) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Vandermar_s_Guard_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )

endfunction

function Trig_Town_Guard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08A', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Town_Guard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

function Trig_Town_Guard_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07M', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h00D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Town_Guard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Town_Guard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Town_Guard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Town_Guard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Town_Guard_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Town_Guard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Town_Guard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08A', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Town_Guard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

function Trig_Town_Guard_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07M', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h00D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Town_Guard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Town_Guard_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Town_Guard_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Town_Guard_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Town_Guard_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Town_Guard_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Town_Guard_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Town_Guard_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Town_Guard_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Corrupted Grom T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Corrupted_Grom_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Corrupted_Grom_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h03L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Corrupted_Grom_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Corrupted_Grom_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Corrupted_Grom_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03L', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O01F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 10, false )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AOmi' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AOmi' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AOmi' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AOcr' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AOcr' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AOcr' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AOwk' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AOwk' )
    call SelectHeroSkill( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 'AOwk' )
endfunction

function Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) >= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05D', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008C() ) then
        call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) - 5 ) )
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
        if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func003C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n02F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        else
            if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func003Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n02E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            else
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n02D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            endif
        endif
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 4)
        if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func005C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n02G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        else
            if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func005Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n02K', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            else
                if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func005Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n02H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                else
                    if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func005Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n02I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                    else
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n02J', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
        if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func007C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n02L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        else
            if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func007Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n02M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            else
                if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func007Func001Func002C() ) then
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n02O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                else
                endif
            endif
        endif
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05D', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008C() ) then
        call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, ( GetPlayerState(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD) - 5 ) )
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
        if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func003C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n02F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        else
            if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func003Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n02E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            else
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n02D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            endif
        endif
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 4)
        if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func005C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n02G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        else
            if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func005Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n02K', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            else

                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n02H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )

                    if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func005Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n02I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                    else
                        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n02J', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
        if ( Trig_Kalimdor_Demons_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func007C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n02L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )

            endif
        endif

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

        return false

        return false
    endif

function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetFilterUnit()) >= 600.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001(), Trig_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'ACce', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04I', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n01A', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fel Raiders T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Fel_Raiders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Fel_Raiders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetFilterUnit()) >= 600.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Raiders_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean

endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy_Func032C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06F', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0242 )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0242, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1DMid) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0242, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Middle) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001Func001C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0242, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2DMid) )
            else
                call DoNothing(  )
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0242 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0242 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0242 )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy_Func016C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0242, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1DMid) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy_Func016Func001C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0242, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Middle) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy_Func016Func001Func001C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0242, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2DMid) )
            else
                call DoNothing(  )
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0242 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0242 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0242 )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy_Func024C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0242, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1DMid) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy_Func024Func001C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0242, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Middle) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy_Func024Func001Func001C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0242, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2DMid) )
            else
                call DoNothing(  )
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0242 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0242 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0242 )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy_Func032C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0242, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1DMid) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy_Func032Func001C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0242, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Middle) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy_Func032Func001Func001C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0242, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2DMid) )
            else
                call DoNothing(  )
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0242 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0242 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )

endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06F', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0243 )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0243, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2DMid) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0243, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Middle) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func002Func001C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0243, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1DMid) )
            else
                call DoNothing(  )
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0243 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0243 )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T2_Copy_Copy_Func014C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0243, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2DMid) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T2_Copy_Copy_Func014Func002C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0243, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Middle) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T2_Copy_Copy_Func014Func002Func001C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0243, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1DMid) )
            else
                call DoNothing(  )
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0243 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0243 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0243 )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T2_Copy_Copy_Func022C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0243, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2DMid) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T2_Copy_Copy_Func022Func002C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0243, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Middle) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T2_Copy_Copy_Func022Func002Func001C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0243, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1DMid) )
            else
                call DoNothing(  )
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0243 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0243 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0243 )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T2_Copy_Copy_Func030C() ) then
        call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0243, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2DMid) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T2_Copy_Copy_Func030Func002C() ) then
            call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0243, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Middle) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Rain_of_Chaos_T2_Copy_Copy_Func030Func002Func001C() ) then
                call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( gg_unit_h01Y_0243, "dreadlordinferno", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1DMid) )
            else
                call DoNothing(  )
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0243 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A01R', gg_unit_h01Y_0243 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fel Orc Guards T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fel_Orc_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Orc_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Fel_Orc_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Orc_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Fel_Orc_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Orc_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) - 2.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Orc_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04H', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n015', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_T1_Region, Player(9)), function Trig_Fel_Orc_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean

    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetFilterUnit()) >= 600.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0) <= 150.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002001(), Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001(), Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001(), Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 0, 5 )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 1, 5 )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 2, 5 )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 3, 5 )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04G', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 7, 'n017', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Fel_Grunts_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Warlocks_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AO', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AP', GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\ANrm\\ANrmTarget.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Warlocks_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04K', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n01C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Warlocks_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Fel_Warlocks_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic( gg_trg_Fel_Warlocks_T1_Copy_Copy, 2 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Fel_Warlocks_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )

    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitIdType(GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001(), Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), Player(0)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitIdType(GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002001001(), Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), Player(0)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002001(), Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 2 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 2 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 2 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001001002)), function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001A )
endfunction

function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h060', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e003', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e00G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Night Elf Flock T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h060' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Night_Elf_Flock_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Offensive Protectors T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Offensive_Protectors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Offensive_Protectors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h066' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Offensive_Protectors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Offensive_Protectors_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Offensive_Protectors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Offensive_Protectors_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h066', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e00E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AH', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AH', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Offensive_Protectors_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Offensive_Protectors_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Offensive_Protectors_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Offensive_Protectors_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )

endfunction

// Trigger: Tree of Life T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[4] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[3] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[2] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[1] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A028', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001002001(), Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001001(), Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), Player(0)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001(), Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Unitnumber = ( udg_Unitnumber + 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Unitnumber >= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Unitnumber >= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Unitnumber >= 20 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07N', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e007', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_T1B[1] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
        if ( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e007', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            set udg_T1B[2] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        else
            if ( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e007', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                set udg_T1B[3] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
            else
                if ( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e007', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                    set udg_T1B[4] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
                else
                    call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAllies(Player(0)), "TRIGSTR_3779" )
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
    if ( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Atau', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, 1.00 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'ACce', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 4.00 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Awar', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2000 )
        call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2000.00 )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tree of Life T2 Copy Copy

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    set udg_Unitnumber = ( udg_Unitnumber + 1 )

    if ( not ( udg_Unitnumber >= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_Unitnumber >= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not ( udg_Unitnumber >= 20 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07N', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e007', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_T2B[1] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
        if ( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e007', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            set udg_T2B[2] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        else
            if ( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e007', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                set udg_T2B[3] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
            else
                if ( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e007', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                    set udg_T2B[4] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
                else
                    call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAllies(Player(1)), "TRIGSTR_3778" )
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
    if ( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Atau', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, 1.00 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'ACce', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 4.00 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Awar', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
        call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2000 )
        call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2000.00 )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function InitTrig_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Tree_of_Life_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Forest Spirits T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001(), Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(9) )
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc( GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1_Front) )
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100 )
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'n01U'), function Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001A )
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04L', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n01U', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_T1_Region, Condition(function Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Forest_Spirits_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction
