//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Moonhunters T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetTimeOfDay() >= 18.00 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTimeOfDay() <= 6.00 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05X', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Middle), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Middle), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Middle), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Moonhunters_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Moonhunters T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetTimeOfDay() >= 18.00 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTimeOfDay() <= 6.00 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func007C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05X', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Middle), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Middle), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Middle), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Moonhunters_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shadowleaves T1 Copy Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001(), Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001(), Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AJ', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AR', GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\FlakCannons\\FlakTarget.mdl" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06W', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 7, 'e001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Shadowleaves_T1_Copy_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Nightblades T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h062' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetTimeOfDay() >= 18.00 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTimeOfDay() <= 6.00 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func002001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitIdType(GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true )
endfunction

function Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func002001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func002001002001001(), Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func002001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), Player(0)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func002001002001(), Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 1 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 1 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h062', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e004', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e004', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'e001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    if ( Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func002001002)), function Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010Func002A )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Nightblades_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Nightblades_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 1 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 1 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Nightblades_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Nightblades_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Nightblades_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h062', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e004', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e004', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'e001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    if ( Trig_Nightblades_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Nightblades_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010Func002001002)), function Trig_Nightblades_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010Func002A )
    else
    endif
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), Player(0)) == true )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Hippogryph_Riders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001(), Trig_Hippogryph_Riders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002() )
endfunction

    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AK', GetEnumUnit() )

    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h054', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e003', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Hippogryph_Riders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Hippogryph_Riders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07F', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h01W', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h01W', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h01W', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002)), function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h01W', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002)), function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013A )
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Talon s Peak Guards T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_FLYING) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE, ( BlzGetUnitRealField(GetLastCreatedUnit(), UNIT_RF_HIT_POINTS_REGENERATION_RATE) + 1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07F', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h01W', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h01W', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h01W', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func011001002)), function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func011A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h01W', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func013001002)), function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Func013A )
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Talon_s_Peak_Guards_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kul Tiras Elite Corps T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kul_Tiras_Elite_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Kul_Tiras_Elite_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

        return false
    endif

        return false

endfunction

    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Kul_Tiras_Elite_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Kul_Tiras_Elite_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002001(), Trig_Kul_Tiras_Elite_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002002() )

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Kul_Tiras_Elite_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001(), Trig_Kul_Tiras_Elite_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Kul_Tiras_Elite_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AF', GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Weapons\\FrostWyrmMissile\\FrostWyrmMissile.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Kul_Tiras_Elite_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05M', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'h01V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'h011', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Kul_Tiras_Elite_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Kul_Tiras_Elite_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
endfunction

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Lordaeron_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Lordaeron_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lordaeron_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Lordaeron_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lordaeron_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05P', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H01U', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AG', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

function InitTrig_Lordaeron_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lordaeron_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Lordaeron_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Lordaeron_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Lordaeron_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Lordaeron_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Lordaeron_Corps_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lordaeron Corps T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lordaeron_Corps_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Lordaeron_Corps_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Lordaeron_Corps_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lordaeron_Corps_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Lordaeron_Corps_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lordaeron_Corps_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05P', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H01U', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0AG', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lordaeron_Corps_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lordaeron_Corps_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Lordaeron_Corps_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Lordaeron_Corps_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Lordaeron_Corps_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Lordaeron_Corps_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Lordaeron_Corps_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gilneas Brigade T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then

    if ( not Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001001(), Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(9) )
endfunction

function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001(), Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0AR', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001(), Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetLastCreatedUnit()) / 2.00 ) ) ) )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\CrushingWave\\CrushingWaveDamage.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04P', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H01T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_T1_Region, Condition(function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Gilneas_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Human_Expedition_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Human_Expedition_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h056' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Human_Expedition_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Human_Expedition_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Human_Expedition_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Human_Expedition_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + 2.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Human_Expedition_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h056', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H01S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h011', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h00C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(gg_rct_T2_Region, Player(8)), function Trig_Human_Expedition_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
endfunction

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

        return false

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001001(), Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(9) )
endfunction

function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001(), Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = ( udg_Random + 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07A', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H01R', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'h00S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_T1_Region, Condition(function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( ( udg_Random / 2 ), 'h01J', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_Random = 0
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001001(), Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(8) )
endfunction

function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001(), Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = ( udg_Random + 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07A', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H01R', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'h00S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_T2_Region, Condition(function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( ( udg_Random / 2 ), 'h01J', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_Random = 0
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Stromgarde_Brigade_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unstopable Centaurs T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01Q', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002001(), Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Piercing Thrust Yellow.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A01Q', GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01Q', GetEnumUnit()) + 2 ) )
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetEnumUnit()) + 30.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07R', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002)), function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func016001002)), function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func016A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func019001002)), function Trig_Unstopable_Centaurs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func019A )
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01Q', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002001(), Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Piercing Thrust Yellow.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A01Q', GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01Q', GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetEnumUnit()) + 15.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03D', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 7)
    if ( Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03A', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03A', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004C() ) then
            call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03B', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03B', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004Func004C() ) then
                call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03C', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03C', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
            else
                if ( Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004Func004Func003C() ) then
                    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03E', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03E', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                else
                    if ( Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004Func004Func003Func003C() ) then
                        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03F', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03F', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004Func004Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                            call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07G', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07G', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004Func004Func003Func003Func003Func003C() ) then
                                call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07R', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07R', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                            else
                                call DoNothing(  )
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002)), function Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Centaur_Khan_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Khan_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Khan_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h03D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Centaur_Khan_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Centaur_Khan_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetEnumUnit()) + 15.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Khan_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03D', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 7)
    if ( Trig_Centaur_Khan_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03A', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03A', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Centaur_Khan_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004C() ) then
            call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03B', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03B', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Centaur_Khan_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004Func004C() ) then
                call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03C', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03C', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
            else
                if ( Trig_Centaur_Khan_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004Func004Func003C() ) then
                    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03E', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03E', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                else
                    if ( Trig_Centaur_Khan_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004Func004Func003Func001C() ) then
                        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03F', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03F', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                    else
                        if ( Trig_Centaur_Khan_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004Func004Func003Func001Func003C() ) then
                            call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07G', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07G', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                        else
                            if ( Trig_Centaur_Khan_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004Func004Func003Func001Func003Func001C() ) then
                                call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07R', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07R', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                            else
                                call DoNothing(  )
                            endif
                        endif
                    endif
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Centaur_Khan_T2_Copy_Copy_Func011001002)), function Trig_Centaur_Khan_T2_Copy_Copy_Func011A )
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Guard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "stop" )
endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Guard_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03B', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01R', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Centaur_Guard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Centaur_Guard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Centaur_Guard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002)), function Trig_Centaur_Guard_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011A )
endfunction

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )

    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Centaur_Impalers_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Centaur_Impalers_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Centaur Impalers T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h03C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01Q', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002001(), Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Piercing Thrust Yellow.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A01Q', GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01Q', GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetEnumUnit()) + 15.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03C', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Centaur_Impalers_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetEnumUnit()) + 30.00 ) )

function Trig_Centaur_Waves_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03F', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Centaur_Waves_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_Centaur_Waves_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Centaur_Waves_T1_Copy_Copy_Func015001002)), function Trig_Centaur_Waves_T1_Copy_Copy_Func015A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Centaur_Waves_T1_Copy_Copy_Func020001002)), function Trig_Centaur_Waves_T1_Copy_Copy_Func020A )
endfunction

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Centaur_Waves_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_Centaur_Waves_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Centaur_Waves_T2_Copy_Copy_Func015001002)), function Trig_Centaur_Waves_T2_Copy_Copy_Func015A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n01O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Centaur_Outrunners_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Centaur_Outrunners_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Centaur_Outrunners_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Centaur_Outrunners_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Centaur_Outrunners_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Centaur_Outrunners_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Centaur_Outrunners_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Centaur_Outrunners_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Centaur_Outrunners_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tauren Killers T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tauren_Killers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Tauren_Killers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Tauren_Killers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tauren_Killers_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Tauren_Killers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tauren_Killers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Tauren_Killers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01Q', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Tauren_Killers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Tauren_Killers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002001(), Trig_Tauren_Killers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Tauren_Killers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Piercing Thrust Yellow.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A01Q', GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01Q', GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetEnumUnit()) + 15.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Tauren_Killers_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07G', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n01M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Tauren_Killers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_Tauren_Killers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Drudges_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Piercing Thrust Yellow.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped( 'A01Q', GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01Q', GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetEnumUnit()) + 15.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Centaur_Drudges_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03A', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Centaur_Drudges_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Centaur_Drudges_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 29.50 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03A', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03A', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 150.50 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03A', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h03A', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

// Trigger: Greedyfingers Aid T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[4] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[3] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[2] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[1] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04U', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n013', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    if ( Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n014', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_T1B[1] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
        if ( Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func002C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n014', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            set udg_T1B[2] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        else
            if ( Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func002Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n014', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                set udg_T1B[3] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
            else
                if ( Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n014', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                    set udg_T1B[4] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
                else
                    call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAllies(Player(0)), "TRIGSTR_3777" )
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04U', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n013', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    if ( Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n014', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_T2B[1] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
        if ( Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007Func001C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n014', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            set udg_T2B[2] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        else
            if ( Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007Func001Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n014', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                set udg_T2B[3] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
            else
                if ( Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n014', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                    set udg_T2B[4] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
                else
                    call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAllies(Player(1)), "TRIGSTR_3776" )
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Greedyfingers_Aid_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Greedyfingers_Aid_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Greedyfingers_Aid_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Greedyfingers_Aid_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Greedyfingers_Aid_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Shredders T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shredders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Shredders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06X' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Shredders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Shredders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06X', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n013', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Warsong Lumbercutters T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
