function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09Z', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001(), Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAlly(GetFilterUnit(), Player(0)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Asal', GetEnumUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 0, 4 )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 1, 4 )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 2, 4 )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 3, 4 )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) / 2 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) / 2 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) / 2 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 3, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 3) / 2 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07Y', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o00S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o00M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Asal', GetEnumUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 0, 4 )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 1, 4 )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 2, 4 )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 3, 4 )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) / 2 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) / 2 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) / 2 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 3, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 3) / 2 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07Y', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o00S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o00M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Warsong_Lumbercutters_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Witch Doctors T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h081' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 0) == 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 1) == 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 2) == 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002001(), Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001001(), Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001(), Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0A8', GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Items\\ResourceItems\\ResourceEffectTarget.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h081', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o00U', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o00U', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Witch_Doctors_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Warsong Offensive T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), Player(0)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A003', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A001', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002001(), Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001(), Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A003', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "stop" )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07Z', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00R', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'o000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(3, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002))), function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Warsong Offensive T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), Player(1)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A003', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A001', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002001(), Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001(), Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A003', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "stop" )
endfunction

function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07Z', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00R', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'o000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(3, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002))), function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Warsong_Offensive_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Grom Hellscream T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04V' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04V', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07W', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07W', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002C() ) then
            call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h080', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h080', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func002Func002C() ) then
                call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07X', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07X', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
            else
                call DoNothing(  )
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00R', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04V', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07W', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07W', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004C() ) then
            call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h080', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h080', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        else
            if ( Trig_Grom_Hellscream_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004Func004C() ) then
                call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07X', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
                call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07X', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
            else
                call DoNothing(  )
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00R', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o00G', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Kodo_Beast_T2_Copy_Copy_Func004Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kodo_Beast_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Kodo_Beast_T2_Copy_Copy_Func004C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kodo_Beast_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05K', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00Q', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Wards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Healing_Wards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Wards_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Healing_Wards_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Healing_Wards_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04Z', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1DS2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 30.00, 'Bhwd', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1DS1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 30.00, 'Bhwd', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Healing_Wards_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Healing_Wards_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Healing_Wards_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Healing_Wards_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Healing_Wards_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Healing_Wards_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'o005' )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001(), Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Heal Green.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 'n015', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04E', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func012001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func012A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func014001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func014A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func015001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func015A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func016001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func016A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func017001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func017A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func018001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func018A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func019001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func019A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func020001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func020A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func021001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func021A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func022001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func022A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func023001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func023A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func024001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func024A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func025001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Func025A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fel Corruption T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func020001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'O008' )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func020001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

endfunction

    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Heal Green.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 'O010', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
endfunction

    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\Heal Green.mdx" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 'O01M', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04E', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func009A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func011001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func011A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func012A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func013001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func013A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func014001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func014A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func015001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func015A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func016001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func016A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func017001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func017A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func018001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func018A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func019001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func019A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func020001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func020A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func021001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func021A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func022001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func022A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func023001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func023A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func024001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func024A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func025001002)), function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Func025A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Fel_Corruption_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: River Run T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), Player(0)) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A000', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002001(), Trig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetEnumUnit() )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "stop" )
endfunction

function Trig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06O', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(5, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002))), function Trig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_River_Run_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: River Run T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_River_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_River_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h06O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_River_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_River_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_River_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(5, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_River_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002002))), function Trig_River_Run_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A )

endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002001001(), Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00A', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002001(), Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002001(), Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001001(), Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE))) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001(), Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01J', GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\DeathPact\\DeathPactCaster.mdl" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h078', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(1, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002))), function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

// Trigger: Soul Crystal T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Soul_Crystal_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h078' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Soul_Crystal_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Soul_Crystal_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Bloodhoofs Defenders T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Bloodhoofs_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Bloodhoofs_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h033' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Bloodhoofs_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bloodhoofs_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Bloodhoofs_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bloodhoofs_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ShowUnitShow( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Bloodhoofs_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h033', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00J', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_HordeUnity1Aval = true
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'ncop'), function Trig_Bloodhoofs_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bloodhoofs_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bloodhoofs_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Bloodhoofs_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Bloodhoofs_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Bloodhoofs_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Bloodhoofs_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Bloodhoofs_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ShowUnitShow( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func018A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ShowUnitShow( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h067', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o016', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o017', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_HordeUnity1Aval = true
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'ncop'), function Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 89.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'o00P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_HordeUnity1Aval = true
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'ncop'), function Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func018A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Oracle_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Oracle_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Oracle_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Oracle_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h067' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ShowUnitShow( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func018A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ShowUnitShow( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h067', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o009', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o016', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o017', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_HordeUnity2Aval = true
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(9), 'ncop'), function Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func013A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 89.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'o00P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_HordeUnity2Aval = true
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(9), 'ncop'), function Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func018A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Oracle_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Oracle_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Oracle_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Oracle_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Oracle_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Oracle_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tauren s Aid T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07H', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
    if ( Trig_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h033', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h033', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func004C() ) then
            call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05L', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h05L', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        else
        endif
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o012', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Tauren_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kodos Defenders T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ShowUnitShow( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetFilterUnit()) >= 600.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002002001(), Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002001(), Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Atau', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05L', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O00O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00K', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_HordeUnity1Aval = true
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'ncop'), function Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func010A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002)), function Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011A )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 29.50 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05K', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h05K', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Kodos_Defenders_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Agressive Ancients T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h02N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetEnumUnit()) + 30.00 ) )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
    if ( Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func003C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01W', GetEnumUnit() )
    else
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01V', GetEnumUnit() )
    endif
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "unroot" )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 4.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn) )
endfunction

function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02N', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e00E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetEnumUnit()) + 30.00 ) )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
    if ( Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func003C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01W', GetEnumUnit() )
    else
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01V', GetEnumUnit() )
    endif
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "unroot" )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 4.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn) )
endfunction

function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02N', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e00E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tyrande Wisperwind T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07O', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'E00H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
    if ( Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07N', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h07N', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func003C() ) then
            call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06U', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
            call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h06U', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    if ( Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007C() ) then
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07N', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    else
        if ( Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007Func002C() ) then
            call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h06U', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h02U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 0) == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 1) == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 2) == 3 )
endfunction

function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001002001(), Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001001(), Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001(), Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001(), Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A0A3', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02U', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Ballistas_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02U', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Ballistas_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_Ballistas_T2_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Ballistas_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Ballistas_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Ballistas_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09L', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09L', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09L', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09L', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
endfunction
