function Trig_Thrall_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Thrall_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ShowUnitShow( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Thrall_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07J', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Thrall_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o01N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O01L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        if ( Trig_Thrall_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func001C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O01L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o01N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        else
            if ( Trig_Thrall_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007Func001Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O01L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o01N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_HordeUnity1Aval = true
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'ncop'), function Trig_Thrall_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011A )
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Thrall_s_Aid_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )

        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o01N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O01L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        if ( Trig_Thrall_s_Aid_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007Func001C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O01L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o01N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        else
            if ( Trig_Thrall_s_Aid_T2_Copy_Copy_Func007Func001Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O01L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o01N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )

        endif
    endif

endfunction

function Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[2] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[1] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02V', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n025', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_T1B[1] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
        if ( Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n025', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            set udg_T1B[2] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        else
            if ( Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n025', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                set udg_T1B[3] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
            else
                if ( Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n025', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                    set udg_T1B[4] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
                else
                    call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAllies(Player(0)), "TRIGSTR_3781" )
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Barrow_Den_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Barrow_Den_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Barrow_Den_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Barrow_Den_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Barrow_Den_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true

        return true

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'E00O' )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001(), Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 'E00M', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
endfunction

    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00Q' )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

endfunction

    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 'e00P', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
endfunction

    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00S' )
endfunction

endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 'e00R', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h055', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Copy_Copy_Func007A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

endfunction

        return true
    endif

        return true

function Trig_Malfurion_Stormrage_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05S', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'E00M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 6, 'e00N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h055', true, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( 'h055', 1, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) > 250 )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) < 600 )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002001001(), Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002001002() )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002002001(), Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002001(), Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 20 ) )
    call SetUnitManaBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 20.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) > 250 )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) < 600 )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002001001(), Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002002001(), Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002001(), Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 1) + 3 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 0) + 3 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h043', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e00P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'E00M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011001002)), function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func011A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'E00H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013001002)), function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Func013A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Druid Searchers T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h043' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func011001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) > 250 )
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func011001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) < 600 )

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h043', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e00P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'E00M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func011001002)), function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func011A )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'E00H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func013001002)), function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Func013A )
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sleeping Druids of the Claw T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sleeping_Druids_of_the_Claw_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Sleeping_Druids_of_the_Claw_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h073' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Sleeping_Druids_of_the_Claw_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Sleeping_Druids_of_the_Claw_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sleeping_Druids_of_the_Claw_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h073', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 4, 'e00S', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1_Front), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

endfunction

    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sleeping_Malfurion_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Sleeping_Malfurion_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h075', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'E00O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2_Front), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

function Trig_Pursuider_Illidan_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02K', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e00X', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e00J', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'E00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 7, false )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A02E', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09P', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
endfunction

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h03K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then

        return false
    endif

endfunction

function Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'E00V' )
endfunction

function Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002001(), Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 'E00Y', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_MAXIMUM )
endfunction

function Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h03K', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Forest Spirits Trap T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h04M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001Func023C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) > udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001Func023C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1 = GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit = GetEnumUnit()
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A08C', udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04M', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1 = 0.00
    set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit = null
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect()), function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001Func023C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) > udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001Func023C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2 = GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2Unit = GetEnumUnit()
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A08C', udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2Unit )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h04M', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2 = 0.00
    set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2Unit = null
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect()), function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Slip Away T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h076' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B002') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit()) < udg_SlipAwayHP1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008Func001C() ) then
        set udg_SlipAwayHP1 = GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_SlipAwayHP1Unit = GetEnumUnit()
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h076', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_SlipAwayHP1 = 1000000000.00
    set udg_SlipAwayHP1Unit = null
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect()), function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy_Func008A )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A021', udg_SlipAwayHP1Unit )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h021_0260, "invisibility", udg_SlipAwayHP1Unit )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( udg_SlipAwayHP1Unit, "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) < udg_SlipAwayHP1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Talisman of the Wild T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h07E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002001001(), Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A02F', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002001(), Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002001(), Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001001(), Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE))) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002001(), Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A02F', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08J', GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\EtherealForm\\SpiritWalkerChange.mdl" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h07E', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(1, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006001002002))), function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Func006A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lost Furbolgs T1 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05Q', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n021', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n020', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n021', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n020', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lost Furbolgs T2 Copy Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTrainedUnit()) == 'h05Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T2_Copy_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_PlayingPhase == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h05Q', false, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n021', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n020', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n021', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n020', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lost_Furbolgs_T2_Copy_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lost_Furbolgs_T2_Copy_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Lost_Furbolgs_T2_Copy_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_TRAIN_FINISH )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Lost_Furbolgs_T2_Copy_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T2_Copy_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Lost_Furbolgs_T2_Copy_Copy, function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T2_Copy_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Guard Towers T1 Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A04R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_RANGED_ATTACKER) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Func008001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Func008001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Func008001002002001(), Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Func008001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0) + 50.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1) + 50.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 2) + 50.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A04R', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy, function Trig_Guard_Towers_T1_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

endfunction

function Trig_Guard_Towers_T2_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 0) + 50.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 1) + 50.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitWeaponRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_RF_ATTACK_RANGE, 2) + 50.00 ) )
endfunction

    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A04R', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Guard_Towers_T2_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Guard_Towers_T2_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

// Trigger: Dwarven Expedition Encampment T1 Copy
//===========================================================================

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    endif

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Func009001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Func009001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Func009001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Func009001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Func009001002002001(), Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Func009001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Func009001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Func009001002001(), Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Func009001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03Z', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h006', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00J', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00K', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_T1_Region, Condition(function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Func009A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy, function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T1_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T2_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T2_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T2_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T2_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T2_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T2_Copy, function Trig_Dwarven_Expedition_Encampment_T2_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Reinforce T1 Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A06J', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'n000', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A06J', GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Reinforce_T1_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Reinforce_T1_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Reinforce_T1_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Reinforce_T1_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Reinforce_T1_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Reinforce_T1_Copy, function Trig_Reinforce_T1_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mortar Team T1 Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A05T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(8) )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00A', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002001002002001(), Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002001002001(), Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002001001(), Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A000', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01M', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002002001(), Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002001(), Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetEnumUnit()) + 60.00 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A05T', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h00C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 60.00 ) )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(2, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007001002002))), function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy, function Trig_Mortar_Team_T1_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h00C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed( GetLastCreatedUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetLastCreatedUnit()) + 60.00 ) )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(2, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Mortar_Team_T2_Copy_Func007001002002))), function Trig_Mortar_Team_T2_Copy_Func007A )

//===========================================================================

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A069' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 0) == 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 1) == 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitWeaponIntegerField(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 2) == 4 )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002001002001(), Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002001001(), Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002002001(), Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002001(), Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 5 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 5 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 5 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08V', GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Blink\\BlinkTarget.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A069', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Func006A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy, function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T1_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 5 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08V', GetEnumUnit() )

    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A069', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00B', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T2_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T2_Copy_Func006A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T2_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T2_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T2_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T2_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T2_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T2_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T2_Copy, function Trig_Priests_of_QuelThalas_T2_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Regional Defenders T1 Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06I' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func007Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func007Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func008001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) > 250 )
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func008001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetFilterUnit()) < 600 )
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func008001002001001(), Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func008001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func008001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func008001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func008001002002001(), Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func008001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 50 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 50.00 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'Adef', GetEnumUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitArmor( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitArmor(GetEnumUnit()) + 1 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A06I', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'h00A', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 3)
    if ( Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func007C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A06I', GetTriggerUnit() )
    else
        if ( Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func007Func003C() ) then
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A069', GetTriggerUnit() )
        else
            if ( Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func007Func003Func003C() ) then
                call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A05T', GetTriggerUnit() )
            else
            endif
        endif
    endif
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Func008A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy, function Trig_Regional_Defenders_T1_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cavalery T1 Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A033' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001001002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A001', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001001002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A003', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanOr( Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001001002001002001(), Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001001002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001001002001001(), Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001001002001(), Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001001002))) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A033', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 5, 'h00D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'h00D', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cavalery_T1_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cavalery_T1_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Cavalery_T1_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Cavalery_T1_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Cavalery_T1_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Cavalery_T1_Copy, function Trig_Cavalery_T1_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h00C', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
