// Trigger: Defense of Strahnbrad T1 Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A03P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(udg_MainStructureT1) < 100.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03P', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 6, 'h00A', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy, function Trig_Defense_of_Strahnbrad_T1_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

        return true

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Captains assistence T1 Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A032' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Func007001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Func007001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Func007001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Func007001002002001(), Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Func007001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Func007001002001(), Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Func007001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 10 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 10 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 10 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A032', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy, function Trig_Captains_assistence_T1_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T2_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 0, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 10 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 1, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 1) + 10 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_DAMAGE_BASE, 2, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 2) + 10 ) )
endfunction

function Trig_Captains_assistence_T2_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A032', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Captains_assistence_T2_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Captains_assistence_T2_Copy_Func007A )
endfunction

endfunction

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then

    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(8) )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A00A', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002001002002001(), Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002001002001(), Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002001001(), Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerAlly(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), Player(0)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01M', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002002001(), Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002002002() )

    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Demon\\DarkPortal\\DarkPortalTarget.mdl" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(2, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005001002002))), function Trig_Heart_of_Searinox_T1_Copy_Func005A )

    endif

    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(9) )

    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Reinforcements Run T1 Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Func005Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A06K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Func005Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Func007002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Func007002001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Func007002001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01M', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Func007002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Func007002001002002001(), Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Func007002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Func007002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Func007002001002001(), Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Func007002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A06K', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_OutUnit[1] )
    call ShowUnitShow( udg_OutUnit[1] )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_OutUnit[1] = GroupPickRandomUnit(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Func007002001002)))
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(udg_OutUnit[1]), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportTarget.mdl" )
    call PauseUnitBJ( true, udg_OutUnit[1] )
    call ShowUnitHide( udg_OutUnit[1] )
    call SetUnitPositionLoc( udg_OutUnit[1], GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( udg_OutUnit[1], 100 )
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ( udg_OutUnit[1], 100 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 90.00 )
    call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_OutUnit[1] )
    call ShowUnitShow( udg_OutUnit[1] )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00D', Player(8), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy, function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T1_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A06K', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_OutUnit[2] )
    call ShowUnitShow( udg_OutUnit[2] )
    set udg_OutUnit[2] = GroupPickRandomUnit(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Func007002001002)))
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(udg_OutUnit[2]), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\MassTeleport\\MassTeleportTarget.mdl" )
    call PauseUnitBJ( true, udg_OutUnit[2] )
    call ShowUnitHide( udg_OutUnit[2] )
    call SetUnitPositionLoc( udg_OutUnit[2], GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn) )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( udg_OutUnit[2], 100 )
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ( udg_OutUnit[2], 100 )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 90.00 )
    call PauseUnitBJ( false, udg_OutUnit[2] )
    call ShowUnitShow( udg_OutUnit[2] )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00D', Player(9), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy, function Trig_Reinforcements_Run_T2_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then

    endif

function Trig_Arthas_T1_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A02N', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H003', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A03L', GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Arthas_T1_Copy, function Trig_Arthas_T1_Copy_Actions )

//===========================================================================

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true

    if ( not Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'H005' )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetHeroLevel(GetFilterUnit()) != 10 )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001002002001(), Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001002001(), Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnumUnit()) + 10 ), true )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100 )
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100 )
    call BlzEndUnitAbilityCooldown( GetEnumUnit(), 'AHhb' )
    call BlzEndUnitAbilityCooldown( GetEnumUnit(), 'AHds' )
    call BlzEndUnitAbilityCooldown( GetEnumUnit(), 'A081' )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func003001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'H005' )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func003001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func003001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func003001001002001(), Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func003001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func003001001002))) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A07O', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func001001002)), function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Func005Func001A )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Uther_T1_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Uther_T1_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Uther_T1_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Uther_T1_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Uther_T1_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Uther_T1_Copy, function Trig_Uther_T1_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Uther T2 Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A07O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'H005' )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func001001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func001001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetHeroLevel(GetFilterUnit()) != 10 )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func001001002002001(), Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func001001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func001001002001(), Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetHeroLevel(GetEnumUnit()) + 10 ), true )
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100 )
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 100 )
    call BlzEndUnitAbilityCooldown( GetEnumUnit(), 'AHhb' )
    call BlzEndUnitAbilityCooldown( GetEnumUnit(), 'AHds' )
    call BlzEndUnitAbilityCooldown( GetEnumUnit(), 'A081' )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func003001001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'H005' )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func003001001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func003001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func003001001002001(), Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func003001001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func003001001002))) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A07O', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func001001002)), function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Func005Func001A )
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Uther_T2_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Uther_T2_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Uther_T2_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Uther_T2_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Uther_T2_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Uther_T2_Copy, function Trig_Uther_T2_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'h00I', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'H00H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A03Z', GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Func005001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'H00H' )
endfunction

    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Func005001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Func005001002001(), Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Func005001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Func005Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_WEAPON_SOUND, 0, 5 )
    call BlzSetUnitSkin( GetEnumUnit(), BlzGetUnitSkin(gg_unit_h022_0162) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 0, 5 )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 40 ), 0 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08H', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'ACce', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Func005Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_WEAPON_SOUND, 0, 5 )
    call BlzSetUnitSkin( GetEnumUnit(), BlzGetUnitSkin(gg_unit_h022_0162) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 0, 5 )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 40 ), 0 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08H', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'ACce', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\FreezingBreath\\FreezingBreathMissile.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'H003'), function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Func005Func004A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(8), 'H00L'), function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Func005Func005A )
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A04I', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Func005001002)), function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Func005A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Frostmourne_T1_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Frostmourne_T1_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Frostmourne_T1_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Frostmourne_T1_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Frostmourne_T1_Copy, function Trig_Frostmourne_T1_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

    call BlzSetUnitSkin( GetEnumUnit(), BlzGetUnitSkin(gg_unit_h022_0162) )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponIntegerFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_IF_ATTACK_ATTACK_TYPE, 0, 5 )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 40 ), 0 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08H', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'ACce', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T2_Copy_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\FreezingBreath\\FreezingBreathMissile.mdl" )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(9), 'H003'), function Trig_Frostmourne_T2_Copy_Func005Func004A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(9), 'H00L'), function Trig_Frostmourne_T2_Copy_Func005Func005A )
endfunction

function Trig_Frostmourne_T2_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A04I', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Frostmourne_T2_Copy_Func005001002)), function Trig_Frostmourne_T2_Copy_Func005A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Frostmourne_T2_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Frostmourne_T2_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Frostmourne_T2_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Frostmourne_T2_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Frostmourne_T2_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Frostmourne_T2_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Frostmourne_T2_Copy, function Trig_Frostmourne_T2_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Culling of Stratholme T1 Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A03L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func005001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09V', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func005001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func005001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func005001002001(), Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func005001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func005Func007001002002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func005Func007001002002001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09U', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func005Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func005Func007001002002001(), Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func005Func007001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func005Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 100 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 100.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 2 ), 0 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08I', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable( GetEnumUnit(), true )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A015', GetEnumUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h001', Player(8), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponBooleanFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_BF_ATTACKS_ENABLED, 0, false )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ByeBye_T1) )
    call RemoveUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(1, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func005Func007001002002))), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func005Func007A )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func006001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'H005' )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 150.00 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08I', GetEnumUnit() )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 5 ), 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable( GetEnumUnit(), true )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), 0 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A015', GetEnumUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', Player(0), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponBooleanFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_BF_ATTACKS_ENABLED, 0, false )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ByeBye_T1) )
    call RemoveUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(1, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func006Func008001002002))), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func006Func008A )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func007Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetEnumUnit()) + 100 ) )
    call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 100.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION, ( BlzGetUnitRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION) + 2.00 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08I', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable( GetEnumUnit(), true )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), 0 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A015', GetEnumUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', Player(0), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponBooleanFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_BF_ATTACKS_ENABLED, 0, false )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ByeBye_T1) )
    call RemoveUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(1, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func007Func008001002002))), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func007Func008A )
endfunction

    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A080', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )

endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "stop" )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func009001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09U', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc( GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn) )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A003', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03L', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func005001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func005A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func006A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func007A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func008A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Func009A )
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy, function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T1_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Culling of Stratholme T2 Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A03L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        return false

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func005Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetEnumUnit()) + 75 ) )
    call SetUnitLifeBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + 75.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetEnumUnit(), 0) + 2 ), 0 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08I', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable( GetEnumUnit(), true )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A015', GetEnumUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h001', Player(9), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponBooleanFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_BF_ATTACKS_ENABLED, 0, false )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ByeBye_T1) )
    call RemoveUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(1, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func005Func007001002002))), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func005Func007A )
endfunction

    call BlzSetUnitWeaponBooleanFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_BF_ATTACKS_ENABLED, 0, false )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ByeBye_T1) )
    call RemoveUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(1, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func006Func008001002002))), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func006Func008A )

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func007Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxMana(GetEnumUnit()) + 100 ) )
    call SetUnitManaBJ( GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, GetEnumUnit()) + 100.00 ) )
    call BlzSetUnitRealFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION, ( BlzGetUnitRealField(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_RF_MANA_REGENERATION) + 2.00 ) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A08I', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable( GetEnumUnit(), true )
    call BlzSetUnitMaxMana( GetEnumUnit(), 0 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A015', GetEnumUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'h008', Player(0), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call BlzSetUnitWeaponBooleanFieldBJ( GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_WEAPON_BF_ATTACKS_ENABLED, 0, false )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "move", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_ByeBye_T1) )
    call RemoveUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(1, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func007Func008001002002))), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func007Func008A )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func008001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A080', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func008001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func008001002001(), Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func008001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "stop" )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func009001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A09U', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc( GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn) )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A003', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A001', GetEnumUnit() )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A03L', GetTriggerUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func005001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func005A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func006001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func006A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func007001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func007A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func008001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func008A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func009001002)), function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Func009A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy, Condition( function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy, function Trig_Culling_of_Stratholme_T2_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Immediatly Removed
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Immediatly_Removed_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A08N', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Immediatly_Removed_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
    call RemoveUnit( GetTriggerUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Immediatly_Removed takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Immediatly_Removed = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple( gg_trg_Immediatly_Removed, GetEntireMapRect() )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Immediatly_Removed, Condition( function Trig_Immediatly_Removed_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Immediatly_Removed, function Trig_Immediatly_Removed_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pursuider Illidan T2 Copy 3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pursuider_Illidan_T2_Copy_3_Func009Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Pursuider_Illidan_T2_Copy_3_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSoldUnit()) == 'h02K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Pursuider_Illidan_T2_Copy_3_Func009Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pursuider_Illidan_T2_Copy_3_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Pursuider_Illidan_T2_Copy_3_Func009C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pursuider_Illidan_T2_Copy_3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CardSeller = GetSellingUnit()
    set udg_CardSold = GetUnitTypeId(GetSoldUnit())
    call RemoveUnitFromStockBJ( 'h02K', GetSellingUnit() )
    call RemoveUnitFromAllStock( 'h02K' )
    call SetItemTypeSlots( GetSellingUnit(), 0 )
    call RemoveUnitFromStock(udg_CardSeller, udg_CardSold)
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02K', false, GetOwningPlayer(udg_P1Building) )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e00X', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e00J', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'E00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 7, false )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A02E', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pursuider_Illidan_T2_Copy_3 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pursuider_Illidan_T2_Copy_3 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Pursuider_Illidan_T2_Copy_3, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Pursuider_Illidan_T2_Copy_3, Condition( function Trig_Pursuider_Illidan_T2_Copy_3_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Pursuider_Illidan_T2_Copy_3, function Trig_Pursuider_Illidan_T2_Copy_3_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Player 1 Turn Cardtrue Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02K', true, GetOwningPlayer(udg_P1Building) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02K', true, GetOwningPlayer(udg_P1Building) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( udg_P1DeckCType[GetRandomInt(0, 19)], udg_P1Building )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( udg_P1DeckCType[GetRandomInt(0, 19)], udg_P1Building )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy, udg_TurnTimer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy, function Trig_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ini Cards P1true Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ini_Cards_P1true_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'h02K', true, GetOwningPlayer(udg_P1Building) )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'hfoo', true, GetOwningPlayer(udg_P1Building) )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'hfoo', true, GetOwningPlayer(udg_P1Building) )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'hfoo', true, GetOwningPlayer(udg_P1Building) )
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( 'hfoo', true, GetOwningPlayer(udg_P1Building) )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( udg_P1DeckCType[GetRandomInt(0, 19)], udg_P1Building )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ini_Cards_P1true_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1true_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1true_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1true_Copy, 182.00 )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1true_Copy, gg_unit_h028_0281, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1true_Copy, function Trig_Ini_Cards_P1true_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Forest Spirits Trap T1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I05H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Func006Func001Func022C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) > udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Func006Func001Func022C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Func006Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1 = GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit = GetEnumUnit()
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 1.00 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0267, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I05H', GetSellingUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1 = 0.00
    set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit = null
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect()), function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Func006A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1, Condition( function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1, function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Forest Spirits Trap T2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I05H' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Func007Func001Func022C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) > udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Func007Func001Func022C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Func007Func001C() ) then
        set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2 = GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2Unit = GetEnumUnit()
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
        call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
        call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h024_0268, "thunderbolt", udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP1Unit )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I05H', GetSellingUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2 = 0.00
    set udg_ForestSpirtisTrapHP2Unit = null
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect()), function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Func007A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2, Condition( function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2, function Trig_Forest_Spirits_Trap_T2_Actions )
endfunction

// Trigger: Thrall s Aid T1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Thrall_s_Aid_T1_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Thrall_s_Aid_T1_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I05G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Thrall_s_Aid_T1_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Thrall_s_Aid_T1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Thrall_s_Aid_T1_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Thrall_s_Aid_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I05G', GetSellingUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'O01L', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'o01N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'o00T', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1T2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Thrall_s_Aid_T1, function Trig_Thrall_s_Aid_T1_Actions )

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Func005001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'E00V' )
endfunction

function Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ( 1000000000.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I05F', GetSellingUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Func005001002)), function Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Func005A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1, Condition( function Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1, function Trig_Consume_Skull_of_Guldan_T1_Actions )
endfunction

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then

function Trig_Pursuider_Illidan_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I05E', GetSellingUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e00X', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e00J', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'E00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call SetHeroLevelBJ( GetLastCreatedUnit(), 7, false )
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ( 'A02E', GetLastCreatedUnit() )
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Pursuider_Illidan_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )

    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Pursuider_Illidan_T1, Condition( function Trig_Pursuider_Illidan_T1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Pursuider_Illidan_T1, function Trig_Pursuider_Illidan_T1_Actions )
endfunction

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'E00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1_Front), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Illidan_Stormrage_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Illidan_Stormrage_T1 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Illidan_Stormrage_T1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Illidan_Stormrage_T1, Condition( function Trig_Illidan_Stormrage_T1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Illidan_Stormrage_T1, function Trig_Illidan_Stormrage_T1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Illidan_Stormrage_T2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I05D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Illidan_Stormrage_T2_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Illidan_Stormrage_T2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Illidan_Stormrage_T2_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Talisman of the Wild T1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I05C' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsPlayerEnemy(GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001002001001(), Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A02F', GetFilterUnit()) == 0 )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001002002001(), Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001002001(), Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001001(), Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitInGroup(GetFilterUnit(), GetUnitsOfPlayerAll(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE))) == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002001(), Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A02F', GetEnumUnit() )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ( GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "Abilities\\Spells\\Orc\\EtherealForm\\SpiritWalkerChange.mdl" )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call DestroyEffectBJ( GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() )
endfunction

function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I05C', GetSellingUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetRandomSubGroup(1, GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005001002002))), function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Func005A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1, Condition( function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1, function Trig_Talisman_of_the_Wild_T1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Druid Searchers T1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I05B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I05B', GetSellingUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'E00M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'E00H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e005', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e001', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e002', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'e00P', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Druid_Searchers_T1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Druid_Searchers_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Druid_Searchers_T1 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Druid_Searchers_T1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Druid_Searchers_T1, Condition( function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Druid_Searchers_T1, function Trig_Druid_Searchers_T1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Agressive Ancients T1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I05A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_ANCIENT) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Func006Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
    if ( Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Func006Func002C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01W', GetEnumUnit() )
    else
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01V', GetEnumUnit() )
    endif
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "unroot" )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 4.00 )
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn) )
endfunction

function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I05A', GetSellingUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e00E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Func006001002)), function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Func006A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Agressive_Ancients_T1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T1 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T1, Condition( function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T1, function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    endif

        return false
    endif
    return true

function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T2_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
    if ( Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T2_Func007Func002C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01W', GetEnumUnit() )
    else
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A01V', GetEnumUnit() )
    endif
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "unroot" )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A000', GetEnumUnit() )

    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ( GetEnumUnit(), "attack", GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn) )
