    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e00E', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'e00F', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T2_Func007001002)), function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T2_Func007A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Agressive_Ancients_T2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T2 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T2, Condition( function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Agressive_Ancients_T2, function Trig_Agressive_Ancients_T2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Barrow Den T1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I059' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Func005Func001Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[4] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Func005Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[3] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[2] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_T1B[1] == null ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I059', GetSellingUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    if ( Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n025', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B1), bj_UNIT_FACING )
        set udg_T1B[1] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
        if ( Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Func005Func001C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n025', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            set udg_T1B[2] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        else
            if ( Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Func005Func001Func001C() ) then
                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n025', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B3), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                set udg_T1B[3] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
            else
                if ( Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Func005Func001Func001Func001C() ) then
                    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n025', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1B4), bj_UNIT_FACING )
                    set udg_T1B[4] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
                else
                    call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAllies(Player(0)), "TRIGSTR_1753" )
                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Barrow_Den_T1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Barrow_Den_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Barrow_Den_T1 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Barrow_Den_T1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Barrow_Den_T1, Condition( function Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Barrow_Den_T1, function Trig_Barrow_Den_T1_Actions )
endfunction

        set udg_T2B[1] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
    else
        if ( Trig_Barrow_Den_T2_Func005Func001C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n025', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B2), bj_UNIT_FACING )
            set udg_T2B[2] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        else

                call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n025', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2B3), bj_UNIT_FACING )

                else

                endif
            endif
        endif
    endif
endfunction

    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func004001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'E00O' )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func004001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func004001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func004001002001(), Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func004001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 'E00M', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func005001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00Q' )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func005001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func005001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func005001002001(), Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func005001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 'e00P', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func006001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00S' )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func006001002001(), Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func006001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 'e00R', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I055', GetSellingUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func004001002)), function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func004A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func005001002)), function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func005A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(8), Condition(function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func006001002)), function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Func006A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1, function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Horn of Cenarius T2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I055' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func005001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'E00O' )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func005001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func005001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func005001002001(), Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func005001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 'E00M', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func006001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00Q' )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func006001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func006001002001(), Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func006001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 'e00P', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func007001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'e00S' )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func007001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd( Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func007001002001(), Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func007001002002() )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ReplaceUnitBJ( GetEnumUnit(), 'e00R', bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE )
endfunction

function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I055', GetSellingUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func005001002)), function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func005A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func006001002)), function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func006A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(Player(9), Condition(function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func007001002)), function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Func007A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2, Condition( function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2, function Trig_Horn_of_Cenarius_T2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Malfurion Stormrage T1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Malfurion_Stormrage_T1_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I054' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Malfurion_Stormrage_T1_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( not Trig_Malfurion_Stormrage_T1_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malfurion_Stormrage_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I054', GetSellingUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'E00M', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 6, 'e00N', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I055', GetSellingUnit(), 1, 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Malfurion_Stormrage_T1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Malfurion_Stormrage_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Malfurion_Stormrage_T1 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Malfurion_Stormrage_T1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Malfurion_Stormrage_T1, Condition( function Trig_Malfurion_Stormrage_T1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Malfurion_Stormrage_T1, function Trig_Malfurion_Stormrage_T1_Actions )
endfunction

        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Huntresses_T2_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I050' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Huntresses_T2_Func002Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Huntresses_T2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Huntresses_T2_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Huntresses_T2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I050', GetSellingUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 3, 'e00J', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T2Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Huntresses_T2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Huntresses_T2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Huntresses_T2 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Huntresses_T2, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Huntresses_T2, Condition( function Trig_Huntresses_T2_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Huntresses_T2, function Trig_Huntresses_T2_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Slip Away T1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I04Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Func007Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B002') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit()) < udg_SlipAwayHP1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Func007Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Func007Func001C() ) then
        set udg_SlipAwayHP1 = GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_SlipAwayHP1Unit = GetEnumUnit()
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I04Z', GetSellingUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_SlipAwayHP1 = 1000000000.00
    set udg_SlipAwayHP1Unit = null
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect()), function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Func007A )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A021', udg_SlipAwayHP1Unit )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h021_0260, "invisibility", udg_SlipAwayHP1Unit )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Slip_Away_T1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Slip_Away_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Slip_Away_T1 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Slip_Away_T1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Slip_Away_T1, Condition( function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Slip_Away_T1, function Trig_Slip_Away_T1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Slip Away T2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Slip_Away_T2_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(1) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(3) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(5) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(7) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I04Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Slip_Away_T2_Func003Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    if ( not Trig_Slip_Away_T2_Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_T2_Func007Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 'B002') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetEnumUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) < udg_SlipAwayHP1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_T2_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Slip_Away_T2_Func007Func001Func003C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( Trig_Slip_Away_T2_Func007Func001C() ) then
        set udg_SlipAwayHP2 = GetUnitLifePercent(GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_SlipAwayHP2Unit = GetEnumUnit()
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Slip_Away_T2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I04Z', GetSellingUnit() )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 0.50 )
    set udg_SlipAwayHP2 = 1000000000.00
    set udg_SlipAwayHP2Unit = null
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect()), function Trig_Slip_Away_T2_Func007A )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A021', udg_SlipAwayHP2Unit )
    call IssueTargetOrderBJ( gg_unit_h021_0260, "invisibility", udg_SlipAwayHP2Unit )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lost Furbolgs T1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I04Y' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I04Y', GetSellingUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n01Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n021', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n020', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n021', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 30.00 )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 2, 'n01Z', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'n020', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lost_Furbolgs_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Lost_Furbolgs_T1 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Lost_Furbolgs_T1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Lost_Furbolgs_T1, Condition( function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Lost_Furbolgs_T1, function Trig_Lost_Furbolgs_T1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tyrande Wisperwind T1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(0) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(2) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(4) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(6) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I04W' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Func005Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Random == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItemFromStockBJ( 'I04W', GetSellingUnit() )
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, 'E00H', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_T1Spawn), bj_UNIT_FACING )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(1, 2)
    if ( Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Func005C() ) then
        call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I04R', GetSellingUnit(), 1, 1 )
    else
        if ( Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Func005Func002C() ) then
            call AddItemToStockBJ( 'I04X', GetSellingUnit(), 1, 1 )
        else
        endif
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1 )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1, Condition( function Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1, function Trig_Tyrande_Wisperwind_T1_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ini Cards P1true Copy 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ini_Cards_P1true_Copy_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], true, Player(0) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], 1, Player(0) )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], true, Player(0) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], 1, Player(0) )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], true, Player(0) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], 1, Player(0) )
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], true, Player(0) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], 1, Player(0) )
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1true_Copy_2, function Trig_Ini_Cards_P1true_Copy_2_Actions )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ini Cards P1true
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ini_Cards_P1true_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( udg_P1DeckCType[GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))], udg_P1Building )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( udg_P1DeckCType[GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))], udg_P1Building )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( udg_P1DeckCType[GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))], udg_P1Building )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( udg_P1DeckCType[GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))], udg_P1Building )
    call DisableTrigger( GetTriggeringTrigger() )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ini_Cards_P1true takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1true = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1true, 182.00 )
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1true, gg_unit_h028_0281, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1true, function Trig_Ini_Cards_P1true_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( udg_P2DeckCType[GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))], udg_P2Building )
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ( udg_P2DeckCType[GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))], udg_P2Building )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ini Cards P1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ini_Cards_P1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddItemToStockBJ( udg_P1DeckT[GetRandomInt(0, udg_MaxCardNr)], udg_P1Building, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( udg_P1DeckT[GetRandomInt(0, udg_MaxCardNr)], udg_P1Building, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( udg_P1DeckT[GetRandomInt(0, udg_MaxCardNr)], udg_P1Building, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( udg_P1DeckT[GetRandomInt(0, udg_MaxCardNr)], udg_P1Building, 1, 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

endfunction

    call AddItemToStockBJ( udg_P2DeckT[GetRandomInt(0, udg_MaxCardNr)], udg_P2Building, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( udg_P2DeckT[GetRandomInt(0, udg_MaxCardNr)], udg_P2Building, 1, 1 )

    call AddItemToStockBJ( udg_P3DeckT[GetRandomInt(0, udg_MaxCardNr)], udg_P3Building, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( udg_P3DeckT[GetRandomInt(0, udg_MaxCardNr)], udg_P3Building, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( udg_P3DeckT[GetRandomInt(0, udg_MaxCardNr)], udg_P3Building, 1, 1 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( udg_P3DeckT[GetRandomInt(0, udg_MaxCardNr)], udg_P3Building, 1, 1 )
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P3, function Trig_Ini_Cards_P3_Actions )

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Player 1 Turn Cardtrue Copy 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_2_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CardGettingLeaversP1 == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_2_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CardGettingLeaversP1 == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_2_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CardGettingLeaversP1 == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], true, Player(0) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], 1, Player(0) )
    if ( Trig_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_2_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], true, Player(0) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], 1, Player(0) )
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    if ( Trig_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_2_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], true, Player(0) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], 1, Player(0) )
    else
    endif
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], true, Player(0) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], 1, Player(0) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    if ( Trig_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_2_Func012C() ) then
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], true, Player(0) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP1U[udg_Random], 1, Player(0) )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_2 = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_2 )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_2, udg_TurnTimer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_2, function Trig_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_2_Actions )
endfunction

        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP2U[udg_Random], 1, Player(1) )
    else
    endif
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP2U[udg_Random], true, Player(1) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP2U[udg_Random], 1, Player(1) )

    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Player_7_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CardGettingLeaversP1 == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Player_7_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CardGettingLeaversP1 == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Player_7_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP7U[udg_Random], true, Player(6) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP7U[udg_Random], 1, Player(6) )
    if ( Trig_Player_7_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP7U[udg_Random], true, Player(6) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP7U[udg_Random], 1, Player(6) )
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    if ( Trig_Player_7_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP7U[udg_Random], true, Player(6) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP7U[udg_Random], 1, Player(6) )
    else
    endif
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP7U[udg_Random], true, Player(6) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP7U[udg_Random], 1, Player(6) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    if ( Trig_Player_7_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_Func011C() ) then
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP7U[udg_Random], true, Player(6) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP7U[udg_Random], 1, Player(6) )
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Player_7_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Player_7_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_7_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy )
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ( gg_trg_Player_7_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy, udg_TurnTimer )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Player_7_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy, function Trig_Player_7_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Player 8 Turn Cardtrue Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Player_8_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CardGettingLeaversP2 == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Player_8_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CardGettingLeaversP2 == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Player_8_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_CardGettingLeaversP2 == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Player_8_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP8U[udg_Random], true, Player(7) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP8U[udg_Random], 1, Player(7) )
    if ( Trig_Player_8_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP8U[udg_Random], true, Player(7) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP8U[udg_Random], 1, Player(7) )
    else
    endif
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    if ( Trig_Player_8_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP8U[udg_Random], true, Player(7) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP8U[udg_Random], 1, Player(7) )
    else
    endif
    set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP8U[udg_Random], true, Player(7) )
    call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP8U[udg_Random], 1, Player(7) )
    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    if ( Trig_Player_8_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_Func011C() ) then
        set udg_Random = GetRandomInt(0, ( udg_MaxCardNr + 1 ))
        call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ( udg_DeckCTypeP8U[udg_Random], true, Player(7) )
        call SetPlayerTechMaxAllowedSwap( udg_DeckCTypeP8U[udg_Random], 1, Player(7) )
    else
    endif
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Player_8_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy = CreateTrigger(  )

endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction( 60.00 )
    call AddItemToStockBJ( udg_P1DeckT[GetRandomInt(0, udg_MaxCardNr)], udg_P1Building, 1, 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Map Initialization
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Map_Initialization_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave( gg_trg_Player_Leaves, GetEnumPlayer() )
    // I thought this would be easier than adding just a few events manually :d
endfunction

function Trig_Map_Initialization_Func009001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A01Z', GetFilterUnit()) >= 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Map_Initialization_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call GroupAddUnitSimple( GetEnumUnit(), udg_unit_group_Card_Picking_Phase )
endfunction

function Trig_Map_Initialization_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Players_Buildings )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Hiding_Stuff )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Melee_Initialization )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Limit_to_1_For_card_UNITS )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Max_Card_Nr )
    // Entering the trigger names in custom scripts was faster than waiting for the list of triggers to load :/
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Map_Initialization_Func008A )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Map_Initialization_Func009001002)), function Trig_Map_Initialization_Func009A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Map_Initialization takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Map_Initialization = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Map_Initialization, function Trig_Map_Initialization_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Round Start
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Round_Start_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Round_Start_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Round_Start_Func006Func001C() ) then
        call ShowUnitHide( GetEnumUnit() )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Round_Start_Func012A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerStateBJ( GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 2 )
endfunction

function Trig_Round_Start_Func041C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Round_Start_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_PlayingPhase = true
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ( udg_timer_window_179_Seconds )
    call SetTimeOfDay( 6.00 )
    call SetTimeOfDayScalePercentBJ( 100.00 )
    call LeaderboardDisplayBJ( false, udg_CardNumber )
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_unit_group_Card_Picking_Phase, function Trig_Round_Start_Func006A )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Much_Gold_While_Picking )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Much_Gold_While_Picking_2 )
    call PolledWait( 1.00 )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_No_unitsSS )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_No_more_cards )
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Round_Start_Func012A )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Turn_Cards_on )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Turn_Cards_on_Units )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Make_Cards_unavailable )
    call StartTimerBJ( udg_TurnTimer, false, 1690.00 )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Fast_Picking_Initialisation )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Timer_Picking_3 )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Picking_Start )
    set udg_PBuilding[1] = udg_P1Building
    set udg_PBuilding[2] = udg_P2Building
    set udg_PBuilding[3] = udg_P3Building
    set udg_PBuilding[4] = udg_P4Building
    set udg_PBuilding[5] = udg_P5Building
    set udg_PBuilding[6] = udg_P6Building
    set udg_PBuilding[7] = udg_P7Building
    set udg_PBuilding[8] = udg_P8Building
    set udg_PBuilding[9] = udg_MainStructureT1
    set udg_PBuilding[10] = udg_MainStructureT2
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 8
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_point_PBuilding[GetForLoopIndexA()] = GetUnitLoc(udg_PBuilding[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set udg_unit_type_PBuilding[GetForLoopIndexA()] = GetUnitTypeId(udg_PBuilding[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_unit_type_PBuilding[9] = GetUnitTypeId(udg_MainStructureT1)
    set udg_point_PBuilding[9] = GetUnitLoc(udg_MainStructureT1)
    set udg_unit_type_PBuilding[10] = GetUnitTypeId(udg_MainStructureT2)
    set udg_point_PBuilding[10] = GetUnitLoc(udg_MainStructureT2)
    call PolledWait( 0.01 )
    // Maybe pausing the timer is unnecessary
    call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_TimerStart )
    call PolledWait( 1.00 )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Timer )
    call PolledWait( 1.00 )
    if ( Trig_Round_Start_Func041C() ) then
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1 )
        call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1true )
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1 )
        call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1true )
        // Maybe this does nothing now?
    else
    endif
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1true_Copy_2 )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P2true_Copy )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P3true_Copy )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P4true_Copy )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P5true_Copy )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P6true_Copy )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P7true_Copy )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P8true_Copy )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( udg_PBuilding[GetForLoopIndexA()], 100 )
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Starting_gold )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Round_Start takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Round_Start = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Round_Start, function Trig_Round_Start_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Picking Start
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Picking_Start_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P1true_Copy_2 )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P2true_Copy )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P3true_Copy )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P4true_Copy )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P5true_Copy )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P6true_Copy )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P7true_Copy )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ini_Cards_P8true_Copy )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Picking_Start takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Picking_Start = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Picking_Start, function Trig_Picking_Start_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Reset
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Reset_Func013A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ShowUnitShow( GetEnumUnit() )
endfunction

function Trig_Reset_Func034Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_PBuilding[GetForLoopIndexA()] == null ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsUnitAliveBJ(udg_PBuilding[GetForLoopIndexA()]) == false ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Reset_Func034Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Reset_Func034Func001Func005C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reset_Func045Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'h083' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Reset_Func045A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Reset_Func045Func001C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09M', GetEnumUnit() )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Reset_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_PlayingPhase = false
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Much_Gold_While_Picking )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Much_Gold_While_Picking_2 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_No_more_cards )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Fast_Picking_Initialisation )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_Timer_Picking_3 )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Turn_Cards_off_Units )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Make_Cards_available )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Limit_to_1_For_card_UNITS )
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Timer_Picking_2 )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Overtime )
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 0
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 29
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        set udg_P3DeckCType[GetForLoopIndexA()] = udg_ability_code_None
        // I did not see an option in the GUI to set it to no ability so I changed it to a custom script and set it to 0
        set udg_P1DeckCType[GetForLoopIndexA()] = 0
        set udg_P2DeckCType[GetForLoopIndexA()] = 0
        set udg_P3DeckCType[GetForLoopIndexA()] = 0
        set udg_P4DeckCType[GetForLoopIndexA()] = 0
        set udg_P5DeckCType[GetForLoopIndexA()] = 0
        set udg_P6DeckCType[GetForLoopIndexA()] = 0
        set udg_P7DeckCType[GetForLoopIndexA()] = 0
        set udg_P8DeckCType[GetForLoopIndexA()] = 0
        // Right after going this I noticed a way to do this by using a variable whose default value is none.
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    call ForGroupBJ( udg_unit_group_Card_Picking_Phase, function Trig_Reset_Func013A )
    call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_timer_Overtime )
    call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_timer_Income_Increase )
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ( udg_timer_window_Turn_Timer )
    set udg_AvalPlayer = 0
    set udg_P1DeckI = 0
    set udg_P1CNr = 0
    set udg_P2DeckI = 0
    set udg_P2CNr = 0
    set udg_P3DeckI = 0
    set udg_P3CNr = 0
    set udg_P4DeckI = 0
    set udg_P4CNr = 0
    set udg_P5DeckI = 0
    set udg_P5CNr = 0
    set udg_P6DeckI = 0
    set udg_P6CNr = 0
    set udg_P7DeckI = 0
    set udg_P7CNr = 0
    set udg_P8DeckI = 0
    set udg_P8CNr = 0
    set bj_forLoopAIndex = 1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd = 10
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Reset_Func034Func001C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc( 1, udg_unit_type_PBuilding[GetForLoopIndexA()], ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()), udg_point_PBuilding[GetForLoopIndexA()], bj_UNIT_FACING )
            call UnitAddAbilityBJ( 'A09I', udg_PBuilding[GetForLoopIndexA()] )
            set udg_PBuilding[GetForLoopIndexA()] = GetLastCreatedUnit()
        else
            call SetUnitLifePercentBJ( udg_PBuilding[GetForLoopIndexA()], 100 )
        endif
        set udg_point_PBuilding[GetForLoopIndexA()] = GetUnitLoc(udg_PBuilding[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set udg_unit_type_PBuilding[GetForLoopIndexA()] = GetUnitTypeId(udg_PBuilding[GetForLoopIndexA()])
        set bj_forLoopAIndex = bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    set udg_P1Building = udg_PBuilding[1]
    set udg_P2Building = udg_PBuilding[2]
    set udg_P3Building = udg_PBuilding[3]
    set udg_P4Building = udg_PBuilding[4]
    set udg_P5Building = udg_PBuilding[5]
    set udg_P6Building = udg_PBuilding[6]
    set udg_P7Building = udg_PBuilding[7]
    set udg_P8Building = udg_PBuilding[8]
    set udg_MainStructureT1 = udg_PBuilding[9]
    set udg_MainStructureT2 = udg_PBuilding[10]
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect()), function Trig_Reset_Func045A )
    call LeaderboardDisplayBJ( true, udg_CardNumber )
    call PolledWait( 0.01 )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_No_unitsSS )
    set udg_integer_Income_Increase = 0
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Reset takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Reset = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Reset, function Trig_Reset_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Turn Cards off Units
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Turn_Cards_off_Units_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_1_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy_2 )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_2_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_3_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_4_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_5_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_6_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_7_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_8_Turn_Cardtrue_Copy )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_1_Turn_Card )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_2_Turn_Card )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_3_Turn_Card )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_4_Turn_Card )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_5_Turn_Card )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_6_Turn_Card )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_7_Turn_Card )
    call DisableTrigger( gg_trg_Player_8_Turn_Card )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Turn_Cards_off_Units takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Turn_Cards_off_Units = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Turn_Cards_off_Units, function Trig_Turn_Cards_off_Units_Actions )
endfunction

function Trig_Make_Cards_available_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce( GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Make_Cards_available_Func001A )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Make_Cards_available takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Make_Cards_available = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Make_Cards_available, function Trig_Make_Cards_available_Actions )
endfunction


//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Player Leaves
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Player_Leaves_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_PlayerNr = ( udg_PlayerNr - 1 )
    call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + " has left the game." ) )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Player_Leaves takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Player_Leaves = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Player_Leaves, function Trig_Player_Leaves_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: A trigger
//===========================================================================
function Trig_A_trigger_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_MainStructureT1 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_MainStructureT2 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_A_trigger_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_A_trigger_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_A_trigger_Func006Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A087', GetEnumUnit()) == 0 ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetPlayerController(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit())) == MAP_CONTROL_USER ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) == Player(8) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()) == Player(9) ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_A_trigger_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_A_trigger_Func006Func001Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_A_trigger_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_A_trigger_Func006Func001C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit( GetEnumUnit() )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_A_trigger_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction( 10.00 )
    call DisplayTextToForce( GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3809" )
    call ForGroupBJ( GetUnitsInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect()), function Trig_A_trigger_Func006A )
    call PolledWait( 0.10 )
    set udg_T1B[1] = null
    set udg_T1B[2] = null
    set udg_T1B[3] = null
    set udg_T1B[4] = null
    set udg_T2B[1] = null
    set udg_T2B[2] = null
    set udg_T2B[3] = null
    set udg_T2B[4] = null
    set udg_DarkConvT1 = 0
    set udg_DarkConvT2 = 0
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Reset )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_P1Pick_Copy )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_P2Pick_Copy )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_P3Pick_Copy )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_P4Pick_Copy )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_P5Pick_Copy )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_P6Pick_Copy )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_P7Pick_Copy )
    call EnableTrigger( gg_trg_P8Pick_Copy )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_A_trigger takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_A_trigger = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ( gg_trg_A_trigger, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent( gg_trg_A_trigger, Player(0), "-reset", true )
    call TriggerAddCondition( gg_trg_A_trigger, Condition( function Trig_A_trigger_Conditions ) )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_A_trigger, function Trig_A_trigger_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Another trigger
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Another_trigger_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerExecute( gg_trg_Team1_Defeat )
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ( udg_timer_window_Turn_Timer )
    call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_TurnTimer )
    call PauseTimerBJ( true, udg_timer_Overtime )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Another_trigger takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Another_trigger = CreateTrigger(  )
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent( gg_trg_Another_trigger, Player(0), "-1 defeat", true )
    call TriggerAddAction( gg_trg_Another_trigger, function Trig_Another_trigger_Actions )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function RunInitializationTriggers takes nothing returns nothing
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Neutral_Group )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_AAAASS )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Magic_reisst )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Info )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Gold_level )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Demon_ne_stuff_ini )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Skull_invul )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Colour )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Illidan_Buff )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Ghouls_Harvest_lumber )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Orc_Mode_ON2 )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Newtral_is_neutral )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Neutral_is_not_buffable )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_T1_Player_Number )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_T2_Player_Number )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Initial_Gold_Cap )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Force_allyance )
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute( gg_trg_Map_Initialization )
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Players
//*
//***************************************************************************

function InitCustomPlayerSlots takes nothing returns nothing

    // Player 0
    call SetPlayerStartLocation( Player(0), 0 )
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation( Player(0), 0 )
    call SetPlayerColor( Player(0), ConvertPlayerColor(0) )
    call SetPlayerRacePreference( Player(0), RACE_PREF_HUMAN )
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable( Player(0), false )
    call SetPlayerController( Player(0), MAP_CONTROL_USER )

    // Player 1
    call SetPlayerStartLocation( Player(1), 1 )
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation( Player(1), 1 )
    call SetPlayerColor( Player(1), ConvertPlayerColor(1) )
    call SetPlayerRacePreference( Player(1), RACE_PREF_ORC )
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable( Player(1), false )
    call SetPlayerController( Player(1), MAP_CONTROL_USER )

    // Player 2
    call SetPlayerStartLocation( Player(2), 2 )
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation( Player(2), 2 )
    call SetPlayerColor( Player(2), ConvertPlayerColor(2) )
    call SetPlayerRacePreference( Player(2), RACE_PREF_UNDEAD )
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable( Player(2), false )
    call SetPlayerController( Player(2), MAP_CONTROL_USER )

    // Player 3
    call SetPlayerStartLocation( Player(3), 3 )
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation( Player(3), 3 )
    call SetPlayerColor( Player(3), ConvertPlayerColor(3) )
    call SetPlayerRacePreference( Player(3), RACE_PREF_NIGHTELF )
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable( Player(3), false )
    call SetPlayerController( Player(3), MAP_CONTROL_USER )

    // Player 4
    call SetPlayerStartLocation( Player(4), 4 )
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation( Player(4), 4 )
    call SetPlayerColor( Player(4), ConvertPlayerColor(4) )
    call SetPlayerRacePreference( Player(4), RACE_PREF_HUMAN )
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable( Player(4), false )
    call SetPlayerController( Player(4), MAP_CONTROL_USER )

    // Player 5
    call SetPlayerStartLocation( Player(5), 5 )
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation( Player(5), 5 )
    call SetPlayerColor( Player(5), ConvertPlayerColor(5) )
    call SetPlayerRacePreference( Player(5), RACE_PREF_ORC )
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable( Player(5), false )
    call SetPlayerController( Player(5), MAP_CONTROL_USER )

    // Player 6
    call SetPlayerStartLocation( Player(6), 6 )
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation( Player(6), 6 )
    call SetPlayerColor( Player(6), ConvertPlayerColor(6) )
    call SetPlayerRacePreference( Player(6), RACE_PREF_UNDEAD )
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable( Player(6), false )
    call SetPlayerController( Player(6), MAP_CONTROL_USER )

    // Player 7
    call SetPlayerStartLocation( Player(7), 7 )
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation( Player(7), 7 )
    call SetPlayerColor( Player(7), ConvertPlayerColor(7) )
    call SetPlayerRacePreference( Player(7), RACE_PREF_NIGHTELF )
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable( Player(7), false )
    call SetPlayerController( Player(7), MAP_CONTROL_USER )

    // Player 8
    call SetPlayerStartLocation( Player(8), 8 )
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation( Player(8), 8 )
    call SetPlayerColor( Player(8), ConvertPlayerColor(8) )
    call SetPlayerRacePreference( Player(8), RACE_PREF_HUMAN )
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable( Player(8), false )
    call SetPlayerController( Player(8), MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER )

    // Player 9
    call SetPlayerStartLocation( Player(9), 9 )
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation( Player(9), 9 )
    call SetPlayerColor( Player(9), ConvertPlayerColor(9) )
    call SetPlayerRacePreference( Player(9), RACE_PREF_ORC )
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable( Player(9), false )
    call SetPlayerController( Player(9), MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER )

    // Player 10
    call SetPlayerStartLocation( Player(10), 10 )
    call SetPlayerColor( Player(10), ConvertPlayerColor(10) )
    call SetPlayerRacePreference( Player(10), RACE_PREF_HUMAN )
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable( Player(10), false )
    call SetPlayerController( Player(10), MAP_CONTROL_COMPUTER )

endfunction

function InitCustomTeams takes nothing returns nothing
    // Force: TRIGSTR_002
    call SetPlayerTeam( Player(0), 0 )
    call SetPlayerState( Player(0), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1 )
    call SetPlayerTeam( Player(2), 0 )
    call SetPlayerState( Player(2), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1 )
    call SetPlayerTeam( Player(4), 0 )
    call SetPlayerState( Player(4), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1 )
    call SetPlayerTeam( Player(6), 0 )
    call SetPlayerState( Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1 )
    call SetPlayerTeam( Player(8), 0 )
    call SetPlayerState( Player(8), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1 )
    call SetPlayerTeam( Player(10), 0 )
    call SetPlayerState( Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1 )

    //   Allied
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(0), Player(2), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(0), Player(4), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(0), Player(6), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(0), Player(8), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(0), Player(10), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(2), Player(0), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(2), Player(4), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(2), Player(6), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(2), Player(8), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(2), Player(10), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(4), Player(0), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(4), Player(2), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(4), Player(6), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(4), Player(8), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(4), Player(10), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(6), Player(0), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(6), Player(2), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(6), Player(4), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(6), Player(8), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(6), Player(10), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(8), Player(0), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(8), Player(2), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(8), Player(4), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(8), Player(6), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(8), Player(10), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(10), Player(0), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(10), Player(2), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(10), Player(4), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(10), Player(6), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(10), Player(8), true )

    //   Shared Vision
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(0), Player(2), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(0), Player(4), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(0), Player(6), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(0), Player(8), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(0), Player(10), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(2), Player(0), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(2), Player(4), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(2), Player(6), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(2), Player(8), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(2), Player(10), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(4), Player(0), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(4), Player(2), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(4), Player(6), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(4), Player(8), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(4), Player(10), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(6), Player(0), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(6), Player(2), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(6), Player(4), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(6), Player(8), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(6), Player(10), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(8), Player(0), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(8), Player(2), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(8), Player(4), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(8), Player(6), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(8), Player(10), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(10), Player(0), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(10), Player(2), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(10), Player(4), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(10), Player(6), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(10), Player(8), true )

    // Force: TRIGSTR_028
    call SetPlayerTeam( Player(1), 1 )
    call SetPlayerState( Player(1), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1 )
    call SetPlayerTeam( Player(3), 1 )
    call SetPlayerState( Player(3), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1 )
    call SetPlayerTeam( Player(5), 1 )
    call SetPlayerState( Player(5), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1 )
    call SetPlayerTeam( Player(7), 1 )
    call SetPlayerState( Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1 )
    call SetPlayerTeam( Player(9), 1 )
    call SetPlayerState( Player(9), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1 )

    //   Allied
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(1), Player(3), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(1), Player(5), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(1), Player(7), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(1), Player(9), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(3), Player(1), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(3), Player(5), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(3), Player(7), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(3), Player(9), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(5), Player(1), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(5), Player(3), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(5), Player(7), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(5), Player(9), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(7), Player(1), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(7), Player(3), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(7), Player(5), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(7), Player(9), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(9), Player(1), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(9), Player(3), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(9), Player(5), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ( Player(9), Player(7), true )

    //   Shared Vision
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(1), Player(3), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(1), Player(5), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(1), Player(7), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(1), Player(9), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(3), Player(1), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(3), Player(5), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(3), Player(7), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(3), Player(9), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(5), Player(1), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(5), Player(3), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(5), Player(7), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(5), Player(9), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(7), Player(1), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(7), Player(3), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(7), Player(5), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(7), Player(9), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(9), Player(1), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(9), Player(3), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(9), Player(5), true )
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ( Player(9), Player(7), true )

endfunction

function InitAllyPriorities takes nothing returns nothing

    call SetStartLocPrioCount( 0, 2 )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 0, 0, 2, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 0, 1, 6, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )

    call SetStartLocPrioCount( 1, 2 )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 1, 0, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 1, 1, 5, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )

    call SetStartLocPrioCount( 2, 2 )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 2, 0, 0, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 2, 1, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )

    call SetStartLocPrioCount( 3, 2 )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 3, 0, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 3, 1, 7, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )

    call SetStartLocPrioCount( 4, 2 )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 4, 0, 2, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 4, 1, 6, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW )

    call SetStartLocPrioCount( 5, 2 )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 5, 0, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 5, 1, 7, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )

    call SetStartLocPrioCount( 6, 2 )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 6, 0, 0, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 6, 1, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW )

    call SetStartLocPrioCount( 7, 2 )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 7, 0, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 7, 1, 5, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )

    call SetStartLocPrioCount( 9, 6 )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 9, 0, 0, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 9, 1, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 9, 2, 2, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 9, 3, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 9, 4, 6, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 9, 5, 7, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW )

    call SetEnemyStartLocPrioCount( 9, 5 )
    call SetEnemyStartLocPrio( 9, 0, 0, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW )
    call SetEnemyStartLocPrio( 9, 1, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW )
    call SetEnemyStartLocPrio( 9, 2, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW )
    call SetEnemyStartLocPrio( 9, 3, 5, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW )
    call SetEnemyStartLocPrio( 9, 4, 7, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW )

    call SetStartLocPrioCount( 10, 11 )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 10, 0, 0, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 10, 1, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 10, 2, 2, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 10, 3, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 10, 4, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 10, 5, 5, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 10, 6, 6, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 10, 7, 7, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 10, 8, 8, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )
    call SetStartLocPrio( 10, 9, 9, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH )

    call SetEnemyStartLocPrioCount( 10, 3 )
    call SetEnemyStartLocPrio( 10, 0, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW )
    call SetEnemyStartLocPrio( 10, 1, 5, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW )
    call SetEnemyStartLocPrio( 10, 2, 9, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW )
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Main Initialization
//*
//***************************************************************************

//===========================================================================
function main takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetCameraBounds( -5376.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_LEFT), -2944.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_BOTTOM), 5376.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_RIGHT), 2688.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_TOP), -5376.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_LEFT), 2688.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_TOP), 5376.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_RIGHT), -2944.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_BOTTOM) )
    call SetDayNightModels( "Environment\\DNC\\DNCAshenvale\\DNCAshenvaleTerrain\\DNCAshenvaleTerrain.mdl", "Environment\\DNC\\DNCAshenvale\\DNCAshenvaleUnit\\DNCAshenvaleUnit.mdl" )
    call NewSoundEnvironment( "Default" )
    call SetAmbientDaySound( "AshenvaleDay" )
    call SetAmbientNightSound( "AshenvaleNight" )
    call SetMapMusic( "Music", true, 0 )
    call CreateRegions(  )
    call CreateAllDestructables(  )
    call CreateAllUnits(  )
    call InitBlizzard(  )
    call InitGlobals(  )
    call InitCustomTriggers(  )
    call RunInitializationTriggers(  )

endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Map Configuration
//*
//***************************************************************************

function config takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetMapName( "TRIGSTR_226" )
    call SetMapDescription( "TRIGSTR_228" )
    call SetPlayers( 11 )
    call SetTeams( 11 )
    call SetGamePlacement( MAP_PLACEMENT_TEAMS_TOGETHER )

    call DefineStartLocation( 0, -3264.0, 320.0 )
    call DefineStartLocation( 1, 1728.0, 384.0 )
    call DefineStartLocation( 2, -1536.0, 320.0 )
    call DefineStartLocation( 3, 3264.0, 320.0 )
    call DefineStartLocation( 4, -1664.0, -896.0 )
    call DefineStartLocation( 5, 1728.0, -896.0 )
    call DefineStartLocation( 6, -3264.0, -896.0 )
    call DefineStartLocation( 7, 3136.0, -960.0 )
    call DefineStartLocation( 8, -3456.0, -256.0 )
    call DefineStartLocation( 9, 3136.0, -256.0 )
    call DefineStartLocation( 10, -192.0, -320.0 )

    // Player setup
    call InitCustomPlayerSlots(  )
    call InitCustomTeams(  )
    call InitAllyPriorities(  )
endfunction
